name: Apartament, Shared Pool, Balcony Castellsol 309
description:
Cosy, recently refurbished 51 m² apartement in Arenal d'en Castell for up to 4 people. It has a double bedroom, terrace, free WiFi, and is fully equipped.

It is located just 300 metres from the sandy Arenal d'en Castell beach and offers a shared outdoor swimming pool, a large outdoor area with sun loungers and free private parking. The area is very quiet and at the same time close to supermarkets, a pharmacy, good restaurants and entertainment facilities.
neighborhood_overview:
It is located in the quiet urbanization Arenal d'en Castell, which embraces the beautiful beach that gives it its name. Within a few minutes walking distance there are restaurants and bars, supermarkets, pharmacy, bus and taxi stop.... Of course, the beach and the sea are always in sight.

Mahón 18 km / Airport 25 km / Ciutadella 30 km
neighbourhood: Arenal d'en Castell, Islas Baleares, Spain

name: Stunning sea views from very front line
description:
Cozy apartment located in the Paseo Marítimo de Fornells in very first line and with stunning sea views. Fully equipped with air conditioning in the living room and both bedrooms, as well as free access to internet WiFi.

The apartment consists of a master bedroom with double bed and another room with one single bed, two bathrooms (one en-suite), living room with TV, fully equipped kitchen with fridge, dishwasher, washing machine, oven, microwave oven. Large terrace with table and chairs where you will enjoy magnificent views over the bay of Fornells.

Located on the promenade 100 meters from the town center.

There is no nearby business or commercial activity likely to cause nighttime inconvenience.



Amenities: Washing Machine, Dishwasher, kettle, double bed, TV, Terrace, Kitchen, oven, microwave, toaster, fridge / freezer, internet connection, air conditioning, heating, single bed, Iron, Ironing Board, Seaview, Fishing, Golf, Sail
neighborhood_overview:
Fornells is one of the most exclusive and most charming holiday destinations in the Mediterranean, a small fishing village located on the north coast of Menorca where the landscape has the highest level of protection in the EU.

The village of Fornells is formed by a wonderful historical center next to the port with its lovely pedestrian streets, a beautiful promenade and well-kept residential areas around the center.

In Fornells you will find the best offer of activities. Boat trips, scuba diving, kayaking, boat rentals, windsurfing, hiking and many more for companies with great experience.

Fornells offers a great and diverse gastronomic offer including three of the best restaurants in Menorca with its famous lobster, fresh fish and other surprising dishes.

You can enjoy the marvelous crystal waters of the Bay of Fornells in its protected swimming areas in the sea and you can easily go to the best beaches of Menorca.

In Fornells yo

name: Villa PuntaRosa by Villa Plus
description: The position of Villa PuntaRosa could not be better. Located one street back from the beach and facilities of Punta Prima, you'll have everything you need for an enjoyable holiday right on your doorstep. The popular Splash! waterpark is also nearby and can be accessed on foot. This impressive 3 bedroom villa has a private pool as well as a partial sea view from the first floor balcony. WiFi and air conditioning/heating in the bedrooms are included.
host_about:
Established in 1986, Villa Plus is the UK’s leading villa accommodation specialist. The expert UK Travel Team and the bi-lingual overseas in-resort team pride themselves on putting the customer at the heart of everything they do, so you can be sure your villa booking is in safe hands. 

The dedicated teams go the extra mile by hand-picking every villa ensuring you will find the quality villa, in the best location for your holiday.

name: Arenal d'en Castell · 2 bedrooms
description:
Discover your refuge in Arena Es Castell, Menorca! Just 3 minutes from the beach and in a quiet development, it is the ideal place to enjoy the Mediterranean. Relax in the serenity of the island and explore the charming local restaurants within walking distance.

30 minutes from Mahón and 20 minutes from Mercadal, with supermarkets, shops and services nearby. Close to beaches like Cala Pregonda, Playa de Cavalleria and Cala Tortuga. We look forward to seeing you in Arenal for unforgivable vacations!

name: Riviera Hotel Suite Junior with breakfast
description:
Riviera is a journey through time, a refuge for those seeking something different. Inspired by the carefree mood of the Dolce Vita, you'll find a universe that combines a pop style from another time with the freshness of the Mediterranean Sea.

Riviera is sparkle. It's nostalgia. It's glamorous. Our hotel is not for those who settle for less. It's for those who appreciate the pleasure of small details: such as a perfectly prepared Negroni, for example.

name: S'Olivera by 3 Villas Menorca
description:
Bring the whole family to this great place with lots of room for fun.
Beautiful villa in Addaya with 3 bedrooms, air conditioning in all areas, large private swimming pool and barbecue area. This charming residence offers comfort with a modern design. Relax in its spacious rooms, cool off in the pool or enjoy a delicious meal al fresco in the barbecue area - a perfect place to create unforgettable memories with family and friends!
neighborhood_overview:
We hope you have lots of laughter and fun times during your vacation! However, we’d really appreciate it if you’re mindful and keep noise to a minimum during nighttime hours. Parties are absolutely forbidden during the whole stay.

The port of Addaia is a quiet residential area that has been established along a natural harbour and has all the necessary services for your holidays: restaurants, supermarket, public transport, etc. Very close to the beach of Arenal d'en Castell, one of the biggest beaches of the island with a circular shape, where you can also find a lot of entertainment and services.

More information:

MAIN HOUSE
- Bedroom 1: double bed, A/C, en suite bathroom, ground floor
- Bedroom 2: double bed, A/C, bathroom en suite, first floor
- Bedroom 3: two single beds, A/C, en suite bathroom, first floor
- Bedroom 4: two single beds, A/C, second floor

name: Jordi, Beautiful Villa with pool in Menorca!
description:
DISCOVER THE CHARM OF VILLA JORDI
Menorca is one of the most beautiful places in the Mediterranean and Spain.
neighborhood_overview:
DISCOVER THE AREA – PRIVILEGED ENVIRONMENT IN CALA EN BOSCH / CAP D'ARTRUTX
The villa is located in Cap d'Artrutx, a quiet and residential area in the southwest of Menorca, perfect for those seeking comfort, services, and easy access to the main attractions of the island.

CAL EN BOSCH / CAP D'ARTRUTX – UNFORGETTABLE SUNSETS
This charming coastal spot is known for its iconic lighthouse, now converted into a restaurant and lookout point. It’s one of the best places in Menorca to enjoy a magical sunset over the sea, with views of Mallorca on clear days. Ideal for a romantic dinner or a relaxing stroll.

SON XORIGUER BEACH – NATURE AND ACTIVITIES
Just 5 minutes by car (or 15 minutes walking) from the villa, you’ll find this beautiful turquoise water beach. In the area, you’ll find:
• Diving, windsurfing, and sailing schools
• Kayak rentals
• Restaurants with sea views
• Family-friendly areas
Perfect for those who want to combine

name: Luxury villa with sea/sunset view and private pool
description:
Luxury 3 bedrooms (1 en suite) villa with private pool and gorgeous 180º sea and sunset view in quiet Cap D'Artrutx.
The villa is a few minutes by car from the astonishing Cala'n Bosch and Son Xoriguer beaches, and 15 min from Ciutadella. Amazing location, close to supermarkets, bars, restaurants and family fun - a perfect destination for families, couples and groups of friends.
All bedrooms have air con and the house is equipped with cable TV, wi-fi and washing machine.
neighborhood_overview: Cap d'Artrutx is a very quiet and beautiful residencial area surrounded by the sea with the best sunset view  in Menorca.The villa is 3 minutes away by car (or a pleasant 25 minutes walk by the sea) from Cala'n Bosch, a gorgeous white sand beach, and a bit more than 5 minutes by car from the pristine Son Xoriguer. The location is also very strategic to access the famous Turqueta and Macarella Beach in less than 30 min. You can reach the charming village of Ciutadella is 15 minutes by car or bus.
host_about: We live in Menorca (Spain) and we love to travel around the world using AirBnb. As we do it quite often, we are happy to share our lovely houses in Menorca (our favourite spot in the world) with other travellers when abroad.

description: Holiday rental of this nice villa with pool and spacious garden with barbeque area. Situtaed in a quiet residential area of Es Canutells, south coast of the island. The romantinc beach is within a walking distance, really close. Supermarkets and shops in the village. Airport only within 6 km. 2 double bedrooms and 2 single bedrooms. Fully air-conditioned. Nice garden and barbeque area. Perfect for holidays!
neighborhood_overview:
The area is situated on Minorca's south coast where spectacular, white sand beaches combine with small rocky inlets and crystal clear waters, permitting swimming with fish in Paradise. It is therefore not surprising to find small clubs in the area dedicated to watersports and diving.
The south-east coast comprises small touristic urbanisations and untouched areas very near Sant Lluis or Sant Clemente town and just 5km from the airport and Mahon, the island's capital.

name: Rodjeta 3
description:
Brand-New! Recently Renovated Apartment

Enjoy your vacation just a 5-minute walk from the beach in a spacious, modern, and cozy apartment.

It offers Wi-Fi, private parking, a shared pool, and a communal barbecue area so you can make the most of your stay.

This charming duplex features two double bedrooms, a full bathroom, and a fully equipped kitchen integrated into a bright living room with access to a balcony.

The perfect place to relax and unwind!
neighborhood_overview:
This charming apartment is located a two minute walk from the beach and features WiFi, large pool and community BBQ (to be shared with only 3 more apartments!).

It is a spacious apartment perfect for families or groups of friends as it consists of 3 spacious bedrooms and two bathrooms, plus an equipped kitchen attached to a very bright living room with access to a private terrace. What more could you want for a relaxing vacation in a paradise island? :)

name: Incredible villa near the beach
description: This modern villa is just 280 meters walk to the beach. Part of a small community of similar villas, Villarrica is light, bright and tastefully furnished with 4 bedrooms, air con and shared pool. Build in 2006 and totally renovated in 2016.
neighborhood_overview:
Outside Villarrica:
- Large Shared Swimming Pool - 12m x 6m shared swimming pool with roman step entry. Depth 1.10m - 2.10m. Plus a shallow children's pool with roman step entry depth 0.50m.
- Covered Dining Terrace - At the rear of the sitting room, there is a covered terrace with dining table and chairs along with a portable barbecue.
- Private Garden - At the front of the villa with lawn and flower beds.
- Sea View Roof Terrace - The roof terrace has lovely open views across the Punta Grossa peninsular to the sea.

name: Casa Rockmorell / 6 pers. ap. with private pool
description:
Casa Rockmorell, situated in the resort of Cala Morell, is a beautiful house overlooking a pine forest. Cala Morell is known for its impressive cliffs, wonderful sunsets and some of the oldest prehistoric settlements on the island. White houses and reflecting light, characterize the bay and surroundings. The sheltered cove is a fantastic site for diving and snorkeling. Hikers find themselves only two steps away from the´Cami de Cavalls`
July / Aug. minimum stay one week, from Sat. to Sat.
neighborhood_overview:
The neighborhood
Cala Morell is a quiet urbanization with some local population all year around and mostly tourist familys in summer.
host_about:
Deutsch:
Rockmare … hinter diesem Namen steht eine Person, mit einem vielseitigem Betätigungsfeld.
Martin Rockmann, Jahrgang 1970 und ausgebildeter Handwerker, lebt seit 1991 vorwiegend auf Menorca. Die Nähe zur Natur und zum Wassersport sind einige seiner Gründe auf dieser Insel zu leben und zu arbeiten.
Superhost 2021, 2020, 2019

English:
Rockmare - behind the name you find one person, offering a large range of activities and services.
Martin Rockmann, born in 1970, originally trained as a professional blacksmith and has spent most of his time in Menorca since 1991. The chance to live and work close to water sports and nature made the island such an attractive place to live for him.
Superhost summer 2021, 2020, 2019

Español:
Rockmare - Me gustaría presentarme, soy Martin Rockmann, nacido el 1970, vivo y trabajo desde el año 1991 en la isla de Menorca. Aunque estoy titulado en la especialidad de herrero, en realidad realizo varios trabajos, algunos de los cuales detallo más abajo.
Mi interés por la naturaleza y la pasión por deportes relacionados con el mar es una de mis razones para vivir en Menorca.
Superhost temporada 2021, 2020, 2019

name: Villa con piscina privada
description:
The villa has a swimming pool, park, bbq and private terrace
It has 3 bedrooms; 1 with a double bed and 2 with 2 single beds.
2 bathrooms (one with a bathtub and the other with a shower). Hair Dryer.
Plazas: 6
Sitting area flat screen satellite TV, centralized A/C, fans, separate kitchen (microwave, refrigerator, coffee maker, toaster, dishwasher, etc.) It also has laundry room with washing machine, iron, ironing board, etc. Public parking in front of the villa.
neighborhood_overview:
Located at the southwest end of the island, Cap d'Artrutx is a very peaceful enclave, although it is surrounded by an urbanisation.
On clear days, from the coast, you can see the silhouette of the southern part of Ciutadella, Ferreries and Es Mercadal.
The Lighthouse of Artrutx that gives name to the area, was built in 1858 and is 45 meters high. It is characterized by alternating black and white horizontal stripes, the lighthouse keeper's house and a courtyard enclosed by a stone wall. If the lighthouse is beautiful itself, the view from this place is spectacular. Mostly, at sunset.
The lighthouse has at its base, a very cozy bar and restaurant, ideal to hang out and watch the sunset

name: VILLA JOSÉ - Charming villa in Ses Salines
description:
Charming house in Ses Salines, Fornells.
Enjoy a relaxing stay in Menorca in this well-appointed house which can host up to 8 people. With a private pool, barbecue, suites with AA and ensuite bathroom and WIFI amongst other amenities to ensure a wonderful stay.
neighborhood_overview:
Located within the beautiful Ses Salines residential area, just outside the charming village of Fornells. A peaceful neighbourhood on the shores of the stunning Fornells bay.
Within the residential area there is a shop and 2 restaurants. Fornells village is only 2km away, which can be either reached by a nice stroll on a safe walk/cycling path or in just a couple of minutes by car. In Fornells, you will find a wide variety of waterfront restaurants, shops, bakeries, a farmers market during summer months, watersport centres (sailing, kayak, windsurf, paddle board, diving...) and also places where to rent bicycles.
The stunning northern coast beaches and "calas" can be easily reached in 5 to 20min by car. And the only golf course in the island is also just a few minutes away by car.

Beautiful apartment in a prestigious residential complex in Ciutadella -Sa Caleta. It can accommodate up to 4 people. A few meters from the beach, you can walk there in five minutes. It has a spectacular garden and swimming pool. This place is very cozy. The location cannot be better: a few steps from the beach and a 5-minute drive from Ciutadella.
The house is very cozy and very well equipped.
Ideal for enjoying Menorca in a magical place.
neighborhood_overview: A very quiet residential area and close to Ciutadella. It has Sa Caleta beach next door, some bars and restaurants very close by. Access to Ciutadella in five minutes.
host_about:
Hola, soy Elena, de profesión arquitecto y me gusta viajar y preparar el viaje, relacionarme con la gente procurando  enriquecerme todo lo que pueda. También me gusta el cine, cocinar recetas especiales para compartir con mis amigos, salir a tomar unas cervezas en buena compañía, leer un buen libro en un espacio agradable, rodearme de cosas bellas.
Hay dos frases que me encantan:
"La vida sonríe a los que sonríen" y "La juventud es una cualidad, quien la tiene nunca la pierde".
Estaré encantada de conocerte.

name: Son Bou chalet
description:
Villa in Menorca, with magnificent views over the playa of Son Bou and a large swimming pool surrounded by greenery.
The house is complete with everything, wifi, Cromecast and everything you need to live comfortably.
Ideal for a family or a couple of friends.
Get ready for wonderful candlelit dinners, accompanied by a good glass of Rioja, admiring one of the most beautiful sunsets ever.
POSSIBILITY to rent a car, request more info.
N.B. Tourist tax of €2.20 per night to be paid on site in cash
neighborhood_overview:
Island of Minorca, the pearl of the Balearic Islands!
The accommodation is in a privileged area to discover all the beauties that the island offers.
In fact, Son Bou is located in the center of the island overlooking the south, which is the most popular tourist part.
The apartments are located at Torre Soli Nou, which is definitely the best spot on the beach.
The beach of Son Bou is one of the most beautiful on the island, 3 km of fine sand and crystal clear waters. The sandy bottom is also ideal for children. The beach can be reached on foot in only fifteen minutes, there is a transport service that has stops very close to home. However, I would recommend renting a car, in order to be able to visit all the natural beauties and not only that Menorca offers.
There is a natural wildlife reserve nearby, and there is a beautiful horse riding facility nearby for horseback riding in the Camin de Cavalls trails that cross the island.
host_about:

description:
Welcome to our charming apartment in Cala Torret, Binibeca Nou, Menorca. Located on the seafront, it offers direct access from a quiet pedestrian street. Decorated with mime, it is the perfect place to enjoy a relaxing vacation in front of the crystal clear waters of the Mediterranean. Great for families, couples or friends looking for comfort, privacy, and unforgettable views.

Tourist registration number: ET2702ME
neighborhood_overview:
Quiet area, ideal for outdoor sports. There are a variety of restaurants, a supermarket open every day from 8 to 20 hours, a laundry room, a bakery-cafeteria where you can enjoy its wonderful outdoor breakfasts.
The development is 15 minutes away (by car) from the airport, without plane noise.
You can visit, taking a pleasant walk, Binibeca-Vell, a town of fishermen very popular for its architecture (it has ATMs).
Water sports are available, there is a diving school, kayak, and bike rental.
It has public-private parking just minutes away.
Binibeca-Nou is connected by public transportation to the village of St. Louis and Mahon.

description: ​Villa Laurinda is located in the Torre Soli Nou area - which is a few minutes away from the Son Bou Beach. The villa is all one level, and has a bright and spacious living room. neighborhood_overview: Son Bou, nestled on the southern coast of Menorca, is a picturesque resort town renowned for its stunning beaches and relaxed Mediterranean atmosphere. Boasting one of the island’s longest beaches with soft golden sands and crystal-clear turquoise waters, Son Bou is a haven for sun-seekers and water enthusiasts. The resort offers a range of amenities, including beachfront cafes, restaurants serving delicious local cuisine, and shops for leisurely strolls. The surrounding nature reserve adds a touch of wild beauty, making it an ideal destination for nature lovers. Whether you’re basking in the sun, exploring the coastal trails, or enjoying the vibrant nightlife, Son Bou invites visitors to savour the beauty and tranquility of Menorca’s southern shores.

host_about:
As an expression of my passion and love for traveling, I offer visitors the chance to experience and enjoy my beautiful property.

name: Apartment in front of Es Caló Blanc
description:
Charming apartment, composed of a double bedroom, bathroom with shower, solid wood kitchen with spacious dining room, and a small terrace with a garden of exclusive use, enjoying a community swimming pool next to it, close to the sea, only 50 metres away from the Cala Es Caló Blanc, with its crystalline waters. Also, there is the beach of Binisafua at a distance of approximately 500 metres.
It has been completely refurbished since 2008.
neighborhood_overview:
The nearest place is the village of Sant Lluís which is about 8 minutes away by car. During spring and summer, there are two restaurants within 150m.

Behind the apartment, the "Camí de Cavalls" starts and offers hikers and mountain bikers direct access to one of the most beautiful trails in Menorca.

Due to the proximity to the airport, there is aircraft noise, as depending on the wind, planes also fly directly over the complex. To be honest, however, this does not bother us much, as you get used to it quickly, and in summer, when there is more air traffic, you are usually on the beach, and a night flight ban applies from 23:00h.

neighborhood_overview: Son Bou, nestled on the southern coast of Menorca, is a picturesque resort town renowned for its stunning beaches and relaxed Mediterranean atmosphere. Boasting one of the island’s longest beaches with soft golden sands and crystal-clear turquoise waters, Son Bou is a haven for sun-seekers and water enthusiasts. The resort offers a range of amenities, including beachfront cafes, restaurants serving delicious local cuisine, and shops for leisurely strolls. The surrounding nature reserve adds a touch of wild beauty, making it an ideal destination for nature lovers. Whether you’re basking in the sun, exploring the coastal trails, or enjoying the vibrant nightlife, Son Bou invites visitors to savour the beauty and tranquility of Menorca’s southern shores.

neighborhood_overview:
Welcome to our small, newly renovated Luxury Apartment complex, designed to offer you a unique experience of comfort, style, and relaxation. Ideally located in the heart of a charming residential area, you’ll be surrounded by restaurants, bars, shops, supermarkets, and even a water park—all just steps away.

Enjoy our private swimming pool, reserved exclusively for our guests: a peaceful oasis to unwind after a day of exploring.

Just 3 km away lies Ciutadella, Menorca’s picturesque former capital, full of history, romantic harbors, and vibrant cultural life.

Explore three nearby coves with crystal-clear waters, perfect for sunbathing, swimming, or simply relaxing. Looking for more? You’ll be just a few kilometers from nearly 60 beaches, some easy to reach, others waiting to be discovered by the adventurous.

Your perfect getaway awaits.
Luxury, location, and nature… all in one place.

Book now and make Menorca your personal parad

description: Our "Can petit" is located in a small development with a very large common pool. neighborhood_overview: The nearest larger town of Sant Lluis is about 8 minutes by car. The next shopping is reachable in 5 min by car. Binibeca vell can be reached in 20 minutes by foot. Behind the bungalow begins the "Cami de Caballo" and offers hikers and mountain bikers the direct access to one of the most beautiful paths in Menorca and mountain bikers. Due to the proximity to the airport, there is aircraft noise in Cala Sa Font, as depending on the wind the planes also fly directly through the complex. However, this honestly doesn't bother us very much, as you get used to it quickly and in summer with stronger air traffic is usually at the beach and a night flight ban starts from 11 pm.

name: Terra
description:
House in the very first line of the sea with a direct descent for bathing. 300 m from the beach. With an approximate area of 200 m2 spread over three floors. On the ground floor is the kitchen, a toilet and the living room with access to a terrace with furniture and views of the beach and the sea. The renovated kitchen goes out to another garden deck equipped with furniture and barbecue.
On the top floor there are 3 rooms, all with cold-heat air conditioning. The main one has a terrace with ocean views.
neighborhood_overview:
The area is very quiet. It is located in the quietest area of the Calan Blanes development. At about 1000 m there is a leisure area with shops, bars and restaurants. Just 100 m2 and 500 m away there are two supermarkets. Very close to the house there are tennis facilities and a diving school.
The development is 3 km from Ciutadella and the property is accessed from Ciutadella in about ten minutes by car on a faster road that is that of Ciutadella to Calan Blanes or, for another slower one in which it takes about fifteen minutes that borders the sea and that also has a bike path.
From the area there are several hiking trails to enjoy the "Cami de Cavalls" which is a route that borders the entire island of Menorca.
neighbourhood: Ciutadella de Menorca, Illes Balears, Spain

host_about:
*IMPORANT* - In order to access your villa directions and key collection information, you will need to log-in to the Solmar Villas website. Information on how to do this will be emailed to you once your booking is confirmed. Please note that we will contact you post booking via our Villa Concierge Team in order for you to provide your Advanced Passenger Information. This includes all passenger names, dates of birth, passport details and your flight details, which is required by local authorities.

Solmar Villas is a family run business with over 29 years of experience in arranging high quality, tailor made villa holidays. We pride ourselves in providing the highest quality prompt and personalised service to all our clients - with Solmar Villas, you are in safe hands.

We specialise in providing the very finest villas for perfect villa holidays.

All our villas are carefully chosen and approved by our staff - we select only the highest quality villas in the finest resorts and regions of mainland Spain as well as the Balearics  and Canary Islands, Portugal, Greek Islands,  Cyprus and Croatia.

Our selection of villas include a wide range of properties from traditional style houses offering peace and privacy in the countryside, to luxury villas with pools and breath-taking coastal views. 

Solmar has built a loyal customer base. Many of our clients use Solmar year after year and many of our new customers book our villas after recommendations from friends and family.

Whatever type of holiday you have in mind, whether its beach, sports or special interest, we will do everything possible to meet your requirements.

Our ATOL number is ATOL 10334 and as such any flight inclusive holidays booked with us are financially protected.

name: En la Playa junto al mar- puesta de sol -estrellas
description:
PASSIÓ MEDITERRÀNIA Suite Apartment.
Property on the beach, with direct access to the sea from its porch, 15 meters away, on the first line, ideal for sunbathing, quiet and relaxed and from where you can see the most beautiful sunsets on the island and an immense starry sky, in the light of the lighthouse.

You can take a swim and swim in front of the same property, from the garden, in the waters of the UNESCO marine reserve of the northern natural park (Tramuntana Area).
neighborhood_overview:
From the living room and from its porch you have magnificent ocean views (just 15 meters away) from where you can see the best sunsets on the island, and the most starry sky you have ever seen, next to the light of the Cavallería lighthouse.

The apartment has direct access to the sea (rock), to the beautiful virgin cove, where, if time and weather permitting, you can take a bath in front of the same apartment. Less than 500 meters away there is a private access, from the development, to the fine sand part of Cala Tirant.

The development, located in a natural park and marine reserve, protected by UNESCO, has several restaurants (one of them with the rating of cooking the best lobster boiler on the island) and supermarkets, in addition to other activities.
host_about:
Teresa and me travel frequently, for work, around the world, and Menorca has always been our magical island, our point of disconnection from everything. We love the sea, gastronomy and culture in all its expressions. Welcome to our refuge.

Teresa y yo viajamos frecuentemente, por trabajo, alrededor del mundo, y Menorca ha sido siempre nuestra isla mágica, nuestro punto de desconexión de todo.  Nos encanta el mar, la gastronomía y la cultura en todas sus expresiones. Bienvenidos a nuestro refugio.

name: Torres Sureda
description: Welcome to this beautiful house located in Cala Blanca, where 4+1 guests will find their second home.
host_about:
Hello, in Homerti we are a group of people who are dedicated to managing reservation services in order to give property owners the chance to rent their property. 

Thanks to us, lots of private property owners are able to offer a good service to their clients who rent their properties, which would not be possible without us as many owners lack the necessary know-how .

How can I describe best my team? Well, we are dynamic and active, we speak several languages and do our best to manage your renting so you have a satisfactory stay. 

Besides, I would like to tell you that we visit and check all of our properties on our own. Furthermore, we are there for you in situ and are happy to assist you with all doubts you may have. 

Homerti is your home!,  do you enter?

Hola,  en Homerti somos un grupo de personas que nos dedicamos a gestionar el servicio de reservas para los pequeños propietarios que quieren alquilar sus casas y no pueden encargarse de realizar este trabajo!.
Gracias a nosotros, pequeños propietarios pueden dar un buen servicio a los huéspedes que quieren alquilar sus propiedades. 
¿Cómo puedo describir de mejora manera nuestro equipo? Pues somos gente joven, dinámica y activa, y nos dedicamos a gestionar su alquiler para que su estancia sea totalmente satisfactoria.
Es muy importante señalar que visitamos y revisamos todas las propiedades a las que realizamos alquileres. Además le atenderemos en destino para cualquier duda que pueda surgir.
Homerti es tu casa! ¿Entras?

name: Villa Caterina with Gated Pool, A/C, near Beach
description: Lovely villa with private and gated pool only 5 minutes walk from bars and restaurants and 10 minutes from the beach. The spacious and private garden offers various areas for enjoying outdoor living, including a stone barbeque next to the modern swimming pool. The villa has been tastefully decorated with comfortable furniture and offers all one needs for self catering accommodation (cooker, oven, dishwasher, washing machine, hair dryer, etc). Air-con in master  room, ceiling fans and WIFI.
neighborhood_overview: Villa Caterina is situated in a cliff-top tourist resort, Cala’n Porter, on the south coast of the island and only a 10 minute drive from the airport. The town is ideal for families, with a variety of bars, restaurants, supermarkets and souvenir shops, all within walking distance from the property. The wonderful beach with crystal clear waters can be accessed via road or steps and also offers two beach bars serving local tapas and sangria. Other south coast beaches (Binibeca, Punta Prima, Binisafúa, Son Bou) can be reached in less than 15 minutes by car, and the capital town Mahon is also only a 10 minute drive away. Car hire is available from the resort and a daily bus service runs between Calan Porter and Mahon during the summer months.

name: Stunning views and great terrace apartment
description: Stylishly renovated apartment in 2015 in Playas de Fornells (Menorca), one of the most charming developments on the island. As soon as you enter, you'll be impressed by the views and great lighting. It has two bedrooms, one with a double bed, exit to the terrace and ocean views and a second bedroom that was renovated in 2017 with views of gardens and mountains and has two beds that are 90cm wide by 190cm long
neighborhood_overview: The development is located in the northern part of the island and was designed with lots of gardens and parks that make very effective use of water. Cacti of all shapes and sizes abound, as do bougainvillea. The main beach is about 500 meters away, which can be reached on foot or by car. The bay is a UNESCO-protected marine reserve with great diving possibilities. Just 100 meters away around the hill are restaurants, bars, a supermarket, and a car rental. 4 km away, connected by a bike path, is the village of Fornells, which is known for lobster fishing and its natural bay ideal for water sports.
host_about: Viajar, conocer gente y lugares. Por primera vez, este año me quedé sin espacio en el pasaporte :) Mar y montaña, más de naturaleza que de ciudad

neighborhood_overview: The surroundings of Cala Blanca have cafes, bars, recreational centers, bus stops near the villa which will make your stay more comfortable
host_about:
Soy natural de Ciutadella de Menorca y he vivido siempre en Menorca. Aunque mi pasión era el futbol, de joven ya me dedique a ayudar a mis padres en un pequeño hostal familiar situado también en Ciutadella. De ahí ya cursé los estudios de turismo y pasé a trabajar en el hostal de mis padres, así como también en el alquiler de dos villas turísticas que mi familia tiene en primera línea de mar aquí en la isla de Menorca.
A parte de tener una considerable experiencia en el sector turístico y sentir una profunda vocación de servicio para los visitantes de la isla, también me gusta pescar, bucear, hacer windsurf así como ir en bici por el 'Cami de Cavalls'.
Actualmente estoy casado, y es mi mujer Sulay, la que me ayuda en el alquiler de la casa.
neighbourhood: Ciutadella de Menorca, Illes Balears, Spain

name: Casa David (Ses Alzines) by  Sonne Villas
description:
Lovely apartment with private pool and beautiful views of Cala Galdana beach.

This beautiful duplex rental consists of two double bedrooms, two bathrooms, a living/dining room, kitchen, two balconies, private pool and barbecue.

On the upper floor, the bedrooms comprise a double bedroom with a double bed that also has a large private balcony offering spectacular views of the sea and Cala Galdana. A second bedroom with two single beds and ample space.
neighborhood_overview:
The resort of Cala Galdana is one of the most popular and prestigious in Menorca. This is due to its beautiful beach that is surrounded by cliffs that border and protect it from the wind, its fine white sand, crystal clear waters and its shell shape make it a true paradise.
Cala Galdana is a beach that has all the necessary services such as Baywatch, sunbeds, boat rentals, restaurants and more.
The beach is ideal for young children who are learning to swim, as the sea does not cover in the first 50 meters.

The complex is very safe and quiet family atmosphere. In its shopping area has many shops, restaurants, supermarkets, bars, water sports and leisure as boat rental, car, kayaking, horseback riding, cycling etc.
Cala Galdana is surrounded by a natural environment, ideal for walking, for example through the Barranc d'Algendar or walk through the Cami de Cavalls to Cala Mitjana (15min walk), to Trebaluger (45 min) that is a lovely and unspoiled beach or the we

name: Pierre & Vacances - Chambre Double
description:
Welcome to Pierre Et Vacances!
Tourist residence (adults only) - Beach access - Quiet location - Relaxing stay exclusively for adults - 3 outdoor swimming pools - Wellness center - Breakfast included - Activities nearby
neighborhood_overview:
Authentic and wild, Menorca is a unique island in the Balearics. For many years, its inhabitants have been fighting to preserve its unique ecosystem and its centuries-old culture. A trip to Menorca always surprises, first of all with the colors which change from blue to turquoise, from green to emerald, from blond to white. Then by its gentle way of life, its languor and the almost unreal beauty of its coastline.

During this stopover in the Balearic Islands, you will first discover a rich historical and archaeological heritage in Ciutadella, Mahon or in the ancient Talayotic cities of the island. You will then hike along the coast to discover the sublime coves that sculpt the Menorcan coasts. After taking a dip at Cala Macarella, you will cross the island to reach the Albufera des Grau Natural Park, a wildlife paradise.

Finally, you will not miss the unforgettable sunsets offered by the most surprising island of the Balearics. It's time to pack your bags to disc

description:
Sonblanc is a traditional farmhouse that has the beauty of its original features.

What our guests like the most: "The house was amazing, your communication was second to none and the pool was definitely my favourite place"; "The house is magnificent, very well decorated with a lot of character. ....The swimming pool area is very pleasant and the whole property is very well maintained"; "SonBlanc is a very beautiful house, with a wonderful swimming pool, located in a peaceful area"
neighborhood_overview:
The villa is located in the country in Sant Lluis. Sant Lluis is in southern Menorca, just a few kilometers from the capital, Mahon. It is most noteworthy for its varied coastline, with fine sand beaches and cliffs. You will find the beautiful coves of Binsissafuller, Biniaconlla and Binibeca, with their typical whitewashed fishermen's houses.
There is a big supermarket very close from our home (5 to 10 minutes by car), Eroski, that opens from monday to sunday (included) from 9 am in the morning to 21.30 at night

host_about:
*IMPORANT* - In order to access your villa directions and key collection information, you will need to log-in to the Solmar Villas website. Information on how to do this will be emailed to you once your booking is confirmed. Please note that we will contact you post booking via our Villa Concierge Team in order for you to provide your Advanced Passenger Information. This includes all passenger names, dates of birth, passport details and your flight details, which is required by local authorities.

Solmar Villas is a family run business with over 29 years of experience in arranging high quality, tailor made villa holidays. We pride ourselves in providing the highest quality prompt and personalised service to all our clients - with Solmar Villas, you are in safe hands.

We specialise in providing the very finest villas for perfect villa holidays.

All our villas are carefully chosen and approved by our staff - we select only the highest quality villas in the finest resorts and regions of mainland Spain as well as the Balearics  and Canary Islands, Portugal, Greek Islands,  Cyprus and Croatia.

Our selection of villas include a wide range of properties from traditional style houses offering peace and privacy in the countryside, to luxury villas with pools and breath-taking coastal views. 

Solmar has built a loyal customer base. Many of our clients use Solmar year after year and many of our new customers book our villas after recommendations from friends and family.

Whatever type of holiday you have in mind, whether its beach, sports or special interest, we will do everything possible to meet your requirements.

Our ATOL number is ATOL 10334 and as such any flight inclusive holidays booked with us are financially protected.

name: Holiday House Villa Ana 1, Pool
description: The villa Ana 1 is located in the small village of Cala Blanca near Ciutadella on the southwest coast of Menorca. The house is on a quiet street (one way street), which is mainly lined with individual houses.
neighborhood_overview:
Cala Blanca is a small beach (45 metres long and 140 metres wide), situated in the resort of the same name.

It is lies about 4 kilometers south of Ciutadella (5 minutes by car).

Facilities:

The beach has several beach-side bars and restaurants and childrens' water chutes.

There is also a small shopping area.

Nearby, at the other end in Cala Santandría, there is a dive centre.

Walking:

You can walk down the coast to Cap d'Artruix and Cala'n Bosch.
On a clear day, you can see the northern mountains of Mallorca on the horizon.

Cycling:

There is a well-developed cycle lane running down the length of the coastal road to Cala'n Bosch and north to Ciutadella.

Buses:

There are public buses between Ciutadella and Cala'n Bosch, stopping off at Cala Blanca.

Caves:

Cala Blanca has the notable Caves of Parella which have stagmites and stalac

name: Habitación Doble Deluxe en el corazón de Menorca
description:
Discover the true beauty of Menorca at Calma Hotel!

Decorated in the purest Menorcan style and located in the historic heart of Ciutadella, Calma Hotel is designed to give you a unique experience full of charm and authenticity. Every detail has been carefully selected for your comfort and pleasure.

Everything you want to explore is just a few steps away from our hotel. All the roads to tour the island start here, you just have to take one.

We're waiting for you!
neighborhood_overview:
Hotel Calma is located in the heart of Ciutadella de Menorca, a historical and cultural gem of the city, and offers an authentic Menorcan experience.

Being located in the center of the old town, it is surrounded by beautiful cobbled streets, historic buildings, picturesque squares, and even stately palaces.

Steps away are iconic landmarks such as the Cathedral of Santa Maria de Ciutadella, an impressive gothic-style architectural work.

The neighborhood also has a variety of local shops, restaurants and cafes, where visitors can enjoy the delicious Mediterranean gastronomy and buy local handmade products, both day and night.

In addition, this privileged location allows easy access to the main attractions of Ciutadella, such as the marina, where you can take boat trips and enjoy the spectacular views of the Mediterranean Sea.

The central neighborhood of Ciutadella de Menorca is a fascinating place where history, culture and modern

name: Fee4Me Menorca Ideal Apartment 700m from the Sea
description: Escape to Menorca and stay in our cosy flat in Arenal d'en Castell, just 700m from the sea. With 2 bedrooms, outdoor terrace and all the comforts to make you feel at home, it is the perfect place for your holiday. Enjoy sunset strolls on the beach and relax in peaceful surroundings. neighborhood_overview:
Arenal d'en Castell, located on the paradisiacal island of Menorca, is an exceptional destination known for its stunning turquoise bay and wide sandy beach, ideal for families and lovers of tranquility. This charming village is characterized by its relaxed atmosphere and the natural beauty that surrounds it, where the Mediterranean Sea plays a leading role.

Just a few steps from Arenal d'en Castell beach, the largest and among the most famous on the island of Menorca, you can find a variety of restaurants and cafes with terraces offering spectacular views, perfect for enjoying local and international cuisine while admiring the landscape. Leisure options include water activities such as snorkeling and kayaking, allowing visitors to explore the rich crystal-clear waters of the area.

The village also has access to trails and coastal paths that invite for long walks or bike rides, discovering hidden coves and panoramic views of the coast. Proximity to cultural points

name: Chalet TANGO, Cap D'Artutx Minorca
description:
The chalet, completely renovated in 2023, was built following the typical Minorcan style. It is located within the SolMar complex located a short walk from the Cap D'Artutx promenade where you can enjoy pleasant walks along the coast while admiring the magnificent sunset of the far west of the island.
It consists of two double bedrooms, living room, kitchen, bathroom with shower, patio and private garden. Facing northeast
It has been thoughtfully furnished and equipped with every comfort.
neighborhood_overview: Cap D'Artutx is 1.5 km from Cala en Bosch in urbanization full of hotels and residences, with a marina and the lighthouse (Cap D’Artrutx). Blue flag beach of white sand 90 meters wide, at the bottom of a deep cove with crystal clear waters. Equipped with sun loungers and umbrellas for rent, toilets and showers, market, bars and restaurants, lifeguard, bus stop, park free. From the beach you can walk along the ancient coastal path “Camì de Cavalls”, created in 1330 to connect the watchtowers and that you can still walk, horseback or mountainbike along the remaining 185km, divided into 20 itineraries. There are several horseback riding schools that organize excursions along the Camì.
host_about: Bolzanina di nascita, rapita dall'isola magica nell'isola magica.

name: Apartamento con vistas al mar en Fornells
description:
Flat with sea views in Fornells, Menorca.

Enjoy a unique stay in this charming duplex flat overlooking the bay of Fornells. Located on the picturesque seafront promenade, this cosy accommodation offers an unbeatable location, perfect for exploring the natural beauty of Menorca.
neighborhood_overview: Fornells is a small fishing village in the north of Menorca located in the bay of the same name, a small hamlet of the town of Mercadal that arose from the suburb that was formed in the vicinity of the Castle of San Antonio. Historically it has been a strategic location in the defence of the natural port of Fornells, a good proof of this are the military structures that it houses and can still be visited, such as the Tower of Fornells, the largest defensive watchtower on the island.

host_about:
*IMPORANT* - In order to access your villa directions and key collection information, you will need to log-in to the Solmar Villas website. Information on how to do this will be emailed to you once your booking is confirmed. Please note that we will contact you post booking via our Villa Concierge Team in order for you to provide your Advanced Passenger Information. This includes all passenger names, dates of birth, passport details and your flight details, which is required by local authorities.

Solmar Villas is a family run business with over 29 years of experience in arranging high quality, tailor made villa holidays. We pride ourselves in providing the highest quality prompt and personalised service to all our clients - with Solmar Villas, you are in safe hands.

We specialise in providing the very finest villas for perfect villa holidays.

All our villas are carefully chosen and approved by our staff - we select only the highest quality villas in the finest resorts and regions of mainland Spain as well as the Balearics  and Canary Islands, Portugal, Greek Islands,  Cyprus and Croatia.

Our selection of villas include a wide range of properties from traditional style houses offering peace and privacy in the countryside, to luxury villas with pools and breath-taking coastal views. 

Solmar has built a loyal customer base. Many of our clients use Solmar year after year and many of our new customers book our villas after recommendations from friends and family.

Whatever type of holiday you have in mind, whether its beach, sports or special interest, we will do everything possible to meet your requirements.

Our ATOL number is ATOL 10334 and as such any flight inclusive holidays booked with us are financially protected.

name: Charming old town home with terrace.
description: Discover Menurka–Santa Clara, your urban getaway in the heart of Ciutadella: a 220 m² house for 8 guests, located between the Santa Clara convent and Ses Voltes; 4 bedrooms, 2 full bathrooms and a guest toilet, equipped kitchen, living-dining room, terrace with jacuzzi and barbecue area; basement with gym and massage table. Just 1 km from the beach and close to shops, restaurants, and historic sites. Wi‑Fi, air conditioning, and parking included. Ideal for families and groups. Welcome!
neighborhood_overview:
The old town of Ciutadella concentrates a great historical interest. At first glance, there is a difference with the new part of the city, the one that has been built after the demolition of the walls that surrounded Ciutadella until the last century surrounded Ciutadella. What is known today as Contramurada, a wide walk that surrounds the old city, points to the perimeter of old Ciutadella.
The street of Ses Voltes (the arches or arches), probably the most characteristic of the entire island, is home to a large number of shops, from traditional overseas, to modern boutiques, to footwear shops, souvenirs, etc. Other streets of the old town with great commercial atmosphere are Maó, Sa's Carnisseria, Santa Clara, and the Plaza de España.

Points of interest for the tourist are the Diocesan Museum (Calle del Seminario), the Municipal Museum of the Bastion of Sa Font, the convent of light nuns of Santa Clara, and of course the Cathedral of Menorca, a unique building for it
host_about:
Soy natural de Ciutadella de Menorca y he vivido siempre en Menorca. Aunque mi pasión era el futbol, de joven ya me dedique a ayudar a mis padres en un pequeño hostal familiar situado también en Ciutadella. De ahí ya cursé los estudios de turismo y pasé a trabajar en el hostal de mis padres, así como también en el alquiler de dos villas turísticas que mi familia tiene en primera línea de mar aquí en la isla de Menorca.
A parte de tener una considerable experiencia en el sector turístico y sentir una profunda vocación de servicio para los visitantes de la isla, también me gusta pescar, bucear, hacer windsurf así como ir en bici por el 'Cami de Cavalls'.
Actualmente estoy casado, y es mi mujer Sulay, la que me ayuda en el alquiler de la casa.

name: Atico-Duplex al lado de playa con piscina y wifi
description: BEAUTIFUL DUPLEX PENTHOUSE WITH TWO LARGE TERRACES, ON  TWO FLOORS, OCEAN VIEWS AND SPECTACULAR POOL, SURROUNDED BY TREES. Located a 4-minute walk from the beach. Sleeps 4, Great for couples, families. Area surrounded by trees and nature with stunning sunsets.  Very cozy decoration, even on the terrace, Teka wooden furniture, BBQ, sun loungers. Very close to the beautiful town of Ciutadella. There are restaurants and supermarkets.
neighborhood_overview:
The Atico area is located is a chalet area, and some hotels, and mostly no more than three floors. It has very close to supermarkets, a regular bus line, bars,restaurants and in addition to Santandría beach, which is a few meters away, you can also go for a walk to other coves such as: Sa Caleta, Cala Blanca.
And if you want a beautiful Historic City, you will be 5 minutes in car from Ciutadella. You can also go by bus. The stop is a few meters.
host_about:
Hola, soy Elena, de profesión arquitecto y me gusta viajar y preparar el viaje, relacionarme con la gente procurando  enriquecerme todo lo que pueda. También me gusta el cine, cocinar recetas especiales para compartir con mis amigos, salir a tomar unas cervezas en buena compañía, leer un buen libro en un espacio agradable, rodearme de cosas bellas.
Hay dos frases que me encantan:
"La vida sonríe a los que sonríen" y "La juventud es una cualidad, quien la tiene nunca la pierde".
Estaré encantada de conocerte.

Relax with the whole family at this peaceful place to stay, 100 meters from Calan Bosch beach and 700 meters from Cala Xoringuer beach, both with crystal clear waters. The community area has a large saltwater pool and a special area for children with a large garden area.
Living-dining room with air conditioning, kitchen, two bedrooms with ceiling fans, bathroom, interior patio with washing machine, porch directly to the garden with furniture.

name: Modern renovated country house near Binidali beach
description: "Son Martorell" is a rustic estate, very well located and with total privacy. The house, from 1886, has been renovated by IDEARCH Studio, respecting traditional Menorcan architecture and updating it for modern comfort. A unique experience in the Menorcan countryside, 5 min from south coast beaches and the airport. Ideal for families and friends, for holidays or remote work.
neighborhood_overview: The property is very close to San Clemente, a small town that has restaurants, supermarkets, ATMs, a pharmacy, playgrounds, etc.
host_about: Casada con un alemán. Juntos creamos  nuestro propio empresa, brindando calidad  a quienes quieren explorar la isla. Somos fans de los viajes y el arte: él captura momentos con su cámara, yo los pinto. Encontrando la felicidad en cada rincón. Nos encanta tomar sol, las playas  y disfrutar de la rica gastronomía local. Nuestra vida es una mezcla de risas, creatividad y puro amor por Menorca. ¡Bienvenidos a nuestra aventura algo loca!

host_about:
*IMPORANT* - In order to access your villa directions and key collection information, you will need to log-in to the Solmar Villas website. Information on how to do this will be emailed to you once your booking is confirmed. Please note that we will contact you post booking via our Villa Concierge Team in order for you to provide your Advanced Passenger Information. This includes all passenger names, dates of birth, passport details and your flight details, which is required by local authorities.

Solmar Villas is a family run business with over 29 years of experience in arranging high quality, tailor made villa holidays. We pride ourselves in providing the highest quality prompt and personalised service to all our clients - with Solmar Villas, you are in safe hands.

We specialise in providing the very finest villas for perfect villa holidays.

All our villas are carefully chosen and approved by our staff - we select only the highest quality villas in the finest resorts and regions of mainland Spain as well as the Balearics  and Canary Islands, Portugal, Greek Islands,  Cyprus and Croatia.

Our selection of villas include a wide range of properties from traditional style houses offering peace and privacy in the countryside, to luxury villas with pools and breath-taking coastal views. 

Solmar has built a loyal customer base. Many of our clients use Solmar year after year and many of our new customers book our villas after recommendations from friends and family.

Whatever type of holiday you have in mind, whether its beach, sports or special interest, we will do everything possible to meet your requirements.

name: Villa Estrella - Canutells
description: Villa “Estrella”, a house that combines luxury, comfort and design, is the ideal option for the most demanding. It is an elegant and stylish villa with pure materials and bright open spaces. It has a very complete equipment, air conditioning not only in the bedrooms but also in the beautiful living/dining room, Led lighting that creates a relaxed and exquisite ambience, and of course a large flat screen television with internet connection.
neighborhood_overview:
It is located at the small beach of Canutells, a traditional place where Menorcans used to spend their summer, where this special structure and flair of the authentic Menorcan coast has been formed, where children run free, neighbours have known each other for a lifetime, the few bars and restaurants have this special and authentic air. The beach is about 6 minute walk from the house.
About 5 minute drive away is the small town of Sant Climent and the capital of Menorca, Maó, less than 10 kilometers, making it easy and convenient to enjoy its wide gastronomic, commercial and above all cultural offer. The port with its great variety of bars, restaurants, exclusive shops and nautical life, the centre with its art galleries, markets, theatre etc. You will surely visit Maó more than once.

description:
Welcome to maeva's home!
30 sqm
neighborhood_overview:
Authentic and wild, Menorca is a singular island in the Balearics. For many years, locals have struggled to preserve its unique ecosystem and culture many millennia. A trip to Menorca always surprises, with the colors first that go from blue to turquoise, from green to emerald, from blond to white. Then by its good life, its languisher and the almost unreal beauty of its coastline.



During this stopover at the Balearic Islands, you will first discover a rich historical and archaeological heritage in Ciutadella, Mahon or in the ancient Talaytic cities of the island. You will then hike along the coastline to discover the sublime coves that sculpt the Minorcan coasts. After stinging a head at the Cala Macarella, you will cross the island to reach the natural park of S 'Albufera des Grau, a paradise of wildlife.



Finally, you will not miss the unforgettable sunsets offered by the most surprising island of the Balearic Islands. It's time for y
host_about: Ce logement est géré par un professionnel local (une agence immobilière ou une résidence de tourisme) et commercialisé par maeva, spécialiste de la location saisonnière depuis plus de 20 ans. Dès votre arrivée sur place, l'accueil local vous remettra les clés et restera votre interlocuteur privilégié et dédié tout au long de votre séjour. Toutes les informations sur votre arrivée et les modalités du séjour vous parviendront dans la semaine précédent votre arrivée. Nous vous rappelons vivement, qu'il est impératif de contacter l'accueil local avant votre arrivée, afin de bien préparer votre séjour. Toute l'équipe maeva vous souhaite de bonnes vacances tout sourire !

The house is located in the Menorcan countryside on one of the most beautiful roads on the island. The Cami d'en Kane. A 5-minute drive away is the town of Alaior where you ca find supermarkets, restaurants, pharmacies, etc.
It is a short drive from the southern or northern beaches.
host_about:
Hello!
I am  Katrina. I'am living in Menorca for 35 years now and love the island.
 Menorca offers many things to do. beaches, excursions, archaeological monuments etc ... 
I'am working in the german consulate and also have a maintance company .
 My daughter Julia lives in Munich and she also help me in summer to rent the properties

name: Villa Cristina by Escape Home
description:
Access from two streets, from Carrer de S'espigol and from Carrer des Pins. A few metres away there are bars, restaurants, supermarkets, pharmacies and the sandy beach of Cala Blanca with its sunsets.
The house has a tourist licence for 4 people and consists of 150m2 of construction.
Its exterior consists of a private pool with an outdoor shower with a built-in barbecue and a beautiful covered terrace with comfortable sofas to spend pleasant summer evenings.
host_about:
Escape Home es la marca bajo la que World2Meet, la división de viajes del Grupo Iberostar, opera la plataforma de alquiler vacacional de Villas y Apartamentos. Es nuestra plataforma de crecimiento y marco de inspiración para alcanzar el liderazgo.

Todos nuestros alojamientos están cuidadosamente seleccionados por nuestros expertos en Islas Baleares, Canarias y Algarve. Gracias a la gestión integral garantizamos que todas las propiedades cumplen con las normativas vigentes y los estándares de limpieza e higiene, así como las normativas y desinfecciones en lo relativo a COVID-19.

Ofrecemos un servicio de calidad, profesional y cercano tanto a los propietarios como a los huéspedes para hacer de este proceso una experiencia única. Nuestra misión es hacerle sentir como en casa. Soñamos, como tú, con tus vacaciones y nada nos supone mayor recompensa que tu reconocimiento a nuestro empeño.

name: Great Villa for 10 near to Ciutadella
description: Villa Noka is a 5 double bedroom villa with bathroom ensuite in all rooms. there's a nice swimming pool and garden . Ideal for big families and  group of friends who want to enjoy their holiday together with the privacy and comfortableness of having a bathroom for two. Located in Cala blanes , a family and touristic resort with restaurants, bars and also an aquapark for the youngests of the family! From 01/10 to 30/04 is low season. Therefore most restaurants are closed.
neighborhood_overview: Villa Noka is located in a residential and tourist development. From May to October there are many restaurants, shops, supermarkets, and a pharmacy, all within a 10-minute walk of the villa. As of October 31, most restaurants and shops are closed, but a 5-minute drive to Ciutadella where you can find what you need. During the low season months, you can enjoy the area's tranquility and take in the island's nearby coves and beaches without the typical high season tourist influx. You can see the island in its purest state!
host_about: Soy una persona entusiasta y extrovertida, me preocupo mucho por el bienestar de nuestros huéspedes. Soy atenta, estudio turismo y me gusta trabajar con la gente. También amo viajar y descubrir, conocer y experimentar nuevas culturas costumbres y tradiciones. Estaremos encantados de tenerlos como invitados. No duden en contactar con nosotros si tienen algún problema o ante cualquier duda  o aclaración.

name: Sa Raconada Menorca
description:
Cozy family home located in a quiet residential area, near the beach, shops, and restaurants.

Sa Raconada offers space for 5 guests, distributed over two floors. On the ground floor you will find a perfectly equipped kitchen, nice living room with TV, and a bathroom. The first floor has 3 bedrooms, two double and a single and a full bathroom.

Outside, it has a covered terrace for outdoor dining, a nice garden and private pool.
neighborhood_overview:
The neighborhood that surrounds Sa Raconada is quiet and residential. It is located in a dead end street, so there is very little traffic.
At 50m approx. There is a playground, with a soccer field, basketball and a swing area for the little ones.
At 100m approx. They have a supermarket, cafes and restaurants.
Los Delfines is another urbanization that is close to the house, about 500m. There you will find a water park, shopping center, and a wide variety of restaurants and entertainment venues.

Places of interest. Distances are expressed in round numbers.
Cala'n Brut - 0.4 mi / 0.6 km - rock (stones) area adapted for swimming
Cala'n Blanes - 0.4 mi / 0.6 km - sandy beach
Virgin beach La Vall: 7.5mi / 12km
Cales Piques - 0.9 mi / 1.4 km - sandy beach
Aqua Center Water Park - 0.7 mi / 1.1 km
Torre del Ram Racecourse - 1 mi / 1.6 km
Cap de Banyos Bufador - 1 mi / 1.7 km
Ciutadella Lighthouse: 2 km
Port of Ciutadella de
host_about:
Estaremos encantados de alojaros en Sa Raconada. Los viajeros han destacado de nuestra casa su buena vibra y su encantador jardín. Cuidamos cada detalle para que os sintáis como en casa.  

Además, nos encanta conocer las inquietudes de los viajeros, para poder ayudar recomendando actividades, lugares y experiencias que se pueden vivir en esta maravillosa isla.

name: 11- Private building with pool & sauna
description: Enjoy an unforgettable vacation in a modern, newly renovated apartment located in the heart of the area! Relax with all the amenities, a pool, and access to three charming coves ideal for swimming. Just 3 km from the iconic Ciutadella, the former capital of Menorca. Ideal for unwinding and enjoying the Menorcan paradise.
neighborhood_overview:
Discover your exclusive corner of paradise!

Welcome to our small complex of luxury apartments, recently renovated to offer you a unique experience of relaxation, style, and comfort. Located in the heart of a charming residential area, you'll be surrounded by restaurants, bars, shops, supermarkets, and even a water park, all within easy reach.

Enjoy our private pool, exclusively for our guests: a tranquil oasis where you can relax after a day of exploring.

Just 3 km away is Ciutadella, the ancient capital of Menorca, with its historic charm, romantic ports, and vibrant cultural life.

Explore three crystal-clear coves just steps from the complex, ideal for sunbathing, swimming, or simply unwinding. Want more? You're just a few kilometers from nearly 60 unique beaches, from the most accessible to those hidden away waiting to be discovered by the most adventurous.

Your perfect getaway awaits. Luxury, location, and nature... all in one
host_about:
La Familia Templa no sólo anfitriona apartamentos turísticos con encanto.

Cada uno de los miembros ha heredado el amor por la hospitalidad, las mejores recomendaciones "fuera del radar" y la pasión por los rincones más auténticos de España.

Siempre sabrás que estuviste en casa de la Familia Templa porque te marcharás con el alma llena y el corazón ligero.

name: Beautiful apartment overlooking the sea
description: Bright, comfortable and elegant. neighborhood_overview:
All basic services (supermarkets, pharmacy, restaurants, etc.) are at short pedestrian distances.
The beach is a five minute walk away; there are bars and restaurants nearby for different budgets. My favourite restaurant is El Mirador, which is about 300 m from the pool. The White's bar is my favourite bar for its lively atmosphere and great cocktails. They also serve meals.
host_about:
Menorca ha sido desde siempre el lugar de veraneo de mi familia. Adoramos la isla y nuestro apartamento, que he decorado con mucho mimo. Me gustan los espacios límpidos, funcionales y armónicos con el entorno, con detalles decorativos que tengan alguna resonancia intelectual, artística o un especial encanto para mí. 
Además de confort, mi idea es brindar a mis huéspedes bienestar espiritual. Las vistas al mar, la luminosidad, el porche y los jardines de la urbanización contribuyen a ello.

name: Apartamento 2 dormitorios (5 adultos)
description: Son Triay has been a Menorcan agritourism since 1995. The estate of 126 hectares of labor fields, pastures, forests and a wide swimming pool, is located in a rural environment between the village of Ferrerias and the Urbanization of Cala Galdana.A about 10km numerous virgin beaches, such as Cala Mitjana and Cala Macarella. Reception hours are from 9 am to 2 pm and from 4 pm to 8 pm. The port city of Ciudadela is located 30 minutes by car, from where ferries depart to Barcelona and Alcúdia (Mallorca)
neighborhood_overview:
Cala Mitjana is a small virgin cove south of Menorca. Its blue waters and its central location on the island, next to Cala Galdana, make it recommended and accessible to everyone.
Cala Macarella is one of the most famous coves in Menorca. Their postcards are the most typical and well-known on the island, thanks to the turquoise color of its waters and the sailboats that dock nearby. Near Macarella is Macarelleta, a smaller cove and where nudism prolifers. You can walk from one to the other in less than 10 minutes.
The "Cave of Xoroi" is a cave located on a cliff on the south coast of the island, in the urbanization of Cala Porter. It works as a music bar for the day and a nightclub at night.
Binibeca is a small fishing village located about 8 kilometers south of Mahón, in the municipality of San Luis. Its labyrinthine streets and whitewashed houses make it one of the most beautiful villages in Menorca.
Puerto de Ciutadella en Menorca has ferry trips to Alcúdia & Ba
host_about:
Son Triay es un agroturismo menorquín desde 1995. La finca se encuentra ubicada en un entorno rural entre el pueblo de Ferrerias y la Urbanización de Cala Galdana . A unos 10 km del establecimiento encontrará numerosas playas vírgenes, como Cala Mitjana y Cala Macarella. La ciudad portuaria de Ciudadela está situada a 30 minutos en coche, desde donde salen ferris hacia Barcelona y Alcúdia (Mallorca).

Llevamos más de 20 años al servicio de los clientes, ofreciendo habitaciones dobles, apartamentos y villas totalmente equipadas para satisfacer las necesidades de cada cliente. Es una finca ideal con 126 hectáreas de campos de labor, pastos, bosques y una amplia piscina para parejas, familias y grupos que deseen pasar unos días de tranquilidad en Menorca.

Son Triay es un lugar ideal para celebraciones y eventos especiales en un entorno totalmente agrícola con una gran piscina, jardín y todas las comodidades para unas vacaciones ideales en el campo.

host_about:
Hello, in Homerti we are a group of people who are dedicated to managing reservation services in order to give property owners the chance to rent their property. 

Thanks to us, lots of private property owners are able to offer a good service to their clients who rent their properties, which would not be possible without us as many owners lack the necessary know-how .

How can I describe best my team? Well, we are dynamic and active, we speak several languages and do our best to manage your renting so you have a satisfactory stay. 

Besides, I would like to tell you that we visit and check all of our properties on our own. Furthermore, we are there for you in situ and are happy to assist you with all doubts you may have. 

Homerti is your home!,  do you enter?

Hola,  en Homerti somos un grupo de personas que nos dedicamos a gestionar el servicio de reservas para los pequeños propietarios que quieren alquilar sus casas y no pueden encargarse de realizar este trabajo!.
Gracias a nosotros, pequeños propietarios pueden dar un buen servicio a los huéspedes que quieren alquilar sus propiedades. 
¿Cómo puedo describir de mejora manera nuestro equipo? Pues somos gente joven, dinámica y activa, y nos dedicamos a gestionar su alquiler para que su estancia sea totalmente satisfactoria.
Es muy importante señalar que visitamos y revisamos todas las propiedades a las que realizamos alquileres. Además le atenderemos en destino para cualquier duda que pueda surgir.
Homerti es tu casa! ¿Entras?

name: Charmante villa avec vue spectaculaire sur la mer
description:
Villa with 4 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms, large private pool, A/C, Wifi
This charming villa is facing south. The living room, dining room, twin bedrooms and master bedroom all have beautiful sea views. It has an enviable location, very popular with families and couples looking for a relaxing holiday. It is located 10 minutes walk from the famous white village, restaurants, bars and supermarkets and the sandy beach of Binibeca.
neighborhood_overview: The picturesque fishing village of Binibeca is just an 8-minute walk from the villa. You'll discover restaurants, cafes, tapas bars, souvenir shops, an ice cream parlour, ATM, and a supermarket. Sports facilities include a diving center, tennis, football, and basketball with a children's playground. There is a lovely little train on the road between Binibeca and Punta Prima (which is really useful if you do not rent a car) during the summer months. The village of Sant Lluis is about 10 minutes away by car or bus, with a selection of banks, shops and cafes. If you need medical assistance, a new hospital is 15 minutes away by car or taxi. The cosmopolitan port of Mahon is a 20-minute drive with its maritime life, many restaurants along the docks, cafes, bars, and designer shops. Stroll along the harbor and admire the stunning yachts and cruise ships.

name: Seafront apartment with fab sunset views, Fornells
description:
**Consell insula de Menorca Tourist Licence Approved** ET 2758 ME

A privately loved, sea-facing apartment set amidst the landscaped gardens of Platges de Fornells.
With 2 bedrooms & living area, it's an ideal accommodation to relax in by the sea.
This simply furnished home allows you the opportunity to watch the sunset over Cala Tirant bay&hear the sea 24/7.
Close walking distance to beach,pool,waterpark,shops,bars&restaurants. Equipped with self-catering essentials.
neighborhood_overview:
Playas de Fornells (Platges de Fornells) is a self contained designer holiday village which is relatively quiet as non residents do not tend to visit the area. There is a small rock beach next to the apartment (jelly / water shoes recommended) and a gorgeous natural beach at the end of the bay ( Cala Tirant ) which is very safe for families and clear waters make snorkeling a must!
There is also a pool near Okapi Bar that you can use, it is a 7 to 10 minute walk.
Be prepared to totally chill out here, this is NOT a party place.
The villages are set in collections on the hill sides overlooking the bay with communal pools and gardens.
Shops, bars and restaurants on site give easy options to eat in or out, and are only a short walk away. There are also several supermarkets in walking distance.
The local fishing village of Fornells is close, and here you can go scuba diving, hire kayaks, book day trip catamarans, shop and enjoy lovely restaurants and local artis
neighbourhood: Platges de Fornells, Illes Balears, Spain

host_about:
*IMPORANT* - In order to access your villa directions and key collection information, you will need to log-in to the Solmar Villas website. Information on how to do this will be emailed to you once your booking is confirmed. Please note that we will contact you post booking via our Villa Concierge Team in order for you to provide your Advanced Passenger Information. This includes all passenger names, dates of birth, passport details and your flight details, which is required by local authorities.

Solmar Villas is a family run business with over 29 years of experience in arranging high quality, tailor made villa holidays. We pride ourselves in providing the highest quality prompt and personalised service to all our clients - with Solmar Villas, you are in safe hands.

We specialise in providing the very finest villas for perfect villa holidays.

All our villas are carefully chosen and approved by our staff - we select only the highest quality villas in the finest resorts and regions of mainland Spain as well as the Balearics  and Canary Islands, Portugal, Greek Islands,  Cyprus and Croatia.

Our selection of villas include a wide range of properties from traditional style houses offering peace and privacy in the countryside, to luxury villas with pools and breath-taking coastal views. 

Solmar has built a loyal customer base. Many of our clients use Solmar year after year and many of our new customers book our villas after recommendations from friends and family.

Whatever type of holiday you have in mind, whether its beach, sports or special interest, we will do everything possible to meet your requirements.

Our ATOL number is ATOL 10334 and as such any flight inclusive holidays booked with us are financially protected.

name: Villa Vista Alegre - Cala Galdana
description: “Vista Alegre” is the twin of Villa “Acantilado”. Both houses are practically identical, both welcome you with a first-class atmosphere and services, and turn your vacation into a real dream. They have four double bedrooms each, three with single beds and one with a double bed, and three bathrooms, two with a shower and one with a bathtub.
neighborhood_overview: As for the area, the house is connected to the rest of the resort by a "secret" staircase that leads down to the beach. This way you get to sea level directly and in no time, if you want to swim in the sea or continue walking towards the shops and restaurants. This detail makes it the ideal location, quiet and well connected. A stage of the now famous “Camí de Cavalls”, one of the most beautiful sections, through the pine forests to Cala Mitjana and then to Cala Trebaluger, begins practically in front of the house. For those who like to hike or prefer the virgin beaches, a paradise, a walk recommended in every season, as it is a path protected by the vegetation.

description:

You will have everything within walking distance in this accommodation located in the heart of the old town, on one of the most emblematic streets of Ciutadella, 100m from the cathedral.
Surrounded by all kinds of services and leisure.
Charming house, with details of typical Menorcan architecture, such as the marés and marés walls.
Ideal for a vacation with families.
It has 3 bedrooms with air conditioning in each one, 1 bathroom and toilet.
host_about: Agencia inmobiliaria en Ciutadella desde el año 2003.

name: Luxury studio with private pool
description: Independent studio part of a set of three buildings. Below the main house you will discover our studio on the ground floor on the swimming pool with its hammam, its swimming pool and its bathroom. Magnificent place set back from the house built on the edge of the canyon. Not overlooked, totally private, the view of the canyon is spectacular. The swimming pool is an integral part of the studio and is not shared with any other traveler. The beach is a 5 minute walk away.
neighborhood_overview: Just outside the house you will find a small dirt road that goes directly down to Binisafua Beach (5-minute walk). Ideal for children and for swimming, this small cove is absolutely charming both for its tranquility and for the color of its turquoise water. This beach is also the starting point for hiking or canoeing to both the east and west.   Below the house you will find two restaurants, a cafeteria/pizzeria and El Txoko, a very good Menorcan restaurant.
host_about: I am 57, Sales manager, married,  two kids (28 and 26), french, born in Paris, lived in Australia (Sydney) for more than 6 years. Well travel, love people, food and pleasure in general.

name: Apartamento 1 dormitorio en Cap d´Artrutx
description:
The apartment has a living area with a flat screen TV and a kitchen area with a microwave, fridge, toaster, ketle, coffee maker, etc.
It has 1 bedroom with 1 double bed and 1 bathroom.
Apartment 105 offers views of the pool and park.
The complex has a large garden and shared pool
neighborhood_overview:
Located at the southwest end of the island, Cap d'Artrutx is a very peaceful enclave, although it is surrounded by an urbanisation.
On clear days, from the coast, you can see the silhouette of the southern part of Ciutadella, Ferreries and Es Mercadal.
The Lighthouse of Artrutx that gives name to the area, was built in 1858 and is 45 meters high. It is characterized by alternating black and white horizontal stripes, the lighthouse keeper's house and a courtyard enclosed by a stone wall. If the lighthouse itself is beautiful, the views from this place are spectacular. Especially at dusk.
The lighthouse has at its base, a very cozy bar and restaurant, ideal to hang out and watch the sunset

host_about:
Escape Home es la marca bajo la que World2Meet, la división de viajes del Grupo Iberostar, opera la plataforma de alquiler vacacional de Villas y Apartamentos. Es nuestra plataforma de crecimiento y marco de inspiración para alcanzar el liderazgo.

Todos nuestros alojamientos están cuidadosamente seleccionados por nuestros expertos en Islas Baleares, Canarias y Algarve. Gracias a la gestión integral garantizamos que todas las propiedades cumplen con las normativas vigentes y los estándares de limpieza e higiene, así como las normativas y desinfecciones en lo relativo a COVID-19.

Ofrecemos un servicio de calidad, profesional y cercano tanto a los propietarios como a los huéspedes para hacer de este proceso una experiencia única. Nuestra misión es hacerle sentir como en casa. Soñamos, como tú, con tus vacaciones y nada nos supone mayor recompensa que tu reconocimiento a nuestro empeño.
