name: Villa Sirena - Cap den Font
description: The joy of living!
neighborhood_overview:
Cap d'en Font is located on the south coast of Menorca, belonging to the municipality of Sant Lluís. Villas predominate in the area and there are no large hotels, so tourism in the area is calmer.
There is a swimming area with crystal-clear waters located less than 5 minutes walk from the house. Another attraction in the area is Caló Blanc, a small cove also located less than 5 minutes walk from the house.
The Camí de Cavalls, a natural route that borders the entire island along the coast, passes through the surroundings of the house, making Villa Sirena the perfect villa for those looking to take excursions in the area.
The closest restaurants are in Binissafuller, about 10 minutes walk from the house.
Menorca airport is located near the area.
host_about:

name: Hilltop villa with pool and stunning island views
description:
A much loved holiday home providing everything you need for a wonderful family holiday. The island of Menorca is itself one of the Mediterranean’s great holiday destinations and offers many special experiences.

Recent upgrading makes this one of the best villas in the area, coupled with a location that is second to none.

4 double bedrooms (sleeps 8)
2 shower rooms with walk in showers
private swimming pool
stunning views
unspoilt setting in National Park
not overlooked
neighborhood_overview: The villa is situated in a national park. The park is an idyllic haven for wildlife and we enjoy the most wonderful views over it inland towards Monte Toro, Menorca's highest point and to the sea and the fishing village of Es Grau. 10 minutes or so from the airport, Mahon, the capital and 5 minutes from the sea it is just the best location for a restful family holiday.
host_about:
Married father of 3 grown up girls. Company director in the financial sector but increasingly trying to find time for travel and leisure rather than work. We own our own holiday home in Menorca, Spain so understand the highs and lows of renting to guests.

Nicky, my wife is a dyslexia tutor and helps primary aged kids. We live in the countryside to the south of London. We have a great life based around home and the family. At home we have a large garden and paddock. Maisie is our Border Terrier and we have chickens to keep us supplied with fresh eggs. Pigs may be next!

While we are not averse to a bit of luxury when travelling we are practical and prefer the space of an apartment or house rental to the claustrophobia of a hotel room. We are keen walkers so whether in the country or the city we tend to get out and walk. Not so popular with taxi drivers!

In all respects we would like to think that as guests we are pretty much ideal. We respect other peoples property and know from our own experiences that while we may be renting somebody's flat or house we are really just borrowing it and should return it in the condition we found it.

host_about:
Escape Home es la marca bajo la que World2Meet, la división de viajes del Grupo Iberostar, opera la plataforma de alquiler vacacional de Villas y Apartamentos. Es nuestra plataforma de crecimiento y marco de inspiración para alcanzar el liderazgo.

Todos nuestros alojamientos están cuidadosamente seleccionados por nuestros expertos en Islas Baleares, Canarias y Algarve. Gracias a la gestión integral garantizamos que todas las propiedades cumplen con las normativas vigentes y los estándares de limpieza e higiene, así como las normativas y desinfecciones en lo relativo a COVID-19.

Ofrecemos un servicio de calidad, profesional y cercano tanto a los propietarios como a los huéspedes para hacer de este proceso una experiencia única. Nuestra misión es hacerle sentir como en casa. Soñamos, como tú, con tus vacaciones y nada nos supone mayor recompensa que tu reconocimiento a nuestro empeño.

name: Aure, Villa with pool and air conditioning!
description:
DISCOVER THE CHARM OF VILLA AURE

Menorca is a Mediterranean paradise, and Villa Aure is the perfect choice to enjoy it. With two double bedrooms, air conditioning, a fully equipped kitchen (even for paellas), and a cozy living room, it guarantees a comfortable stay. Relax in the large private pool and stay connected with free WiFi. Plus, enjoy the personalized attention of Miguel, your host in Menorca.
neighborhood_overview:
DISCOVER THE AREA – PRIVILEGED ENVIRONMENT IN CALA EN BOSCH / CAP D'ARTRUTX
The villa is located in Cap d'Artrutx, a quiet and residential area in the southwest of Menorca, perfect for those seeking comfort, services, and easy access to the main attractions of the island.

CAL EN BOSCH / CAP D'ARTRUTX – UNFORGETTABLE SUNSETS
This charming coastal spot is known for its iconic lighthouse, now converted into a restaurant and lookout point. It’s one of the best places in Menorca to enjoy a magical sunset over the sea, with views of Mallorca on clear days. Ideal for a romantic dinner or a relaxing stroll.

SON XORIGUER BEACH – NATURE AND ACTIVITIES
Just 5 minutes by car (or 15 minutes walking) from the villa, you’ll find this beautiful turquoise water beach. In the area, you’ll find:
• Diving, windsurfing, and sailing schools
• Kayak rentals
• Restaurants with sea views
• Family-friendly areas
Perfect for those who want to combine

name: SPA & Gym & Golf - Villa Marevilla
description:
Magnificent Villa of 300 m2 (3.230 ft2) on a 5.000 m2 (1,2 ac) isolated plot (tranquility assured) with SPA & Gym

Located next to Arenal Son Saura beach and the golf course

6 bdr (one of them is a separate flat), 6 complete bathrooms (5 en suite), huge living room, fully equipped kitchen and large terrace with sofas

Air conditioning and heating in all rooms

Heated private pool and separate kiddie pool

Tree house with slide and suspension bridge

Billiards, table tennis and foosball
neighborhood_overview:
Son Parc is a residential area located on the north coast of Menorca. It’s a perfect base to explore the island as it is halfway between Mahón and Ciudadela.

The beach of the area is called Arenal de Son Saura. It’s a beautiful white sand beach located in a bay (very calm waters), surrounded by pine trees and it has excellent facilities (restaurant, hammocks, showers and parking).

The only golf course in Menorca is located within the area of the property.

Tennis and paddle courts.

The villa is located at the end of a cul-de-sac (dead end street) at the top of a pine forest. This gives you beautiful views of the area and total tranquility (no car noise and out of sight of neighbors).

host_about:
*IMPORANT* - In order to access your villa directions and key collection information, you will need to log-in to the Solmar Villas website. Information on how to do this will be emailed to you once your booking is confirmed. Please note that we will contact you post booking via our Villa Concierge Team in order for you to provide your Advanced Passenger Information. This includes all passenger names, dates of birth, passport details and your flight details, which is required by local authorities.

Solmar Villas is a family run business with over 29 years of experience in arranging high quality, tailor made villa holidays. We pride ourselves in providing the highest quality prompt and personalised service to all our clients - with Solmar Villas, you are in safe hands.

We specialise in providing the very finest villas for perfect villa holidays.

All our villas are carefully chosen and approved by our staff - we select only the highest quality villas in the finest resorts and regions of mainland Spain as well as the Balearics  and Canary Islands, Portugal, Greek Islands,  Cyprus and Croatia.

Our selection of villas include a wide range of properties from traditional style houses offering peace and privacy in the countryside, to luxury villas with pools and breath-taking coastal views. 

Solmar has built a loyal customer base. Many of our clients use Solmar year after year and many of our new customers book our villas after recommendations from friends and family.

Whatever type of holiday you have in mind, whether its beach, sports or special interest, we will do everything possible to meet your requirements.

Our ATOL number is ATOL 10334 and as such any flight inclusive holidays booked with us are financially protected.

name: Villa con piscina privada a 200 metros de la playa
description:
Beautiful villa with a garden and private pool, distributed over 2 floors. The property is located in the Calan Brut (Calan Blanes) development in the municipality of Ciutadella, about 200 meters from the beach.

It is an ideal home for families with children who want to enjoy a pleasant vacation on the island and at the same time have a pleasant and relaxing stay in our villa.
Relax with the whole family!
neighborhood_overview:
It is located in an exclusive, safe and quiet area, 200 meters from the bus stop, 250 meters from the supermarket and just a 5-minute drive from downtown Ciutadella.
The white sand beach is also just 200 meters away and just 50 meters away there is a path that leads to the beach of “Calan Brut”, which is a cove without sand, where people go to the polished rock platforms that are on the rocks to sunbathe.
It is an ideal cove for people who do not like the sand of the beach so much and also for those who like to jump from the cliffs.

name: Villa en Son Bou con piscina y vistas al mar
description:
Villa with lots of privacy located in a quiet area of Son Bou with garden, private pool and outdoor shower.

On the upper terrace you can enjoy stunning views of the Son Bou coast and the sunset.

The large high-ceilinged living room and fully-equipped open kitchen have air conditioning.

The villa has three double bedrooms and two bathrooms. All three bedrooms have built-in closets and air conditioning.

Private street parking.
neighborhood_overview:
Son Bou is located on the south coast of Menorca, about 20 minutes drive from the airport and it has the longest beach on the island.
The resort, one of the largest on the island, is a mix of villas, apartments, and some hotels.
Water sports, a variety of restaurants and the long sandy beach with turquoise water, which is also part of the popular Cami de Cavalls, await you in Son Bou.
The beautiful town of Alaior is a 10-minute drive and offers many more amenities and lots of entertainment in the evenings.

name: Ideal para familias costa sur
description:
This chalet is ideal to come as a family to spend a vacation in Menorca. It is located in an ideal area, close to Mahon and the airport and, in turn, just a few minutes away from the best beaches in the island.

It is a secluded villa with land, with capacity for 6 people; it consists of three double bedrooms, an en-suite bathroom and other full bathroom, office, living-dining room and kitchen. It also has a porch with an ocean view where you can have breakfast, lunch or dinner.
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is on the south coast of Menorca in S'Algar. Small area belonging to the town of San Lluís, awarded on several occasions for its cleanliness, its relaxation, its good access and for how careful it is.
Also very important, one of the most prestigious dive centers on the island; as well as the virgin cove Rafalet and a 5 minute drive to such important and beautiful beaches as Binibeca, Punta Prima, etc.
A 15-minute walk away is Cala Alcaufar, with clear water and from where you can walk to Punta Prima on Camí de Cavalls.
Just a 20-minute drive, golfers have an 18 hole golf course.
Has all the necessary amenities for a good vacation. Amenities around bakery, press, car rental, a couple of bars, a couple of restaurants and a souvenir shop. In addition to landscaped areas and bus station.

name: Tastefully Restored House in Countryside with Pool
description:
Reconnect with nature in this restored “boera” loft-style farmhouse in the outskirts of Alaior, with vernacular architectural details but with all the modern commodities, including air conditioning. With many spaces to relax, it's perfect for a family or a group of friends.

There is a beautiful large pool and solarium which is part of an outdoor entertaining space. This includes a barbecue, a long table shaded by a pergola and lounge chairs for relaxing in total comfort.
neighborhood_overview: The house is in the middle of the beautiful rustic Menorcan countryside, close to the small and non-touristic island town of Alaior. We are 12 minutes driving from the longest sandy beach of Son Bou. Being in the middle of the island, everything is within a short drive in either direction.

name: Villa Fina
description:
Set of four villas located just meters from Cala Blanca Beach.

Each consists of two floors: on the ground floor it consists of living-dining room, kitchen, full bathroom and a double room. On the second floor there are two double rooms with access to the outdoor terrace and a full bathroom.

Each villa has a swimming pool, with a beautiful garden, outdoor terrace and barbecue. It has an outdoor shower and sunbeds to relax and enjoy the sun of Menorca.
neighborhood_overview:
Cala Blanca is a very quiet residential area where we can enjoy the beach and the different restaurants that surround it. Miramar and Hello Ola are the most popular. In the first we can enjoy Menorcan cuisine and in the second of some delicious cocktails accompanied by the best sunset and sun.

In this area we also find the "horse trail", to be more specific, stage 11, which takes us to Cap d'Artrutx or Ciutadella.

neighborhood_overview: Located only 20 minutes’ drive from the capital of Mahon, in the relaxed seaside resort of Punta Prima, popular with families and couples alike. Offering great views of the Isle Del Aire just off the coast, the wide beach has soft sand and shallow waters. A promenade runs alongside the sandy shores, with some great restaurants overlooking the sea. Walkers can easily join the Cami des Cavalls bridle path, which circumnavigates the whole island and offers spectacular scenery.

host_about:
Escape Home es la marca bajo la que World2Meet, la división de viajes del Grupo Iberostar, opera la plataforma de alquiler vacacional de Villas y Apartamentos. Es nuestra plataforma de crecimiento y marco de inspiración para alcanzar el liderazgo.

Todos nuestros alojamientos están cuidadosamente seleccionados por nuestros expertos en Islas Baleares, Canarias y Algarve. Gracias a la gestión integral garantizamos que todas las propiedades cumplen con las normativas vigentes y los estándares de limpieza e higiene, así como las normativas y desinfecciones en lo relativo a COVID-19.

Ofrecemos un servicio de calidad, profesional y cercano tanto a los propietarios como a los huéspedes para hacer de este proceso una experiencia única. Nuestra misión es hacerle sentir como en casa. Soñamos, como tú, con tus vacaciones y nada nos supone mayor recompensa que tu reconocimiento a nuestro empeño.

name: Modern and comfortable house near the sea
description:
Magnificent luxury semi-detached house located in a well-kept residential area 50 meters from the sea and 300 meters from the center of the town of Fornells.

The ground floor consists of a large living-dining room, fully equipped kitchen, courtesy toilet and access to the large front and rear terraces.

On the first floor there are three double bedrooms and two bathrooms (one of them en-suite).

On the top floor there is a solarium, outdoor shadowed dining area, barbecue area and a chill-out with views over the bay of Fornells.

The large private garage with capacity for two cars.

The house is in perfect condition, fully equipped and furnished with high quality elements.

Air conditionnig in the living-dinning romm and in all the bedrooms. Free wi-fi internet access.



Amenities: Washing Machine, Dishwasher, double bed, TV, Balcony, Terrace, Kitchen, oven, microwave, toaster, fridge / freezer, internet
neighborhood_overview:
Fornells is one of the most exclusive and charming holiday destinations in the Mediterranean, a small fishing village located on the north coast of Menorca where the landscape has the highest level of protection in the EU.

The town of Fornells is made up of a wonderful historic center next to the port with its charming pedestrian streets, a beautiful promenade and well-kept residential areas around the center.

In Fornells you will find the best offer of activities. Boat trips, scuba diving, kayaking, boat rentals, windsurfing, hiking and many more for companies with great experience.

Fornells offers a varied gastronomic offer including three of the best restaurants in Menorca with its famous lobster, fresh fish and other surprising dishes.

You can enjoy the incredible waters of the Bay of Fornells in its protected swimming areas in the sea and you can easily go to the best beaches of Menorca.

In Fornells you can walk around the tow

En SOM Menorca, fundada en 1990, encontrará la mejor selección de casas y apartamentos para que disfrute sus vacaciones en Menorca. 

En SOM Menorca fomentamos hábitos, actitudes y comportamientos en favor del respeto por el medio ambiente, la lucha contra el cambio climático y una mejor conservación del ecosistema menorquín. Asimismo, apoyamos el comercio de proximidad y defendemos las tradiciones y la cultura menorquina

name: Villa con jardín, piscina y bosque privado
description:
La Malindina

Charming country house located in the northeast of Menorca, with countryside views, garden and private pool, very nice and quiet.
A perfect rural oasis to enjoy with the family the beautiful beaches of the north.
neighborhood_overview: Quiet and reserved area
host_about:
Estimados viajeros,

Mi nombre es Ana, soy una joven que reparte su tiempo entre Barcelona y esta maravillosa isla.

Veraneo desde mi infancia en Menorca y con recuerdos de esta casa desde que tengo uso de razón.

name: Suite Room in Boutique Hotel
description: We have rehabilitated one of the most beautiful houses in the Countermurada de Ciutadella to create a boutique hotel with character, where the solidity of a current and cosmopolitan style coexist in harmony with the warmth of a welcoming and familiar environment. In each of the six rooms with private outdoor space you can breathe comfort and well-being.
neighborhood_overview:
Old Town
Don't follow any routes. Get lost without a rush because of the beautiful network of streets of Arab and medieval origin that make up the old town of Ciutadella and its commercial core. Look up and down so as not to miss any details of the stately buildings, the cathedral, the churches and the monuments that you will find during your walks; watch with curiosity how the day goes by in the market, in the squares and in the bars of the city, and immerse yourself in the quiet life of its inhabitants.
Essential
Do not leave Menorca without hiking the Camí de Cavalls that surrounds the entire perimeter of the island; without getting lost in one of the most unique and magical spaces such as the old quarries of S’Hostal; without knowing our rich and exceptional prehistoric heritage; without visiting one of the coastal lighthouses and marveling at discovering that the sea has no end; without savoring the rich gastronomy and discovering local craftsmanship... without feel
neighbourhood: Ciutadella de Menorca, Illes Balears, Spain

name: Sa Caseta Nova - Biniancolla
description:
Now with air conditioning in both bedrooms! More comfort for the hot summer nights.
A small house by the sea, without haste, without stress. With its own garden, a few plants, a little bit of green, a little bit of shade. A small paradise just for you, where you can enjoy every moment.
neighborhood_overview:
Menorca par excellence. If you want this to be the motto of your holidays, Biniancolla is your ideal place. This small untamed spot brings together all the elements that for Menorcans themselves are the essence of a day on the coast. All this calmness, the sea at your feet, rocks and piers to experience the sea to the most, endearing neighbours, fishing rods, boats, wind and waves. Its crystalline waters with different shades, from the deepest blue to a luminous turquoise, allow you to enjoy the sea in all its facets.
It only remains to say that we recommend Biniancolla not only for your summer holidays, but also for spring and fall. Here you can have some wonderful walks along the sea, you will be fascinated by the Menorcan landscape and nature in low season, and you will learn that it seems that everything is just for you. The city of Maó is only about 10 kilometres away, with all its cultural, gastronomic and commercial offer, you also have Sant Lluís about 3 kilometres away, a

name: Beautiful villa with fantastic sea views
description:
Stunning villa in Binibeca with unforgettable sea views.
Just a 3-minute walk from the sea and close to the Cala Torret beach, this beautiful property offers the perfect getaway.
The villa features 4 spacious, light-filled bedrooms, each with its own en-suite bathroom. A large terrace with a private pool and lush garden — ideal for families.
Located in one of the island’s most exclusive areas, the villa offers tranquility and privacy. The magic of Menorca in a truly unique setting.
neighborhood_overview: Binibeca is a small fishing village located on the south coast of Menorca, which constitutes one of the postcard scenes with the most personality of its own to photograph a thousand times. It belongs to the municipality of Sant Lluis and is considered one of the most beautiful areas of the island. The urbanization has a large number of supermarkets, gift shops, restaurants, bars and play areas for kids, which offer various leisure possibilities, especially in high season. Its beach, with white sand and crystalline waters, is also well known, one of the favorites on the south coast of Menorca.
host_about:
Hola soy Laura, soy la propietaria de esta preciosa villa típica menorquina ubicada en Binibeca, Sant Lluís.
Mi contacto en la isla es Laura, ella es menorquina, vive aquí todo el año y os puede ser de gran ayuda. Ella contestará todos los mails y mensajes y será vuestra persona de referencia en Menorca.

name: Caseta Diana - Alcaufar
description: Cala Alcaufar is one of the most picturesque and authentic coves in the coastal area of Sant Lluís. A place where Menorcans themselves spend the summer, in an atmosphere that is already gradually being lost in other resorts on the island. One pension, one restaurant, one mini- store. The charming little beach, some small docks with their little boats, and the picturesque houses, verandas, terraces...
neighborhood_overview:
Cala Alcaufar is one of the most picturesque and authentic coves in the coastal area of Sant Lluís. A place where Menorcans themselves spend the summer, in an atmosphere that is already gradually being lost in other resorts on the island. One pension, one restaurant, one mini- store. The charming little beach, some small docks with their little boats, and the picturesque houses, verandas, terraces...
You can find the capital of Menorca just 8 km away, with its cultural, gastronomic and commercial offer. Lovers of cycling or walking have the already famous "camí de cavalls" that passes through the same cove and invites you to enjoy the dreamlike landscape of Menorca and its sea.

name: Precioso apartamento de dos hab. en Calan Bosch
description:
The apt has 2 rooms. And 55 m2 , it is excellently located in the urban. Calan Bosch, 7 km from Ciutadella in one of Menorca's finest areas. It is 300 m from the Caribbean Calan Bosch. It is fully equipped . The bus at the door, and all the necessary services at 100 meters (pharmacy, super, restaurants, pubs, etc. ), Fully equipped with washing machine, towels, tv, sheets, utensils etc.
For occupancy of 5 people, the 5th person must be a child, because he has to sleep on a couch.
neighborhood_overview: Menorca is a family island, and specifically this area, that of Calan Bosch is one of the quietest and most sought-after on the island.  Undoubtedly, the marina next door gives a plus of elegance to the place, with all kinds of services, restaurants of all prices, and beautiful places to enjoy the view of the boats in the port. But what makes it an exceptional area is undoubtedly the Caribbean  beach of Calan Bosch because in Menorca there are very few white sand beaches and the one next to the apt is one of the best on the island especially for children.
host_about: Hola! Soy de Barcelona pero como me encanta la playa, el sol, el submarinismo y la vida tranquila, me escapo cuando puedo a Menorca. Es un paraíso y os animo a que lo conozcais!

Cosy apartment with two terraces and communal pool, two minutes walk from the beach of Arenal d'en Castell.

neighborhood_overview:
The beach of Arenal d'en Castell is a shell-shaped beach, with turquoise, warm and shallow waters, perfect for families with children. Its surroundings, protected by two rocky formations, make it a kind of natural swimming pool, particularly quiet.

The area has a wide range of services, such as restaurants, bars, shops, supermarket, chemists and car hire. Arenal d'en Castell offers a perfect combination of natural beauty and urban comfort.

name: Cap d'Artutx, Minorca - Chalet giardino e piscina
description:
The chalet, completely renovated in 2022, the chalet was built following the typical minor style.
It is located within the SolMar complex located a short walk from the Cap D'Artutx promenade where you can enjoy pleasant walks along the coast while admiring the magnificent sunset of the far west of the island.
It consists of two double bedrooms, living room, kitchen, bathroom with shower, patio and private garden. South facing.
It has been thoughtfully furnished and equipped with every comfort.
neighborhood_overview: Cap D'Artutx is 1.5 km from Cala en Bosch in urbanization full of hotels and residences, with a marina and the lighthouse (Cap D’Artrutx). Blue flag beach of white sand 90 meters wide, at the bottom of a deep cove with crystal clear waters. Equipped with sun loungers and umbrellas for rent, toilets and showers, market, bars and restaurants, lifeguard, bus stop, park free. From the beach you can walk along the ancient coastal path "Camì de Cavalls", created in 1330 to connect the towers on call and that you can still walk, horseback riding or mountain biking along the remaining 185km, divided into 20 itineraries. There are several horseback riding schools that organize excursions along the Camì.
host_about: Bolzanina di nascita, rapita dall'isola magica nell'isola magica.

host_about:
Escape Home es la marca bajo la que World2Meet, la división de viajes del Grupo Iberostar, opera la plataforma de alquiler vacacional de Villas y Apartamentos. Es nuestra plataforma de crecimiento y marco de inspiración para alcanzar el liderazgo.

Todos nuestros alojamientos están cuidadosamente seleccionados por nuestros expertos en Islas Baleares, Canarias y Algarve. Gracias a la gestión integral garantizamos que todas las propiedades cumplen con las normativas vigentes y los estándares de limpieza e higiene, así como las normativas y desinfecciones en lo relativo a COVID-19.

Ofrecemos un servicio de calidad, profesional y cercano tanto a los propietarios como a los huéspedes para hacer de este proceso una experiencia única. Nuestra misión es hacerle sentir como en casa. name: Apartment in Fornells
description:
Beautiful second floor apartment located in the Es Castell complex in Fornells.

The Es Castell complex in Fornells is located in front of the sea on the first line, from the terraces of the apartments you can enjoy a spectacular view over the bay of Fornells. It has access to the magnificent private pool by the sea, and to a protected swimming area at sea.

The apartment consists of a bedroom with double bed and another bedroom with two single beds, a bathroom, living-dinning room, fully equipped open plan kitchen and large terrace with outdoor furniture and spectacular panoramic views. The bathroom and kitchen have been recently refurbished.

It also has a private car parking lot.

Free wi-fi internert access.



Tourist services are not provided inside the house during the clients' stay.

The Balearic Government tourist tax (2.20 euros per day and person over 16 years old) is NOT included in the price.
<
neighborhood_overview:
Fornells is one of the most exclusive and charming holiday destinations in the Mediterranean, a small fishing village located on the north coast of Menorca where the landscape has the highest level of protection in the EU.

The village of Fornells is made up of a wonderful historic center next to the port with its charming pedestrian streets, a beautiful Maritime Promenade and well-kept residential areas around the center. will find the best offer of activities. Boat trips, scuba diving, kayaking, boat rentals, windsurfing, hiking and many more for companies with great experience in Fornells.

Fornells offers a varied gastronomic offer including three of the best restaurants in Menorca with its famous lobster, fresh fish and other surprising dishes.

You can enjoy the incredible waters of the Bay of Fornells in its protected swimming areas in the sea and you can easily go to the best beaches of Menorca.

description:
Villa Bini Uxuanne, this fantastic villa is located in the area of Binibeca, this villa has 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and its maximum capacity is for 6 people. The villa has a total of 175 m² built.
Bini Uxuanne has a beautiful “chill out” terrace, a covered area with built-in sofás and cushions to be able to enjoy lovely evenings in the villa. It has a private pool, barbecue, security safe, internet access (wifi), satellite Tv (in Spanish) and also has air conditioning in all 3 bedrooms.

name: Villa Tranquila
description:
Set of four villas located just meters from Cala Blanca Beach.

Villa Tranquila consists of two floors: on the ground floor it consists of living-dining room, kitchen, a full bathroom and a double room. On the second floor there are two double rooms with access to the outdoor terrace and a full bathroom.

Each villa has a swimming pool, with a beautiful garden, outdoor terrace and barbecue. It has an outdoor shower and sunbeds to relax and enjoy the sun of Menorca.
neighborhood_overview:
Cala Blanca is a very quiet residential area where we can enjoy the beach and the different restaurants that surround it. Miramar and Hello Ola are the most popular. In the first we can enjoy Menorcan cuisine and in the second of some delicious cocktails accompanied by the best sunset and sun.

In this area we also find the "horse trail", to be more specific, stage 11, which takes us to Cap d'Artrutx or Ciutadella.

The apartment is one bedroom with a trundle sofa bed in the dining room , so the maximum capacity is 4 people. Great for couples and families who want tranquility and relaxation.
It has a full bathroom, fully equipped kitchen and living-dining room with sofa bed , TV32" and terrace overlooking the garden.

Cala en Forcat beach is 50mts away, the bus stop is next door as well and there is easy free parking.

name: Villa in Ciutadella de Menorca
description:
Welcome to this stunning 256 m² villa, perfect for eight guests. Enjoy the private pool area and the air-conditioned rooms that invite relaxation and comfort.

- Private pool open from 01/06 to 30/09
- 4 spacious bedrooms with optimal sleeping arrangements
- Enclosed garden and furnished terrace for cozy moments.
neighborhood_overview:
Nearby attractions:
Discover the treasures of Ciutadella de Menorca and its surroundings. Within a few minutes' drive, explore the spectacular Cathedral of Ciutadella, stroll through the charming alleys of the historic center, or relax on the paradisiacal beaches of Cala Macarella and Cala Mitjana. For nature lovers, the S'Albufera des Grau Natural Park is a must-visit excursion.
host_about:
Spécialistes de la gestion de location de vacances et passionnés du secteur du tourisme depuis de nombreuses années, notre agence vous propose des logements de qualité qui sauront satisfaire vos attentes !

Notre objectif : vous offrir des vacances réussies et l’envie de revenir !

Our goal: offering you an unforgettable holiday and the wish to experience it again !

name: Las Golondrinas - Rissaga
description:
Beachfront house in a small family development with private access in Cap d'Artrutx, Ciutadella.
With 4,500m2 of community gardens and green areas, plus a large pool, in a residential environment of great tranquility and relaxation of great tranquility and relaxation.
The house has been completely renovated in 2022, with nice design and all the necessary amenities. It has a large garden in front of the house with hammocks, and a fully furnished outdoor terrace.
neighborhood_overview:
Cap d'Artrutx

It is a residential area, where ground-floor holiday houses violate, in a quiet and relaxing environment.
In addition to its views of the Mediterranean, and incredible sunsets, there is a restaurant in the Lighthouse from the mid-19th century, with a nice terrace above the sea, highly recommended.
The area is equipped with all the necessary services, a bus line that connects it with Ciutadella just 7 km away, you will also find a wide variety of supermarkets, shops, bars, restaurants and nightlife.

A pleasant promenade of more than 4 km surrounds the area, and allows you to enjoy pleasant sunset walks.

From the Faro and the coast of Cap d'Artrutx, you can see the best sunsets in all of Menorca.

Visitors from all over the island come to this point at sunset, to watch the sun slowly set on the horizon, on the Tramuntana coast of the island of Mallorca, from which you can see its silhouette in the faraway.

A

name: Villa Calma 450m from the beach
description:
Perfect location, privacy and comfort make this house the perfect place to relax and disconnect surrounded by your family and friends.

The house is located in beautiful Cala en Blanes, only 450m from the closest beach. 4 more beaches are close by, it includes a community pool, a supermarket is 100m down the street and the city center is only a 5 min ride. Newly renovated and with its beautiful outside spaces this oasis lets you calm down by enjoying a peaceful and relaxing private atmosphere.
neighborhood_overview:
Cala en Blanes, Ciutadella, Menorca is a beautiful area north of the Ciutadella city center. It has several small
Beaches, the closest being only 450m away from the house - a dreamy sand beach in a little cove, you will love it. If you’re not a big fan of sand beaches, a couple of minutes further you can access the sea via ladders and take a sun bath on the rocks at famous Cala en Brut. Cala en Blanes features 3 more beaches for you to explore and that’s just the small north side of the city.
host_about: I have had the pleasure of living on four continents, from China to Nicaragua, to Ghana, Ireland, the Netherlands, Spain and more. I was working for an international NGO and therefore had the chance to see, learn and be shaped by many places. I’ve been working in the tech-industries and was involved in several startups, the latest being about education and remote work. I love surfing, yoga, meditation, reading, good veggie/vegan food and sport.

You walk around because everyone is close by.
It consists of 4 restaurants and each of these has its own character, offering the neighborhood variety and very good quality.
Its marina is a pride and offers several activities that allow you to explore the surroundings of the coast. Why don't you go to the virgin beach of Mongofre?...aaiiiyyy Mongofre!!!
The BLU DIVE MENORCA, Addaia's dive center, will come out of its mooring for an experience among the Best on the island of high professionalism, happy to share the magic and underwater secrets with their friends.

Enrico y Simona

description: Only 1 km from the nearest beach lies the beautiful Villa Amoura with a capacity for 6 people in the holiday resort of San Jaime Mediterráneo. The child-friendly holiday home has 3 air-conditioned bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a well-equipped kitchen and an air-conditioned living room. Facilities also include Wi-Fi, a satellite TV as well as parking. From the partially covered terrace with garden furniture, barbecue and a large pool you can enjoy a breathtaking view over the town and the sea.
host_about: At Holidu, we're on a mission to make the hosting and booking of vacation rentals free of doubt and full of joy. Find the best accommodation in the most beautiful regions in Spain – from traditional white-washed villas on the Costa del Sol to beautiful fincas in Mallorca. Our team of experts work on the ground in local offices with hosts to ensure they offer high-quality vacation rentals so that guests book with peace of mind and confidence.

name: 9- New 4px Netflix & pool
description: Enjoy an unforgettable vacation in a modern, newly renovated apartment, located in the heart of the area! Relax with all the amenities, a pool, and access to three charming coves ideal for swimming. Just 3 km from the iconic Ciutadella, the former capital of Menorca. Ideal for unwinding and enjoying the Menorcan paradise, enjoy a luxurious experience in this centrally located accommodation.
neighborhood_overview:
Discover your exclusive corner of paradise!

Welcome to our small complex of luxury apartments, recently renovated to offer you a unique experience of relaxation, style, and comfort. Located in the heart of a charming residential area, you'll be surrounded by restaurants, bars, shops, supermarkets, and even a water park, all within easy reach.

Enjoy our private pool, exclusively for our guests: a tranquil oasis where you can relax after a day of exploring.

Just 3 km away is Ciutadella, the ancient capital of Menorca, with its historic charm, romantic ports, and vibrant cultural life.

Explore three crystal-clear coves just steps from the complex, ideal for sunbathing, swimming, or simply unwinding. Want more? You're just a few kilometers from nearly 60 unique beaches, from the most accessible to those hidden away waiting to be discovered by the most adventurous.

Your perfect getaway awaits. Luxury, location, and nature... all in one
host_about:
La Familia Templa no sólo anfitriona apartamentos turísticos con encanto.

Cada uno de los miembros ha heredado el amor por la hospitalidad, las mejores recomendaciones "fuera del radar" y la pasión por los rincones más auténticos de España.

Siempre sabrás que estuviste en casa de la Familia Templa porque te marcharás con el alma llena y el corazón ligero.

description:
Overview
Villa Emilio is located in Cala en Porter, Menorca. This detached
vacation rental property offers air-conditioning, Free Wi-Fi and sleeps
up to 4 people with 2 Bedrooms and 1 Bathrooms. There is a private pool
with barbecue. Walking distance to the Beach and Restaurants.
Layout
host_about:
As an expression of my passion and love for traveling, I offer visitors the chance to experience and enjoy my beautiful property. 

I have the experience and knowledge necessary to make your stay enjoyable! My goal is to make you feel happy, safe, and confident that you will be satisfied with your stay, from the beginning to the end. 

Before your arrival, I will send you all the necessary arrival information, including driving instructions and key location. 

From the moment you arrive, you know that for whatever you may need during your stay, there will always be someone there to offer assistance or help with any request you may have. 

My phone is always available, and I respond directly to help you feel secure about your decision to book my villa.

name: Holiday home with fabulous views
description:
Relax in our lovely holiday home in the ever popular Playas de Fornells:
- Fabulous sea and lighthouse views
- Great for couples and families
- 2 bedrooms, sleeps 4
- Main bathroom & Ensuite
-Shared pool
- Beach 10 minutes’ walk
- Restaurants/shop 5 minutes’ walk
- 2km to Fornells town/harbour
- Water sports nearby
We've welcomed guests to our comfortable Menorcan home since 1988. They return year after year to explore the island, relax on the balcony, enjoy the pool and the lovely Tirant beach.
neighborhood_overview:
Arriving at Playas de Fornells, you will be greeted by clusters of attractive low-rise villas, nestled into the hills overlooking Cala Tirant. Across the bay lies the stunning seascape of Cap Cavalleria and its lighthouse, a popular spot to watch the sun set over the Mediterranean.

The development was built in the 1980s in a local rustic style in keeping with the landscape.

The development is served by a select number of restaurants. A short stroll round the hillside from the apartment is a choice of three restaurants. The nearest is OKAPI, currently #1 restaurant on for the Fornells area. There are two supermarkets.

A short drive takes you to Fornells village with its pictureque harbour and excellent restaurants

The small communal pool is for the use of owners and their guests.

Cala Tirant beach is about 10 minutes’ walk away. There is a small sandy shallow cove, ideal for small children, and a walkway over a rocky headland to a
neighbourhood: Platges de Fornells, Illes Balears, Spain

description: Superb luxury villa with stunning panoramic sea views and over Fornells bay. host_about:
En SOM Menorca, fundada en 1990, encontrará la mejor selección de casas y apartamentos para que disfrute sus vacaciones en Menorca. 

En SOM Menorca fomentamos hábitos, actitudes y comportamientos en favor del respeto por el medio ambiente, la lucha contra el cambio climático y una mejor conservación del ecosistema menorquín. Asimismo, apoyamos el comercio de proximidad y defendemos las tradiciones y la cultura menorquina

Typical fisherman's cottage in the port of Mahón.

A few meters from the bathing area and pier, invite a dip in the sea as soon as you get up or paddle by kayak from the door of the house... if that is not the authentic ‘summer’…

Fonduco is synonymous with a perfect Menorcan vacation.

100% Menorcan experience. Typical fisherman's cottage in the port of Mahón.
A fisherman's neighborhood inhabited mostly by locals, it's one of the quietest areas in the port of Mahón where the seafaring vibe is still savored.

A few meters from the bathroom and pier area, taking a walk, in the same port of Mahón, you reach the area of restaurants and bars.

name: Villa Bini Yaya 10 - Cap den Font
description: "Biniyaya" is a perfect villa for all those who value the authentic and traditional, but at the same time want maximum comfort and modern, bright spaces. It is a very well-maintained villa, with carefully selected and unique equipment and decor.
neighborhood_overview:
Your neighbourhood is the small residential seaside zone of Cap den Font, where there is a lot of space between house and house, you will live a relaxed atmosphere, where the green of the gardens and the blue of the sea that surrounds the entire area predominate. Nearby you will find a charming “microbeach”, with the name of “Es caló blanc” and several platforms and other direct natural accesses to the sea, these places that allow the most authentic bathing, preferred by many locals. The villa is located in the vicinity of the airport.
Then there is the virgin beach of Biniparratx, with impressive cliffs and some natural caves, exclusively for pedestrian access, and the beaches Binidalí in the west and Binisafua in the east. Very near to the entrance to Cap den Font there are two restaurants. To find more infrastructure, supermarkets, car rental, ice cream parlors or shops, there is the picturesque “Fishing Village” of Binibeca, about 3 km away, a jewel of architecture, which is a

Escape Home es la marca bajo la que World2Meet, la división de viajes del Grupo Iberostar, opera la plataforma de alquiler vacacional de Villas y Apartamentos. Es nuestra plataforma de crecimiento y marco de inspiración para alcanzar el liderazgo.

Todos nuestros alojamientos están cuidadosamente seleccionados por nuestros expertos en Islas Baleares, Canarias y Algarve. Gracias a la gestión integral garantizamos que todas las propiedades cumplen con las normativas vigentes y los estándares de limpieza e higiene, así como las normativas y desinfecciones en lo relativo a COVID-19.

Ofrecemos un servicio de calidad, profesional y cercano tanto a los propietarios como a los huéspedes para hacer de este proceso una experiencia única. Nuestra misión es hacerle sentir como en casa. Soñamos, como tú, con tus vacaciones y nada nos supone mayor recompensa que tu reconocimiento a nuestro empeño.

neighborhood_overview: The house is located in a protected area, quite isolated from buildings and sounds but not too far from the city of Mahon (10 min by car) or the airport (20 min by car) as well as  the beautiful beach of Es Grau (8 min by car). host_about: I am trying to live a new paradigm, more in alignment with my true self, my intuition and my heart, with the highest respect  for nature and animals.  I see my space as an experiment of co-living where we can share, free from predefined forms.

name: 7- Brand new! Cozy apt 2px
description: Enjoy an unforgettable vacation in a modern, newly renovated apartment, located in the heart of the area! Relax with all the amenities, a pool, and access to three charming coves ideal for swimming. Just 3 km from the iconic Ciutadella, the former capital of Menorca. Ideal for unwinding and enjoying the Menorcan paradise, enjoy a luxurious experience in this centrally located accommodation.
neighborhood_overview:
Discover your exclusive corner of paradise!

Welcome to our small complex of luxury apartments, recently renovated to offer you a unique experience of relaxation, style, and comfort. Located in the heart of a charming residential area, you'll be surrounded by restaurants, bars, shops, supermarkets, and even a water park, all within easy reach.

Enjoy our private pool, exclusively for our guests: a tranquil oasis where you can relax after a day of exploring.

Just 3 km away is Ciutadella, the ancient capital of Menorca, with its historic charm, romantic ports, and vibrant cultural life.

Explore three crystal-clear coves just steps from the complex, ideal for sunbathing, swimming, or simply unwinding. Want more? You're just a few kilometers from nearly 60 unique beaches, from the most accessible to those hidden away waiting to be discovered by the most adventurous.

Your perfect getaway awaits. Luxury, location, and nature... all in one
host_about:
La Familia Templa no sólo anfitriona apartamentos turísticos con encanto.

Cada uno de los miembros ha heredado el amor por la hospitalidad, las mejores recomendaciones "fuera del radar" y la pasión por los rincones más auténticos de España.

Siempre sabrás que estuviste en casa de la Familia Templa porque te marcharás con el alma llena y el corazón ligero.

name: Spacious, modern and comfortable house
description:
Modern non-detached house of recent construction located in the residential area of the town of Fornells, in a pleasant complex with a communal pool.

The chalet consists of a patio on the ground floor equipped with outdoor furniture, a living-dining room, a fully equipped open kitchen, a single service room with a full bathroom and a guest toilet. Another patio in the back.

On the first floor are the other three bedrooms: the main one with a double bed and an en-suite bathroom, and two bedrooms with two single beds. Another bathroom completes the distribution of the first floor.

Another multifunctional room is located in the basement.

It has air-conditioning in the livin-dining room and in a free parking space and wireless internet access.



Tourist services are not provided inside the house during the clients' stay.

The Balearic Government tourist tax (2.20 euros per day and person over 16 years old) is N
neighborhood_overview:
Fornells is one of the most exclusive and charming holiday destinations in the Mediterranean, a small fishing village located on the north coast of Menorca where the landscape has the highest level of protection in the EU.

The town of Fornells is made up of a wonderful historic center next to the port with its charming pedestrian streets, a beautiful promenade and well-kept residential areas around the center.
In Fornells you will find the best offer of activities. Boat trips, scuba diving, kayaking, boat rentals, windsurfing, hiking and many more for companies with great experience in Fornells.

Fornells offers a varied gastronomic offer including three of the best restaurants in Menorca with its famous lobster, fresh fish and other surprising dishes.

You can enjoy the incredible waters of the Bay of Fornells in its protected swimming areas in the sea and you can easily go to the best beaches of Menorca.

In Fornells you can walk around

The house is located in the quietest area of Cala Galdana, with mostly single-family plots. In front of the Meliá Galdana hotel.

name: Ses Salines Apartments - S'Aranalet
description: The renovated apartment has an area of 72m2 and a balcony, 2 double bedrooms, one with a double bed and one with 2 single beds, a full bathroom and a full kitchenette. The house has all the comforts: air conditioning in the living room, WIFI, Smart TV, washing machine, dishwasher, etc.
neighborhood_overview:
Fishing village, with the beach nearby, a large bay to practice all types of water sports, restaurants and typical Menorcan food, which is located north of Menorca, in the Balearic Islands. It is a quiet place, which belongs to the lively municipality of Es Mercadal.

Very close to the beach are the Fornells Nautical Club, a sailing school and an original pier. The beach is located inside the bay of Fornells. It has soft toasted sand and has several areas to practice water sports.

In summer, the wonderful Mediterranean climate will allow you to enjoy an average temperature of 25 degrees and a dry and sunny environment. The sea temperature remains pleasant almost all year round, so it is possible to swim even in the middle of autumn. Hours of sunshine abound, as the days remain clear 70% of the time in winter and 85% in summer.

host_about:
*IMPORANT* - In order to access your villa directions and key collection information, you will need to log-in to the Solmar Villas website. Information on how to do this will be emailed to you once your booking is confirmed. Please note that we will contact you post booking via our Villa Concierge Team in order for you to provide your Advanced Passenger Information. This includes all passenger names, dates of birth, passport details and your flight details, which is required by local authorities.

Solmar Villas is a family run business with over 29 years of experience in arranging high quality, tailor made villa holidays. We pride ourselves in providing the highest quality prompt and personalised service to all our clients - with Solmar Villas, you are in safe hands.

We specialise in providing the very finest villas for perfect villa holidays.

All our villas are carefully chosen and approved by our staff - we select only the highest quality villas in the finest resorts and regions of mainland Spain as well as the Balearics  and Canary Islands, Portugal, Greek Islands,  Cyprus and Croatia.

Our selection of villas include a wide range of properties from traditional style houses offering peace and privacy in the countryside, to luxury villas with pools and breath-taking coastal views. 

Solmar has built a loyal customer base. Many of our clients use Solmar year after year and many of our new customers book our villas after recommendations from friends and family.

Whatever type of holiday you have in mind, whether its beach, sports or special interest, we will do everything possible to meet your requirements.

Our ATOL number is ATOL 10334 and as such any flight inclusive holidays booked with us are financially protected.

name: Apartmentos Son Bou Gardens Mas (4)
description: Apartmentos Son Bou Gardens Mas (4) have recently been refurbished, and are ideal for families with children. They are also built in the classical Mediterranean style. Together with pools and surrounded by delightfully spacious lawned gardens, these popular apartments are found in the lower part of San Jaime a few metres away from the shops and the beach of Son Bou.
neighborhood_overview: Son Bou, nestled on the southern coast of Menorca, is a picturesque resort town renowned for its stunning beaches and relaxed Mediterranean atmosphere. Boasting one of the island’s longest beaches with soft golden sands and crystal-clear turquoise waters, Son Bou is a haven for sun-seekers and water enthusiasts. The resort offers a range of amenities, including beachfront cafes, restaurants serving delicious local cuisine, and shops for leisurely strolls. The surrounding nature reserve adds a touch of wild beauty, making it an ideal destination for nature lovers. Whether you’re basking in the sun, exploring the coastal trails, or enjoying the vibrant nightlife, Son Bou invites visitors to savour the beauty and tranquillity of Menorca’s southern shores.

host_about:
Nous aimons beaucoup recevoir, rencontrer, voyager. Ouverts à toutes les cultures, nous aimons partager notre connaissance de notre région (Sud Landes, Pays basque et Minorque), donner des "bons plans" et être dépaysés lorsque nous voyageons . Nous avons équipé nos logements avec tout le soin possible pour qu'ils soient accueillants et confortables, et serons disponibles en cas de besoin. Nous serons très respectueux des lieux que vous nous confierez en vacances également. Nous espérons rencontrer des personnes dans le même état d'esprit que nous, avec confiance et respect mutuel. Nous répondons vite!
A très bientôt !

name: Villa Azucena  by Sonne Villas
description:
Villa Azucena is a beautiful modern villa rental in Menorca with private pool located just a few minutes from the magnificent beach of Cala Galdana.

The villa for rent stands out for its spaciousness, comfort and its situation in the urbanization of Cala Galdana, one of the most prestigious in Menorca.

Villa Azucena is an exclusive villa for rent consisting of four double bedrooms, four bathrooms, toilet, kitchen, living room, barbecue, garage and laundry.
neighborhood_overview:
THE AREA

The resort of Cala Galdana is one of the most popular and prestigious in Menorca. This is due to its beautiful beach that is surrounded by cliffs that border and protect it from the wind, its fine white sand, crystal clear waters and its shell shape, make it a true paradise.

Cala Galdana is a beach that has all the necessary services such as baywatch, sunbeds, boat rentals, restaurants and more leisure.The beach is ideal for young children who are learning to swim, as the sea does not cover in the first 50 meters.

The complex is very safe and quiet in a family atmosphere. In its shopping area has many shops, restaurants, supermarkets, bars, water sports and leisure as boat rental, kayaking, horseback riding, cycling etc.
Cala Galdana is surrounded by a natural environment, ideal for walking, for example through the Barranc d'Algendar or walk through the Cami de Cavalls to Cala Mitjana (15min walk), to Trebaluger (45 min) that is a lovely
host_about:
¡Hola! Y bienvenidos a Menorca de parte de todo el equipo de Sonne Villas. 


Somos una empresa 100% local dedicada a la gestión integral de propiedades en Menorca. 

Nuestro objetivo es poder garantizar la máxima satisfacción de todos nuestros huéspedes durante su estancia en Menorca, proporcionando unos servicios de calidad y totalmente personalizados.

¡Muchas gracias por confiar en nosotros!

Ideally located in the heart of a charming residential area, you’ll be surrounded by restaurants, bars, shops, supermarkets, and even a water park—all just steps away.

Enjoy our private swimming pool, reserved exclusively for our guests: a peaceful oasis to unwind after a day of exploring.

Just 3 km away lies Ciutadella, Menorca’s picturesque former capital, full of history, romantic harbors, and vibrant cultural life.

Explore three nearby coves with crystal-clear waters, perfect for sunbathing, swimming, or simply relaxing. Looking for more? You’ll be just a few kilometers from nearly 60 beaches, some easy to reach, others waiting to be discovered by the adventurous.

Your perfect getaway awaits.
Luxury, location, and nature… all in one place.

Book now and make Menorca your personal parad

host_about:
*IMPORANT* - In order to access your villa directions and key collection information, you will need to log-in to the Solmar Villas website. Information on how to do this will be emailed to you once your booking is confirmed. Please note that we will contact you post booking via our Villa Concierge Team in order for you to provide your Advanced Passenger Information. This includes all passenger names, dates of birth, passport details and your flight details, which is required by local authorities.

Solmar Villas is a family run business with over 29 years of experience in arranging high quality, tailor made villa holidays. We pride ourselves in providing the highest quality prompt and personalised service to all our clients - with Solmar Villas, you are in safe hands.

We specialise in providing the very finest villas for perfect villa holidays.

All our villas are carefully chosen and approved by our staff - we select only the highest quality villas in the finest resorts and regions of mainland Spain as well as the Balearics  and Canary Islands, Portugal, Greek Islands,  Cyprus and Croatia.

Our selection of villas include a wide range of properties from traditional style houses offering peace and privacy in the countryside, to luxury villas with pools and breath-taking coastal views. 

Solmar has built a loyal customer base. Many of our clients use Solmar year after year and many of our new customers book our villas after recommendations from friends and family.

Whatever type of holiday you have in mind, whether its beach, sports or special interest, we will do everything possible to meet your requirements.

Our ATOL number is ATOL 10334 and as such any flight inclusive holidays booked with us are financially protected.

description: Elegant large 4 bed villa with stunning sea views, ac, wifi, private pool, tennis table. near binibeca and punta prima beaches
neighborhood_overview: Nestled in the wonderful natural environment of the exclusive S’Atalaya, which is less crowded than other nearby Binibeca areas, VILLA TURQUESA is a five minute drive from both the Binibeca and Punta Prima beaches where you will find a selection of restaurants, supermarkets, pharmacy, etc. The charming Cala Biniancolla is a short 10 minutes walk from the villa, featuring a small harbour, bathing areas, restaurants/bars and a water park. Another nearby point of interest is the picturesque Cala Torret, just 4 minutes away by car: here you will have access to nice restaurants on the seafront, a supermarket and platforms to swim in the turquoise waters.

name: Villa Isa
description:
Casa amplia, acogedora y muy confortable. Muy luminosa,tranquila al estar en una Calle sin salida y situada a 2ª línea Del Mar. La casa tiene 100 m2. Dispone de 1 cocina, 3 dormitorios ( todas con aire acondicionado),2 baños, jardín de 620m2, BBQ y piscina privada.
Pueden alojarse hasta 6 pers.: 2 adultos en la habitación principal (cama doble), la 2ª habitación y 3ª habitación tienen dos camas individuales.
Hay un espacio en la casa para lavandería, lavadora, plancha y tabla de planchar.
neighborhood_overview:
There are two beaches nearby. The first called Cala'n Bosch that is 2 km. away. with sand and several hotels around, the 2nd 4 km. more rocky but for my taste much more beautiful and natural.
There is the Lake area ( port of Cala'n Bosch) where you will find a variety of 28 Bar-restaurants for those who do not want to cook much on their holidays.
host_about:
Soy una mujer de 42 años. Me encanta aprender idiomas y desplazarme en diferentes países para poder aprenderlos mejor.
En estos momentos vivo  y trabajo en Suiza. 
Nací en Menorca y sinceramente no lo cambiaría por nada en verano.
Para mis vacaciones adoro viajar a sitios de calor, playa, hacer excursiones y disfrutar de Menorca al 100%.

name: Chambre Double Standard 165281
description:
Welcome to Maeva!
28m2
neighborhood_overview:
Authentic and wild, Menorca is a singular island in the Balearics. For many years, locals have struggled to preserve its unique ecosystem and culture many millennia. A trip to Menorca always surprises, with the colors first that go from blue to turquoise, from green to emerald, from blond to white. Then by its good life, its languisher and the almost unreal beauty of its coastline.



During this stopover at the Balearic Islands, you will first discover a rich historical and archaeological heritage in Ciutadella, Mahon or in the ancient Talaytic cities of the island. You will then hike along the coastline to discover the sublime coves that sculpt the Minorcan coasts. After stinging a head at the Cala Macarella, you will cross the island to reach the natural park of S 'Albufera des Grau, a paradise of wildlife.



Finally, you will not miss the unforgettable sunsets offered by the most surprising island of the Balearic Islands. It's time for y
host_about: Ce logement est géré par un professionnel local (une agence immobilière ou une résidence de tourisme) et commercialisé par maeva, spécialiste de la location saisonnière depuis plus de 20 ans. Dès votre arrivée sur place, l'accueil local vous remettra les clés et restera votre interlocuteur privilégié et dédié tout au long de votre séjour. Toutes les informations sur votre arrivée et les modalités du séjour vous parviendront dans la semaine précédent votre arrivée. Nous vous rappelons vivement, qu'il est impératif de contacter l'accueil local avant votre arrivée, afin de bien préparer votre séjour. Toute l'équipe maeva vous souhaite de bonnes vacances tout sourire !

name: Villa Dora
description:
Set of four villas located just meters from Cala Blanca Beach.

Each consists of two floors: on the ground floor it consists of living-dining room, kitchen, full bathroom and a double room. On the second floor there are two double rooms with access to the outdoor terrace and a full bathroom.

Each villa has a swimming pool, with a beautiful garden, outdoor terrace and barbecue. It has an outdoor shower and sunbeds to relax and enjoy the sun of Menorca.
neighborhood_overview:
Cala Blanca is a very quiet residential area where we can enjoy the beach and the different restaurants that surround it. Miramar and Hello Ola are the most popular. In the first we can enjoy Menorcan cuisine and in the second of some delicious cocktails accompanied by the best sunset and sun.

In this area we also find the "horse path", to be more specific, stage 11, which takes us to Cap d'Artrutx or Ciutadella.

host_about:
En SOM Menorca, fundada en 1990, encontrará la mejor selección de casas y apartamentos para que disfrute sus vacaciones en Menorca. 

En SOM Menorca fomentamos hábitos, actitudes y comportamientos en favor del respeto por el medio ambiente, la lucha contra el cambio climático y una mejor conservación del ecosistema menorquín. Asimismo, apoyamos el comercio de proximidad y defendemos las tradiciones y la cultura menorquina

name: Un refugio en Menorca con piscina al lado del mar
description:
You'll enjoy the island in this apartment in a gated complex, 500 meters from Cala'n Blanes beach with its palm grove and 2.3 km from Ciutadella walking.

You'll find everything you need to feel comfortable, with details such as a 150x200 cm bed, Wi-Fi, a hairdryer, and, of course, air conditioning.

The complex has a pool with a lifeguard. There is a restaurant behind the pool and several more just outside the complex, as well as a supermarket. Bus service is available at the door.
neighborhood_overview:
You're very close to the cove.

In the cove, just behind you, you will find a palm grove where you can picnic if you feel like it.

There are a couple of beach bars and umbrella and lounge chairs rentals.

You can walk to Ciutadella - via the horse path - in less than half an hour.
host_about:
He vivido en Sudamérica, en Alemania, en UK y ahora en España. Tengo la suerte de conocer montones de ciudades en muy distintos países y continentes. He probado los mejores hoteles y los sitios más lúgubres. Será la edad o la experiencia pero creo que a estas alturas ya tengo criterio. 
(otro día más inspirada cuento algo más)

name: Villa Punta Grossa
description:
Villa Punta Grossa is located in Es Mercadal, 600 meters from the Arenal d'en Castell beach.
This charming villa has air conditioning, 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms (dryer included) and fully equipped kitchen (toaster, coffee maker).
It also offers a community pool, private garden, as well as free WiFi in all facilities.
The villa has direct access to a beautiful rooftop with sea view and jacuzzi for relaxing in the Menorcan sunsets.

name: Apartamento familiar en Son Bou
description: Bright and functional family apartment, ideal for relaxing in a quiet setting. With private terrace, two bedrooms, equipped kitchen and ceiling fans. Perfect for a comfortable and easy holiday.
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in a very quiet and safe residential area, ideal for families looking for relaxation, comfort, and a connection with nature. Just in front of the complex is a protected meadow — a peaceful natural space that offers open views and privacy, although it does not allow direct access to the beach due to its ecological value.

The nearest beach is only a 5-minute drive away, with easy access and parking available. This allows you to enjoy the sea quickly while staying in a calm, residential setting.

The area is perfect for outdoor family activities: there are walking paths, green areas, nearby parks, and small trails ideal for cycling or evening strolls with children.

You’ll also find supermarkets, bakeries, cafés, and restaurants close by, so you can enjoy the local food and daily needs without long trips.

A natural, relaxed, and family-friendly setting, perfect for those who value calm, convenience, and time together witho

name: Enjoy Cala Porter - Apto en complejo vacacional.
description: 2-bedroom apartment on the ground floor in a holiday complex with 3 swimming pools and close to the beach.
neighborhood_overview:
CALA PORTER:
Its location between large cliffs, its blue water and its white sand, make Cala en Porter one of the most fascinating coves in Menorca.
Cala en Porter has restaurants, showers, a lifeguard, a first aid station and parking a few meters away, factors that make it a very comfortable cove to go with children or people who prefer not to walk.
Due to its location, Cala en Porter is one of the cleanest and quietest coves in Menorca. It barely has a slope and bathing in it is like relaxing in a large pool. It is a highly recommended cove for everyone.
host_about:
Me llamo Luz,  una bilbaina con años de experiencia en el mundo del turismo en esta maravillosa isla y estoy dispuesta a que pases unas vacaciones de fábula.
ENJOY MENORCA WITH US.

name: Charming Sant Lluis Farmhouse Menorca 4 bed/3 bath
description:
We are now taking bookings for 2026
Casa Montina is a traditional rustic farmhouse surrounded by gardens with a pool, set in a quiet village location,a short walk to shops, bars and restaurants in the town of Sant Lluis. This property is also listed as a 2 bed / 2 bathroom property ( with the upstairs closed off), at a reduced price,see separate listing:
https://abnb.me/k6HR2L97nO
Whichever option you choose you will have the entire farmhouse to yourself and will not share with anyone else.
neighborhood_overview:
Casa Montina is located 11 minutes from the airport in a quiet village but only a short walk from the traditional town of San Lluis where you will find typical Spanish bars selling Tapas, affordable restaurants, takeaway pizzas cooked to order and even a local winery which, as well as guided tours, has an extensive lunch and dinner menu.
There are also a number of small local shops eg bakery, fish mongers, butchers and a supermarket within walking distance of the farmhouse.
host_about:
My husband and I have a working sheep farm in the beautiful hills of the English Lake District. I took early retirement from my job as Head Teacher of a Primary School and have since enjoyed more opportunities to travel ( especially to our farmhouse in Menorca), read and walk with the dogs in the hills.
Of our two grown-up daughters, one lives in the local village and has taken after me as a teacher in my old school, the other works in London. The family, including young grandchild, have already enjoyed the farmhouse in Menorca and learning to swim in the pool will be a highlight in years to come.

name: Villa Tin Uno
description: Modern villa with swimming pool and privileged sea views located in the quiet Coves Noves development, in the municipality of Es Mercadal. It has four double bedrooms, three full bathrooms and a toilet/laundry room. Villa Tin Uno.
neighborhood_overview:
The house is located in the quiet residential development of Coves Noves, two minutes away from s'Arenal den Castell, where there are supermarkets, shops, bars and restaurants.

neighborhood_overview: Son Bou, nestled on the southern coast of Menorca, is a picturesque resort town renowned for its stunning beaches and relaxed Mediterranean atmosphere. Boasting one of the island’s longest beaches with soft golden sands and crystal-clear turquoise waters, Son Bou is a haven for sun-seekers and water enthusiasts. The resort offers a range of amenities, including beachfront cafes, restaurants serving delicious local cuisine, and shops for leisurely strolls. The surrounding nature reserve adds a touch of wild beauty, making it an ideal destination for nature lovers. Whether you’re basking in the sun, exploring the coastal trails, or enjoying the vibrant nightlife, Son Bou invites visitors to savour the beauty and tranquility of Menorca’s southern shores.

The master bedroom has air conditioning.

This chalet is furnished, equipped and decorated with high quality elements.

Fornells is one of the most exclusive and charming holiday destinations in the Mediterranean, a small fishing village located on the north coast of Menorca where the landscape has the highest level of protection in the EU.

The town of Fornells is made up of a wonderful historic center next to the port with its charming pedestrian streets, a beautiful promenade and well-kept residential areas around the center.
You will find the best offer of activities. Boat trips, scuba diving, kayaking, boat rentals, windsurfing, hiking and many more for companies with great experience in Fornells.

In Fornells you will find the best range of activities. Boat trips, scuba diving, kayaking, boat rentals, windsurfing, hiking and many more by companies with extensive experience.

name: 1- Luxury apt with Sauna & gym
description: Enjoy an unforgettable vacation in a modern, newly renovated apartment, located in the heart of the area! Relax with all the amenities, a pool, and access to three charming coves ideal for swimming. Just 3 km from the iconic Ciutadella, the former capital of Menorca. Ideal for unwinding and enjoying the Menorcan paradise, enjoy a luxurious experience in this centrally located accommodation.
neighborhood_overview:
Discover your exclusive corner of paradise!

Welcome to our small complex of luxury apartments, recently renovated to offer you a unique experience of relaxation, style, and comfort. Located in the heart of a charming residential area, you'll be surrounded by restaurants, bars, shops, supermarkets, and even a water park, all within easy reach.

Enjoy our private pool, exclusively for our guests: a tranquil oasis where you can relax after a day of exploring.

Just 3 km away is Ciutadella, the ancient capital of Menorca, with its historic charm, romantic ports, and vibrant cultural life.

Explore three crystal-clear coves just steps from the complex, ideal for sunbathing, swimming, or simply unwinding. Want more? You're just a few kilometers from nearly 60 unique beaches, from the most accessible to those hidden away waiting to be discovered by the most adventurous.

Your perfect getaway awaits. Luxury, location, and nature... all in one
host_about:
La Familia Templa no sólo anfitriona apartamentos turísticos con encanto.

Cada uno de los miembros ha heredado el amor por la hospitalidad, las mejores recomendaciones "fuera del radar" y la pasión por los rincones más auténticos de España.

Siempre sabrás que estuviste en casa de la Familia Templa porque te marcharás con el alma llena y el corazón ligero.

The apartment 'Las Brisas 11' is located in Ciutadella and stands out for its proximity to the beach. The 45 m² property consists of a living room, a kitchen, 1 bedroom and 1 bathroom, so it can accommodate 2 people. Additional amenities include a fan, a washing machine and a television. The apartment has a private balcony, ideal for relaxing in the evening. In addition, you can enjoy a shared outdoor pool.

name: Holidays in Ses Salines
description:
Enjoy the summer in this charming apartment in Ses Salines, Fornells, Menorca. This accommodation is for 4 people and offers a comfortable and cosy stay. It consists of 3 bright bedrooms, 1 complete bathroom, a spacious dining room, equipped kitchen and a terrace.

Located in a complex with communal swimming pool and garden. In addition, its proximity to the sea, a few steps from the bay of Fornells, will allow you to enjoy unparalleled views.
neighborhood_overview: Fornells is a small seaside villa in the north of Menorca located in the bay that bears the same name, a small hamlet of the town of Mercadal that arose from the suburb that was formed in the vicinity of the Castillo de San Antonio, by history it has been a strategic town in the defense of the natural port of Fornells, good faith of this are the military structures it houses and can still be visited as the Torre de Fornells, the largest defensive watchtower in the entire island.

Escape Home es la marca bajo la que World2Meet, la división de viajes del Grupo Iberostar, opera la plataforma de alquiler vacacional de Villas y Apartamentos. Es nuestra plataforma de crecimiento y marco de inspiración para alcanzar el liderazgo.

name: Villa Jardín Casita (3 adultos)
description: Son Triay has been a Menorcan agritourism since 1995. The estate of 126 hectares of labor fields, pastures, forests and a wide swimming pool, is located in a rural setting between the village of Ferrerias and the Urbanization of Cala Galdana. 10km from the establishment you will find numerous virgin beaches, such as Cala Mitjana and Cala Macarella. The port city of Ciudadela is located 30 minutes away by car, where ferries depart to Barcelona and Mallorca. Front desk hours from 9 am to 8 pm.
neighborhood_overview:
Cala Mitjana is a small virgin cove south of Menorca. Its blue waters and its central location on the island, next to Cala Galdana, make it recommended and accessible to everyone.
Cala Macarella is one of the most famous coves in Menorca. Their postcards are the most typical and well-known on the island, thanks to the turquoise color of its waters and the sailboats that dock nearby. Near Macarella is Macarelleta, a smaller cove and where nudism prolifers. You can walk from one to the other in less than 10 minutes.
The "Cave of Xoroi" is a cave located on a cliff on the south coast of the island, in the urbanization of Cala Porter. It works as a music bar for the day and a nightclub at night.
Binibeca is a small fishing village located about 8 kilometers south of Mahón, in the municipality of San Luis. Its labyrinthine streets and whitewashed houses make it one of the most beautiful villages in Menorca.
Puerto de Ciutadella en Menorca has ferry trips to Alcúdia & Ba
host_about:
Son Triay es un agroturismo menorquín desde 1995. La finca se encuentra ubicada en un entorno rural entre el pueblo de Ferrerias y la Urbanización de Cala Galdana . A unos 10 km del establecimiento encontrará numerosas playas vírgenes, como Cala Mitjana y Cala Macarella. La ciudad portuaria de Ciudadela está situada a 30 minutos en coche, desde donde salen ferris hacia Barcelona y Alcúdia (Mallorca).

Llevamos más de 20 años al servicio de los clientes, ofreciendo habitaciones dobles, apartamentos y villas totalmente equipadas para satisfacer las necesidades de cada cliente. Es una finca ideal con 126 hectáreas de campos de labor, pastos, bosques y una amplia piscina para parejas, familias y grupos que deseen pasar unos días de tranquilidad en Menorca.

Son Triay es un lugar ideal para celebraciones y eventos especiales en un entorno totalmente agrícola con una gran piscina, jardín y todas las comodidades para unas vacaciones ideales en el campo.

description:
Typical Menorquina house in a very family-friendly and quiet complex of only four neighbors. Because and a rooftop terrace with magnificent views towards Mallorca. Cala Blanca Hall is only 200 meters away ,around 300 meters there are bars, restaurants ,supermarkets and public transport.
We are happy to help with all the necessary information to make your stay pleasant and comfortable. We can suggest places you can visit,such as tourist attractions,restaurants,shops,museums...
neighborhood_overview: Cala Blanca is a development very close to Ciutadella, just 4 km from downtown Ciutadella. A very quiet and family development where you can spend an unforgettable vacation!
host_about:
Nuestro mayor interés es que paseis un buen tiempo de vacaciones en una alojamiento agradable, luminoso y espacioso. Estarémos a vuestra disposición para ayudar a planificar los días en la isla y aconsejarte del ocio disponible en las fechas.
Ciutadella que es el segundo centro más grande de Menorca, muy característico por sus antigüedades, por sus tiendas de moda y de artesanado local, por su puerto lleno de restaurantes y clubs nocturnos. Es ideal para familias con niños.Bienvenidos!
