host_about:
*IMPORANT* - In order to access your villa directions and key collection information, you will need to log-in to the Solmar Villas website. Information on how to do this will be emailed to you once your booking is confirmed. Please note that we will contact you post booking via our Villa Concierge Team in order for you to provide your Advanced Passenger Information. This includes all passenger names, dates of birth, passport details and your flight details, which is required by local authorities.

Solmar Villas is a family run business with over 29 years of experience in arranging high quality, tailor made villa holidays. We pride ourselves in providing the highest quality prompt and personalised service to all our clients - with Solmar Villas, you are in safe hands.

We specialise in providing the very finest villas for perfect villa holidays.

All our villas are carefully chosen and approved by our staff - we select only the highest quality villas in the finest resorts and regions of mainland Spain as well as the Balearics  and Canary Islands, Portugal, Greek Islands,  Cyprus and Croatia.

Our selection of villas include a wide range of properties from traditional style houses offering peace and privacy in the countryside, to luxury villas with pools and breath-taking coastal views. 

Solmar has built a loyal customer base. Many of our clients use Solmar year after year and many of our new customers book our villas after recommendations from friends and family.

Whatever type of holiday you have in mind, whether its beach, sports or special interest, we will do everything possible to meet your requirements.

Our ATOL number is ATOL 10334 and as such any flight inclusive holidays booked with us are financially protected.

¡Te esperamos!

name: Villa Baixa - Es Canutells
description: This beautiful and elegant villa will really impress you, all materials have been carefully selected and combined to obtain a unique result: high quality natural materials, the combination of stone and wood, mix of rustic and ethno, large surfaces in light tones, designer lamps, paintings and ceramics that give that special touch of colour. All of this clearly exceeds what is commonly expected of a holiday home.
neighborhood_overview:
The small beach of Canutells is a traditional place where Menorcans used to spend their summer, where this special structure and flair of the authentic Menorcan coast has been formed, where children run free, neighbours have known each other for a lifetime, the few bars and restaurants have this special and authentic air. The beach is about 6 minute walk from the house.
About 5 minute drive away is the small town of Sant Climent and the capital of Menorca, Maó, less than 10 kilometers, making it easy and convenient to enjoy its wide gastronomic, commercial and above all cultural offer. The port with its great variety of bars, restaurants, exclusive shops and nautical life, the centre with its art galleries, markets, theatre etc. You will surely visit Maó more than once.

name: Private chalet private pool panoramic sea views
description: Located on the South coast of Menorca.  South facing situated on a pine clad slope.  Located in a very quiet part of San Jaime.  The villa has 2 twin bedrooms and 2 shower rooms, private swimming pool and BBQ. Perfect for a beach holiday; 10 to 15 min walk to the 3 km long white sandy beach. 10 min walk to the centre of Son Bou with its restaurants and amenities.
neighborhood_overview:
There are two urbanisations in Son Bou - San Jaime and Torre Soli Nou. Our villa is in a quiet part of San Jaime on the border of Torre Soli Nou. It is situated towards the bottom of a 1 mile steep pine cladded hill.

There is a selection of restaurants and bars in Son Bou. The Ses Grulles beach bar has a fabulous spot on the beach. They offer fish of the day.

Budda Lounge bar and restaurant is the first establishment you come to on the corner of the road heading down to the beach. It is run by a charming eccentric Menorquin called Vicente. The menu is good and there is a very relaxing lawn area with sofas and tables for lounging. Caters for allergens. I am gluten and dairy free; they go out of their way for me.

My other favourite restaurant in Son Bou is Casa Andres (no view but fabulous atmosphere, service and food), whose menu is very good (Chateau Briand, paella, gazpacho, cream de calabaza are some of my favourites). The team of staff are
neighbourhood: San Jaime, Son Bou Alaior, Illes Balears, Spain

name: Villa Noelia - Magnificent Sea Views & Close to th
description: ​Villa Noelia is a menorcan style semi-detached villa, located in a complex with 3 other villas. This villa is only a short walk away from the beach and resides in San Jaime. With a communal pool and garden, Villa Noelia has a lovely terrace that allows guests to see the breathtaking views of the ocean.
neighborhood_overview: Just a ten minute walk from Son Bou. Son Bou, nestled on the southern coast of Menorca, is a picturesque resort town renowned for its stunning beaches and relaxed Mediterranean atmosphere. Boasting one of the island’s longest beaches with soft golden sands and crystal-clear turquoise waters, Son Bou is a haven for sun-seekers and water enthusiasts. The resort offers a range of amenities, including beachfront cafes, restaurants serving delicious local cuisine, and shops for leisurely strolls. The surrounding nature reserve adds a touch of wild beauty, making it an ideal destination for nature lovers. Whether you’re basking in the sun, exploring the coastal trails, or enjoying the vibrant nightlife, Son Bou invites visitors to savour the beauty and tranquility of Menorca’s southern shores.

THE AREA

CALA BLANCA

host_about:
*IMPORANT* - In order to access your villa directions and key collection information, you will need to log-in to the Solmar Villas website. Information on how to do this will be emailed to you once your booking is confirmed. Please note that we will contact you post booking via our Villa Concierge Team in order for you to provide your Advanced Passenger Information. This includes all passenger names, dates of birth, passport details and your flight details, which is required by local authorities.

Solmar Villas is a family run business with over 29 years of experience in arranging high quality, tailor made villa holidays. We pride ourselves in providing the highest quality prompt and personalised service to all our clients - with Solmar Villas, you are in safe hands.

We specialise in providing the very finest villas for perfect villa holidays.

All our villas are carefully chosen and approved by our staff - we select only the highest quality villas in the finest resorts and regions of mainland Spain as well as the Balearics  and Canary Islands, Portugal, Greek Islands,  Cyprus and Croatia.

Our selection of villas include a wide range of properties from traditional style houses offering peace and privacy in the countryside, to luxury villas with pools and breath-taking coastal views. 

Solmar has built a loyal customer base. Many of our clients use Solmar year after year and many of our new customers book our villas after recommendations from friends and family.

Whatever type of holiday you have in mind, whether its beach, sports or special interest, we will do everything possible to meet your requirements.

Our ATOL number is ATOL 10334 and as such any flight inclusive holidays booked with us are financially protected.

name: Habitación Doble Superior en el corazón de Menorca
description:
Discover the true beauty of Menorca at Calma Hotel!

Decorated in the purest Menorcan style and located in the historic heart of Ciutadella, Calma Hotel is designed to give you a unique experience full of charm and authenticity. Every detail has been carefully selected for your comfort and pleasure.

Everything you want to explore is just a few steps away from our hotel. All the roads to tour the island start here, you just have to take one.

We're waiting for you!
neighborhood_overview:
Hotel Calma is located in the heart of Ciutadella de Menorca, a historical and cultural gem of the city, and offers an authentic Menorcan experience.

Being centrally located, it is surrounded by beautiful cobbled streets, historic buildings, quaint squares, and even stately palaces.

Steps away are iconic landmarks such as the Cathedral of Santa Maria de Ciutadella, an impressive gothic-style architectural work.

The neighborhood also has a variety of local shops, restaurants and cafes, where visitors can enjoy the delicious Mediterranean gastronomy and buy local handmade products, both day and night.

In addition, this privileged location allows easy access to the main attractions of Ciutadella, such as the marina, where you can take boat trips and enjoy the spectacular views of the Mediterranean Sea.

The central neighborhood of Ciutadella de Menorca is a fascinating place where history, culture and modern life are intertwined to c
host_about:
Somos PropiedUp, una empresa especializada en la gestión de propiedades vacacionales en Menorca. 

Nuestro objetivo es que disfrutes de las vacaciones que tanto has soñado, con el máximo confort y una atención personalizada.

Ofrecemos un trato cercano, una atención resolutiva y constante innovación de manos de un equipo experto para mejorar cada experiencia. Para nosotros, tu tranquilidad y satisfacción son la mejor recompensa.

¡Te esperamos!

name: In a very quiet area within the town
description:
Cozy luxury duplex apartment located in Fornells and overlooking the sea. Equipped with air conditioning, both in the living room and in the bedroom, as well as WiFi internet access.


Located 100 meters from the town center.

There is no nearby business or commercial activity likely to cause nighttime inconvenience.

Tourist services (room service, meals, drinks, etc.) are not provided inside the property during the guests' stay.
neighborhood_overview:
Fornells is one of the most exclusive and most charming holiday destinations in the Mediterranean, a small fishing village located on the north coast of Menorca where the landscape has the highest level of protection in the EU.

The village of Fornells is formed by a wonderful historical center next to the port with its lovely pedestrian streets, a beautiful promenade and well-kept residential areas around the center.

In Fornells you will find the best offer of activities. Boat trips, scuba diving, kayaking, boat rentals, windsurfing, hiking and many more for companies with great experience.

Fornells offers a great and diverse gastronomic offer including three of the best restaurants in Menorca with its famous lobster, fresh fish and other surprising dishes.

You can enjoy the marvelous crystal waters of the Bay of Fornells in its protected swimming areas in the sea and you can easily go to the best beaches of Menorca.

In Fornells yo
host_about:
En SOM Menorca, fundada en 1990, encontrará la mejor selección de casas y apartamentos para que disfrute sus vacaciones en Menorca. 

En SOM Menorca fomentamos hábitos, actitudes y comportamientos en favor del respeto por el medio ambiente, la lucha contra el cambio climático y una mejor conservación del ecosistema menorquín. Asimismo, apoyamos el comercio de proximidad y defendemos las tradiciones y la cultura menorquina

host_about:
*IMPORANT* - In order to access your villa directions and key collection information, you will need to log-in to the Solmar Villas website. Information on how to do this will be emailed to you once your booking is confirmed. Please note that we will contact you post booking via our Villa Concierge Team in order for you to provide your Advanced Passenger Information. This includes all passenger names, dates of birth, passport details and your flight details, which is required by local authorities.

Solmar Villas is a family run business with over 29 years of experience in arranging high quality, tailor made villa holidays. We pride ourselves in providing the highest quality prompt and personalised service to all our clients - with Solmar Villas, you are in safe hands.

We specialise in providing the very finest villas for perfect villa holidays.

All our villas are carefully chosen and approved by our staff - we select only the highest quality villas in the finest resorts and regions of mainland Spain as well as the Balearics  and Canary Islands, Portugal, Greek Islands,  Cyprus and Croatia.

Our selection of villas include a wide range of properties from traditional style houses offering peace and privacy in the countryside, to luxury villas with pools and breath-taking coastal views. 

Solmar has built a loyal customer base. Many of our clients use Solmar year after year and many of our new customers book our villas after recommendations from friends and family.

Whatever type of holiday you have in mind, whether its beach, sports or special interest, we will do everything possible to meet your requirements.

Our ATOL number is ATOL 10334 and as such any flight inclusive holidays booked with us are financially protected.

name: Encantadora Finca cerca del mar, Cala Galdana
description:
Beautiful agricultural estate with pool and wonderful panoramic views, immersed in nature, located in the south of Menorca, next to the village of Ferreries and Cala Galdana.
The estate enjoys a lot of privacy, its more than 30 hectares around without construction allow you to enjoy the tranquility of the island as well as beautiful country walks. At the same time it is very close to the beautiful beaches of Cala Galdana, Cala Mitjana and Cala Macarella.
6 bedrooms and 4 bathrooms.
neighborhood_overview:
It is an area located in the center of the island, just 20 minutes from the airport in Mahón and the same distance to Ciutadella. Ferreries is just 2 km away, a town where people live all year round and where you can find all the necessary amenities such as supermarkets, shops, restaurants, bars, banks, pharmacy etc.
The nearest coastal village is Cala Galdana with a beautiful beach. From Cala Gladana, the Camino de Cavalls leaves to the most famous beach in Menorca, Cala Macarella - a 30-minute hike. Other pristine beaches in the area, Cala Mitjana y Cala Trebaluger.

name: Beautiful apartment on the seafront
description:
Amazing location by the sea, only your garden separates you from it! Enjoy direct views of the water and sailing boats with no other noise than gentle waves crashing against the coast.
Recently refurbished with high standards and cosy decoration with all amenities. Bright and large living spaces with open plan kitchen.
Quiet neighbourhood with traditional fishermen's houses and a small beach only 2' walk. "Camí de cavalls" passes nearby, enjoy the natural beauty of the island on your doorstep!
neighborhood_overview:
Quiet residential neighborhood of fishermen's casitas and single-family apartments. Apartado de las grande hoteleras. 3 restaurants 5-10 minutes walk ( pizzeria La Baia, Can Cargol and Son ganxo). Supermarkets and shops in Punta Prima or Sant LLuis 2-4 km.
Numerous routes to do on foot or by bike along the coast and rural interior. Kayak Rental and Bike itself Biniancolla or Punta Prima.

host_about:
*IMPORANT* - In order to access your villa directions and key collection information, you will need to log-in to the Solmar Villas website. Information on how to do this will be emailed to you once your booking is confirmed. Please note that we will contact you post booking via our Villa Concierge Team in order for you to provide your Advanced Passenger Information. This includes all passenger names, dates of birth, passport details and your flight details, which is required by local authorities.

Solmar Villas is a family run business with over 29 years of experience in arranging high quality, tailor made villa holidays. We pride ourselves in providing the highest quality prompt and personalised service to all our clients - with Solmar Villas, you are in safe hands.

We specialise in providing the very finest villas for perfect villa holidays.

All our villas are carefully chosen and approved by our staff - we select only the highest quality villas in the finest resorts and regions of mainland Spain as well as the Balearics  and Canary Islands, Portugal, Greek Islands,  Cyprus and Croatia.

Our selection of villas include a wide range of properties from traditional style houses offering peace and privacy in the countryside, to luxury villas with pools and breath-taking coastal views. 

Solmar has built a loyal customer base. Many of our clients use Solmar year after year and many of our new customers book our villas after recommendations from friends and family.

Whatever type of holiday you have in mind, whether its beach, sports or special interest, we will do everything possible to meet your requirements.

Our ATOL number is ATOL 10334 and as such any flight inclusive holidays booked with us are financially protected.

name: Apartamentos Biniforcat CB, 12 (Cala a 5 minutos)
description:
On the ground floor with seating for 4. Composed of 2 double bedrooms, small kitchen, living room with sofa and TV, full bathroom, washing machine, terrace, communal pool, direct access to Cala'n Forcat beach, 4km from Ciutadella and with all kinds of services nearby.

We offer parking but since there are more apartments than you can, we cannot guarantee the permanent availability of the spaces.

It has hot water only in the bathroom and does not have wifi.
neighborhood_overview:
It is a quiet neighborhood.
Biniforcat apartments are located on "Avenida de los Delfines" (Cala en Blanes), just 4 km from Ciutadella.
Along the avenue there are several restaurants, bars, small supermarkets, souvenir shops… (you can walk). There is also a small aqua park, bouncy castles and leisure areas for the little ones.
There are several beaches nearby: Cala'n Forcat (4 minutes walk - 200 meters), Cales Piques (4 minutes walk - 200 meters), Cala 'n Brut (15 minutes walk - 1.2 km), Cala'n Blanes (20 minutes walk - 1.4 km).
In high season there is a little more movement, but in general it is a quiet neighborhood.

No place on the island is more than 35 mins from the Villa

Other north coast beaches (Binimelá, Cavallería, Playas de Fornells), south coast beaches (Binibeca, Punta Prima, Alcaufar) and the capital town Mahon, can all be reached within 20 minutes by car.

name: Charming Sant Lluis Farmhouse Menorca 2bed/2 bath
description:
We are now taking bookings for 2026

Casa Montina is a traditional rustic farmhouse surrounded by gardens with a pool, set in a quiet village location with a short walk to shops, bars and restaurants in the town of Sant Lluis. This property is also listed as a 4 bed / 3 bathroom property, see separate listing: https://abnb.me/aIqfohs9nO or enquire for details. Whichever option you choose you will have the entire farmhouse to yourself and will not share with anyone else
neighborhood_overview: Casa Montina is located 11 minutes from the airport in a quiet village but only a short walk from the traditional town of San Lluis where you will find typical Spanish bars selling Tapas, affordable restaurants, takeaway pizzas cooked to order and delivered and even a local winery which, as well as guided tours, has an extensive lunch and dinner menu. There are also a number of small local shops including bakery, fish mongers , butchers and a supermarket within walking distance from the farmhouse.
host_about:
My husband and I have a working sheep farm in the beautiful hills of the English Lake District. I took early retirement from my job as Head Teacher of a Primary School and have since enjoyed more opportunities to travel ( especially to our farmhouse in Menorca), read and walk with the dogs in the hills.
Of our two grown-up daughters, one lives in the local village and has taken after me as a teacher in my old school, the other works in London. The family, including young grandchild, have already enjoyed the farmhouse in Menorca and learning to swim in the pool will be a highlight in years to come.

Supermarket and pharmacy also about a 3 minute walk.
neighborhood_overview:
The south-east coast of Menorca, where the house is located, is characterized by having white sand beaches, and always clean water.
In general this area is more familiar, and much less crowded, than other tourist areas of Menorca, such as the west coast of the island.
Punta Prima Beach is the largest beach beach in this area.
The house is located about three minutes away from the restaurant area, about 5 minutes from a playground, and also another 5 minutes from a hotel that has a nightclub.

name: Villa Maravilla, Heatable pool, rooftop with views
description: Experience an unforgettable holiday at Maravilla, a modern and comfortable villa in Binibeca, Menorca! Relax on spacious terraces, enjoy the heated private pool (perfect for the off-season), and unwind on the rooftop terrace with a bar and stunning sea views. With 5 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, a covered terrace, and a BBQ area, this villa has everything for a carefree stay. Just a short walk from the beach, restaurants, and bars. Feel at home in Maravilla and indulge in pure comfort and luxury!
neighborhood_overview:
From the property it is a leisurely fifteen minute drive to the airport & capital Mahon. Into the little, romantic village of Binibeca it's only a 350 m walk.
The winery Binifadet is ten minutes by car, and into the village St Lluis as well. There is a big waterpark with slides only 8 minutes drive.

Binibeca is an exclusive area in the south coast of the island, near the airport and only 10 km away from the capital Mahon. The closest beach to Binibeca Playa is only 850 meters away. There is an access to the sea only 350 m from the villa.
The area is unique, there are no hotels and has become one of the most exclusive areas of the island.
host_about:
Hello my name is Clarice I live, write and blog about Menorca. I love Menorca and I like to share it with you. 
I will be your host on Menorca in one of the houses I manage. Please don't hesitate to contact me if you have questions.

host_about:
*IMPORANT* - In order to access your villa directions and key collection information, you will need to log-in to the Solmar Villas website. Information on how to do this will be emailed to you once your booking is confirmed. Please note that we will contact you post booking via our Villa Concierge Team in order for you to provide your Advanced Passenger Information. This includes all passenger names, dates of birth, passport details and your flight details, which is required by local authorities.

Solmar Villas is a family run business with over 29 years of experience in arranging high quality, tailor made villa holidays. We pride ourselves in providing the highest quality prompt and personalised service to all our clients - with Solmar Villas, you are in safe hands.

We specialise in providing the very finest villas for perfect villa holidays.

All our villas are carefully chosen and approved by our staff - we select only the highest quality villas in the finest resorts and regions of mainland Spain as well as the Balearics  and Canary Islands, Portugal, Greek Islands,  Cyprus and Croatia.

Our selection of villas include a wide range of properties from traditional style houses offering peace and privacy in the countryside, to luxury villas with pools and breath-taking coastal views. 

Solmar has built a loyal customer base. Many of our clients use Solmar year after year and many of our new customers book our villas after recommendations from friends and family.

Whatever type of holiday you have in mind, whether its beach, sports or special interest, we will do everything possible to meet your requirements.

Our ATOL number is ATOL 10334 and as such any flight inclusive holidays booked with us are financially protected.

name: Nature Farmhouse, Private Pool, Sea Access & Cook
description: The Menorcan Farmhouse is the ultimate holiday get-away for families, friends & for those searching for complete privacy & tranquility on the island of Menorca. It is completely immersed in nature & far-away from the sounds and stresses of daily life. The house is set in a private 500 acre estate with fields and forests, vegetable gardens & orchards & direct access to a magic cove & the Cami de Cavall coastal walking trail. It is also near to several sandy beaches: Algaiarens, Es Bot, Cala Pilar
neighborhood_overview: The farm is immersed in pure nature. It is ideal for people who like to get away from it all and be immersed in Menorcas finest nature. It is also ideal for hiking and bike trails as well as kayak excursions. The nearby beaches are extremely beautiful and worth visiting: Algaiarens, Cala Pilar, Cala Morell, Pla de Mar etc....

host_about:
*IMPORANT* - In order to access your villa directions and key collection information, you will need to log-in to the Solmar Villas website. Information on how to do this will be emailed to you once your booking is confirmed. Please note that we will contact you post booking via our Villa Concierge Team in order for you to provide your Advanced Passenger Information. This includes all passenger names, dates of birth, passport details and your flight details, which is required by local authorities.

Solmar Villas is a family run business with over 29 years of experience in arranging high quality, tailor made villa holidays. We pride ourselves in providing the highest quality prompt and personalised service to all our clients - with Solmar Villas, you are in safe hands.

We specialise in providing the very finest villas for perfect villa holidays.

All our villas are carefully chosen and approved by our staff - we select only the highest quality villas in the finest resorts and regions of mainland Spain as well as the Balearics  and Canary Islands, Portugal, Greek Islands,  Cyprus and Croatia.

Our selection of villas include a wide range of properties from traditional style houses offering peace and privacy in the countryside, to luxury villas with pools and breath-taking coastal views. 

Solmar has built a loyal customer base. Many of our clients use Solmar year after year and many of our new customers book our villas after recommendations from friends and family.

Whatever type of holiday you have in mind, whether its beach, sports or special interest, we will do everything possible to meet your requirements.

Our ATOL number is ATOL 10334 and as such any flight inclusive holidays booked with us are financially protected.
neighbourhood: Cala en Porter, Illes Balears, Spain

name: Appartamento Melissa - Son Bou
description: In the beautiful and famous town of Son Bou, just a 5-minute walk from the longest beach on the island, in a great place for families with children. It is rented in a complex with a large pool  (to access it you have to pay for a consumption), this new apartment, newly renovated, the apartment located on the first floor, enjoys from the large terrace with a partial sea view. 2 bedrooms, bathroom with shower and bidet, spacious living room with fully equipped kitchen.
neighborhood_overview: Son Bou, located south of the island of Menorca, offers the longest beach with over 2.5 km of fine sand and crystal clear water. A few steps from the apartment, there are SuperMarket, Bar and Ristornati. Within the community there is a large swimming pool available for guests. As well as a medical center for every urgency.
host_about:
Hola a todos, ¡me llamo Davide!
Soy ciudadano suizo y llevo varios años viviendo y trabajando apasionadamente en Menorca. Aquí fundé Menorca4You, una agencia de servicios turísticos que ofrece apoyo integral a quienes eligen esta maravillosa isla.
Pongo el corazón en todo lo que hago: la satisfacción de mis clientes es siempre mi prioridad.
Si has elegido Menorca para tus vacaciones, estaré encantada de ayudarte a vivirla.

name: Villa Thea by Escape Home
description:
Villa Thea is perfectly located in the sought-after resort of Cala Blanca, within walking distance of all amenities, including two fine white sand beaches. With a fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher, electric oven, ceramic hob, microwave, capsule and Italian coffee maker, refrigerator with freezer, washing machine, toaster, kettle.
It consists of a living / dining room with Tv with a large and comfortable sofa and table with chairs for 6 people.
host_about:
Escape Home es la marca bajo la que World2Meet, la división de viajes del Grupo Iberostar, opera la plataforma de alquiler vacacional de Villas y Apartamentos. Es nuestra plataforma de crecimiento y marco de inspiración para alcanzar el liderazgo.

Todos nuestros alojamientos están cuidadosamente seleccionados por nuestros expertos en Islas Baleares, Canarias y Algarve. Gracias a la gestión integral garantizamos que todas las propiedades cumplen con las normativas vigentes y los estándares de limpieza e higiene, así como las normativas y desinfecciones en lo relativo a COVID-19.

Ofrecemos un servicio de calidad, profesional y cercano tanto a los propietarios como a los huéspedes para hacer de este proceso una experiencia única. Nuestra misión es hacerle sentir como en casa. Soñamos, como tú, con tus vacaciones y nada nos supone mayor recompensa que tu reconocimiento a nuestro empeño.

description:
For The Summer Season 2025: Bathroom Totally Reformed!
The apartment Ca L'avi I S'avia is located on the beautiful beach of Punta Prima, in the first row of the sea. This privileged location makes it stand out and is an important part of its charm and success. Sitting on the terrace or from the garden you can enjoy a truly wonderful view and atmosphere. It gives the impression that a part of the beach is yours. You have the sea with its turquoise blue color directly in front of you.
neighborhood_overview: Punta Prima is a small but very complete holiday resort with a nice beach of white fine sand. Here you will find everything you need, restaurants, bars, car and bike rental, pharmacy, two supermarkets, souvenir shops, a handicraft market several days a week. There is a regular bus connection with the capital Mahón, which is only about 12 km away. So you can also take easily advantage of the wide range of cultural and gastronomic offers there.

name: Family-friendly Villa in Menorca sea views & pool
description:
Villa Sol Del Este is a large Manor-style villa with a private pool and spacious gardens, with fantastic sea views. This spacious Menorcan villa is close to the cafes of Mahon's bustling port with magnificent views to the mouth of Mahon harbour and the open sea.
The house is furnished to a high standard. The villa boasts air conditioning/heating in all the bedrooms.
Reviews at Home Away: property number 1644532
During the summer months, the Villa is rented from Saturday to Saturday.
neighborhood_overview:
This Menorcan villa is in the residential area of Sol Del Este, just a short walk from the village of Es Castell with its pretty harbourside cove, and Calas Fons where there is a wide choice of shops, bars and restaurants.
'Sol Del Este' literally translates to 'Eastern sun'. Located in the most easterly township in Menorca, making it the first place in Spain to receive the early morning sun.
The Villa stands in a privileged position with uninterrupted views over the entrance to Mahon's magnificent harbor.
Located on the outskirts of the village of Es Castell with many local shops, bars and even a weekly gypsy market. There are two well-frequented restaurants within a five minute walk of the villa and many more within a further ten minutes.

You are able to take a leisurely stroll to Calas Fons and relax by the water’s edge, sipping a cold drink or dining in one of the quaint cafes. The cobbled steps leading down to the portside are draped with colorful stalls
host_about:
I am Jorge, from Madrid. Economist. I love travelling and being in the nature, either hiking or diving. Married with Lucía and father of two boys.
I also rent a family-friendly villa in Menorca, the best island in the Mediterranean! :)

host_about:
*IMPORANT* - In order to access your villa directions and key collection information, you will need to log-in to the Solmar Villas website. Information on how to do this will be emailed to you once your booking is confirmed. Please note that we will contact you post booking via our Villa Concierge Team in order for you to provide your Advanced Passenger Information. This includes all passenger names, dates of birth, passport details and your flight details, which is required by local authorities.

Solmar Villas is a family run business with over 29 years of experience in arranging high quality, tailor made villa holidays. We pride ourselves in providing the highest quality prompt and personalised service to all our clients - with Solmar Villas, you are in safe hands.

We specialise in providing the very finest villas for perfect villa holidays.

All our villas are carefully chosen and approved by our staff - we select only the highest quality villas in the finest resorts and regions of mainland Spain as well as the Balearics  and Canary Islands, Portugal, Greek Islands,  Cyprus and Croatia.

Our selection of villas include a wide range of properties from traditional style houses offering peace and privacy in the countryside, to luxury villas with pools and breath-taking coastal views. 

Solmar has built a loyal customer base. Many of our clients use Solmar year after year and many of our new customers book our villas after recommendations from friends and family.

Whatever type of holiday you have in mind, whether its beach, sports or special interest, we will do everything possible to meet your requirements.

Our ATOL number is ATOL 10334 and as such any flight inclusive holidays booked with us are financially protected.

name: Casa Rockmorell, 9 pers. villa with private pool
description:
Casa Rockmorell, situated in the higher part of Cala Morell, is a beautiful house overlooking the pine forest. The place is known for its impressive cliffs, wonderful sunsets and some of the oldest prehistoric settlements on the island. White houses and reflecting light, characterize the bay. The sheltered cove is a fantastic site for swimming and snorkeling. Hikers find themselves only two steps away from the´Cami de Cavalls`
minimum stay one week, Sat. to Sat.
(partly disable friendly)

host_about:
Deutsch:
Rockmare … hinter diesem Namen steht eine Person, mit einem vielseitigem Betätigungsfeld.
Martin Rockmann, Jahrgang 1970 und ausgebildeter Handwerker, lebt seit 1991 vorwiegend auf Menorca. Die Nähe zur Natur und zum Wassersport sind einige seiner Gründe auf dieser Insel zu leben und zu arbeiten.
Superhost 2021, 2020, 2019

English:
Rockmare - behind the name you find one person, offering a large range of activities and services.
Martin Rockmann, born in 1970, originally trained as a professional blacksmith and has spent most of his time in Menorca since 1991. The chance to live and work close to water sports and nature made the island such an attractive place to live for him.
Superhost summer 2021, 2020, 2019

Español:
Rockmare - Me gustaría presentarme, soy Martin Rockmann, nacido el 1970, vivo y trabajo desde el año 1991 en la isla de Menorca. Aunque estoy titulado en la especialidad de herrero, en realidad realizo varios trabajos, algunos de los cuales detallo más abajo.
Mi interés por la naturaleza y la pasión por deportes relacionados con el mar es una de mis razones para vivir en Menorca.
Superhost temporada 2021, 2020, 2019

name: Large house in Fornells with swimming pool
description: Spacious and bright house in Fornells with private pool and large terrace. This two-storey accommodation is perfect for families or groups looking to enjoy an unforgettable holiday in Menorca. With a quiet location just 2 minutes from the centre of Fornells, you will have easy access to all amenities while enjoying the peace and serenity of this charming area.
neighborhood_overview: Fornells is a charming village located on the north coast of the island of Menorca. With its natural harbour, cobbled streets and seafaring traditions, Fornells offers an authentic and relaxing experience for visitors looking to escape the hustle and bustle and immerse themselves in the tranquillity of coastal life.

name: Villa Waldemar - Close to Son Bou Beach
description: Villa Waldemar is a Menorcan style semi-detached house, located in a small area of ​​3 more houses, which share the garden and pool area. The terrace offers lovely views of the outdoor communal pool and partial sea views, which can be enjoyed from the outdoor tables and chairs.
neighborhood_overview: Son Bou, nestled on the southern coast of Menorca, is a picturesque resort town renowned for its stunning beaches and relaxed Mediterranean atmosphere. Boasting one of the island’s longest beaches with soft golden sands and crystal-clear turquoise waters, Son Bou is a haven for sun-seekers and water enthusiasts. The resort offers a range of amenities, including beachfront cafes, restaurants serving delicious local cuisine, and shops for leisurely strolls. The surrounding nature reserve adds a touch of wild beauty, making it an ideal destination for nature lovers. Whether you’re basking in the sun, exploring the coastal trails, or enjoying the vibrant nightlife, Son Bou invites visitors to savour the beauty and tranquility of Menorca’s southern shores.

neighborhood_overview:
Alaior is a medieval village of 9,000 inhabitants that grew around the parish church of Santa Eulalia, on the side of a small hill.
Its quiet white-washed house streets invite you to take restful and quiet walks, with a varied range of restaurants and shops.
Its excellent location makes it a good starting point for getting to know the entire island, both for hiking trails and for visiting any of its many coves.

name: Finca Binimazoch
description:
Situation:
This private estate (of around 120 hectares) is located on the road from Mahón to Fornells, very close to Arenal d'en Castell beach and the natural port of Addaia. From the property, it is very easy to visit the virgin beaches of the north of the island (Favaritx, Cavallería, Pregonda), and its proximity to both the port and city of Mahón and the fishing port of Fornells will allow you to visit these lively places and enjoy their renowned restaurants.

name: Apartment in Fornells
description:
Fantastic duplex located on the Paseo Marítimo de Fornells. On the first floor there is a spacious living room with access to the terrace, the kitchen and a toilet. Upstairs are the three bedrooms (two of them with access to another terrace) and 2 bathrooms. In addition, the apartment has another terrace where you can enjoy incredible views of the port and town of Fornells.

If you are looking for a comfortable, practical apartment with views, BOLITX is, without a doubt, a perfect option. Summer nights on the terrace, overlooking the port of Fornells and with a glass of wine, don't let them tell you about it, enjoy it!
neighborhood_overview:
Fornells is one of the most exclusive and most charming holiday destinations in the Mediterranean, a small fishing village located on the north coast of Menorca where the landscape has the highest level of protection in the EU.

The village of Fornells is formed by a wonderful historical center next to the port with its lovely pedestrian streets, a beautiful promenade and well-kept residential areas around the center.

In Fornells you will find the best offer of activities. Boat trips, scuba diving, kayaking, boat rentals, windsurfing, hiking and many more for companies with great experience.

Fornells offers a great and diverse gastronomic offer including three of the best restaurants in Menorca with its famous lobster, fresh fish and other surprising dishes.

You can enjoy the marvelous crystal waters of the Bay of Fornells in its protected swimming areas in the sea and you can easily go to the best beaches of Menorca.

In Fornells yo
host_about:
En SOM Menorca, fundada en 1990, encontrará la mejor selección de casas y apartamentos para que disfrute sus vacaciones en Menorca. 

En SOM Menorca fomentamos hábitos, actitudes y comportamientos en favor del respeto por el medio ambiente, la lucha contra el cambio climático y una mejor conservación del ecosistema menorquín. Asimismo, apoyamos el comercio de proximidad y defendemos las tradiciones y la cultura menorquina

name: Villa with pool and sea views, Binidalí, Menorca
description:
It is situated in Binidali, Menorca, a delightful residential area on the south coast of Menorca, sea view and walking distance to the beach. The property sits on a magnificent plot with terrace, a swimming pool and sea views, ideal for spending pleasant times in good company. Pool fence on request. The single storey house comprises three bedrooms with ceiling fans and two bathrooms (one en suite). Barbeque and Internet. Airport within 6 km, restaurants nearby.
Ceiling fans.
neighborhood_overview:
Binidalí is a quiet residential area on the south coast of Menorca. There are no hotels or complexes of apartments. nearby a nice, small, sandy beach. There are couple or bars in the village. Only 8 km from Mahón.

Other close beaches: Binbeca, Punta prima, Binisafuller, Es Canutells.

name: Villa Panorama by Escape Home
description:
If you’re looking for a villa with amazing and breath-taking views, Villa Panorama is the villa for you, it is located in the resort of Calan Porter and sleeps up to 10 people.
Spacious villa with 3 double bedrooms with 2 single beds each and 2 bedrooms with double beds, 1 fully equipped bathroom and 2 bathrooms with showers. The villa has a spacious “open plan” kitchen joining the dinning area with a lovely glass window overlooking the terrace area and the sea views.
host_about:
Escape Home es la marca bajo la que World2Meet, la división de viajes del Grupo Iberostar, opera la plataforma de alquiler vacacional de Villas y Apartamentos. Es nuestra plataforma de crecimiento y marco de inspiración para alcanzar el liderazgo.

Todos nuestros alojamientos están cuidadosamente seleccionados por nuestros expertos en Islas Baleares, Canarias y Algarve. Gracias a la gestión integral garantizamos que todas las propiedades cumplen con las normativas vigentes y los estándares de limpieza e higiene, así como las normativas y desinfecciones en lo relativo a COVID-19.

Ofrecemos un servicio de calidad, profesional y cercano tanto a los propietarios como a los huéspedes para hacer de este proceso una experiencia única. Nuestra misión es hacerle sentir como en casa. Soñamos, como tú, con tus vacaciones y nada nos supone mayor recompensa que tu reconocimiento a nuestro empeño.

name: Alabama Van Menorca
description:
You won't forget your stay in this romantic and memorable place on a dream island like Menorca. Living the vanlife experience will not leave you indifferent with this beautiful camper van equipped with everything you need to make your vacation unique memories. Sleep under the stars, lulled by the sea. Enjoy orange sunsets and bright sunrises.
A luxury for the senses, free yourself from the stress of the city by recharging yourself with good energy, all on four wheels.
host_about: extrovertida  y creativa ,amante  de la naturaleza  y de los animales . me gusta la vida sencilla ,sentir el mar cerca ,furgonetear y descubrir cada rincón de  Menorca es mi  pasión.  Crear espacios increíbles dentro de las furgos y reconvertirlas en casitas rodantes desde zero,todo hecho a mano ,es mi trabajo y mi vida.!! Me gusta la gente sincera de mirada limpia ,no me gusta la mentira ni la falsedad . soy honesta, divertida ,simpática y parlanchina !!  .. saludos!!!

host_about:
Hello, in Homerti we are a group of people who are dedicated to managing reservation services in order to give property owners the chance to rent their property. 

Thanks to us, lots of private property owners are able to offer a good service to their clients who rent their properties, which would not be possible without us as many owners lack the necessary know-how .

How can I describe best my team? Well, we are dynamic and active, we speak several languages and do our best to manage your renting so you have a satisfactory stay. 

Besides, I would like to tell you that we visit and check all of our properties on our own. Furthermore, we are there for you in situ and are happy to assist you with all doubts you may have. 

Homerti is your home!,  do you enter?

Hola,  en Homerti somos un grupo de personas que nos dedicamos a gestionar el servicio de reservas para los pequeños propietarios que quieren alquilar sus casas y no pueden encargarse de realizar este trabajo!.
Gracias a nosotros, pequeños propietarios pueden dar un buen servicio a los huéspedes que quieren alquilar sus propiedades. 
¿Cómo puedo describir de mejora manera nuestro equipo? Pues somos gente joven, dinámica y activa, y nos dedicamos a gestionar su alquiler para que su estancia sea totalmente satisfactoria.

host_about:
*IMPORANT* - In order to access your villa directions and key collection information, you will need to log-in to the Solmar Villas website. Information on how to do this will be emailed to you once your booking is confirmed. Please note that we will contact you post booking via our Villa Concierge Team in order for you to provide your Advanced Passenger Information. This includes all passenger names, dates of birth, passport details and your flight details, which is required by local authorities.

Solmar Villas is a family run business with over 29 years of experience in arranging high quality, tailor made villa holidays. We pride ourselves in providing the highest quality prompt and personalised service to all our clients - with Solmar Villas, you are in safe hands.

We specialise in providing the very finest villas for perfect villa holidays.

All our villas are carefully chosen and approved by our staff - we select only the highest quality villas in the finest resorts and regions of mainland Spain as well as the Balearics  and Canary Islands, Portugal, Greek Islands,  Cyprus and Croatia.

Our selection of villas include a wide range of properties from traditional style houses offering peace and privacy in the countryside, to luxury villas with pools and breath-taking coastal views. 

Solmar has built a loyal customer base. Many of our clients use Solmar year after year and many of our new customers book our villas after recommendations from friends and family.

Whatever type of holiday you have in mind, whether its beach, sports or special interest, we will do everything possible to meet your requirements.

Our ATOL number is ATOL 10334 and as such any flight inclusive holidays booked with us are financially protected.

name: Binife - Villa rodeada de naturaleza y con piscina
description:
Welcome to our spectacular villa where your vacation dreams come true!

This beautiful two-height villa is an oasis of elegance and comfort. With 4 bedrooms, one of them is the master suite with jacuzzi, 3 bathrooms, 2 toilets. Winter and summer salons and kitchens. Private parking, terrace, garden, infinity pool and outdoor jacuzzi. In addition to a heated pool and exercise area.

Comfort and privacy is guaranteed for all guests.
neighborhood_overview:
Our Villa Binife is 15 km from the Menorca airport and located in the town of Alaior. A charming village located in the center of Menorca, thus being an ideal strategic point to explore the entire island.

Alaior has a rich history that dates back to the Talayotic era, its cobblestone streets and traditional stone houses reflect its cultural heritage.

The village core is dominated by its impressive church, which rises majestically above the horizon and offers panoramic views of the surrounding area.

This site is also known for its peaceful ambiance and relaxed lifestyle, making it a sublime place to immerse yourself in the authentic Menorcan life.

Walking through the streets of Alaior is a great pleasure; quaint squares, ancient stone buildings and charming shops with artisan and gastronomic products of the region captivate all tourists.

The local cuisine is exquisite, and in the restaurants and bars of the village traditional di
host_about:
Somos PropiedUp, una empresa especializada en la gestión de propiedades vacacionales en Menorca. 

Nuestro objetivo es que disfrutes de las vacaciones que tanto has soñado, con el máximo confort y una atención personalizada.

Ofrecemos un trato cercano, una atención resolutiva y constante innovación de manos de un equipo experto para mejorar cada experiencia. Para nosotros, tu tranquilidad y satisfacción son la mejor recompensa.

¡Te esperamos!

name: Apartamento superior 1 dormitorio a/c (2AD + 2N)
description: Within the Las Brisas complex with beautiful community pool and 100m from Son Xoriguer beach. One bedroom apartment with ducting air conditioning and washing machine. It's all on the first floor and it's a corner ,with a lot of privacy, very bright and well ventilated, as it has many windows. Lovely views. South facing (sea). MAXIMUM OCCUPANCY 2 ADULTS AND 2 CHILDREN ( 2-16 YEARS OLD) BABIES APART
neighborhood_overview:
The LAS BRISAS complex is strategically located between 2 good beaches: XORIGUER and CALAN BOSCH, both with fine sand and crystal clear waters that have all the services. Both are reached on foot in 5-10 minutes, which is really practical and provides a lot of freedom and rest, as nothing is complicated.
From THE BRISAS, within a 500m radius you will find everything you may need.
From the beach of Son Xoriguer you can continue the "CAMI DE CAVALLS", the old coastal path that has been recovered, for our enjoyment.
At Calan Bosch Marina, known as “the LAKE” you will find everything you might need; as well as at Son Xoriguer Beach. There's also a water park nearby. I recommend a nice walk that hugs the coastline, to the D'Artrutx lighthouse, from where to enjoy the sunset.
host_about:
Me encanta Menorca y compartirla con todos mis huéspedes.
Soy empresaria con 2 hijos y vivo en el campo.
Me encanta leer, viajar, nadar enel mar, excursionear, relajarme con familia y amigos...

name: Private villa with pool in Calan Porter, Menorca
description:
Chalet in Calan Porter with the name "Santa Brígida" is a cozy and safe refuge, which offers its guests a pleasant and quiet environment to ensure a pleasant stay.
We offer suitable accommodation for guests seeking tranquility.
It has 3 double bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, living room with Smart TV, master bedroom with TV, 1000mb fiber WIFI, equipped independent kitchen, terraces with table and work benches with a barbecue and pool with terraces all private.
host_about:
Hola a todos y todas, soy Julio, este chalet que ponemos en alquiler ahora en septiembre de 2018 con Air b&b ya para la próxima temporada es de mi padre, mis hermanas y mío, propietarios directamente sin intermediarios. Llevamos unos años alquilando a través de otra web y nos hemos decidido incluirlo en esta plataforma también, esperando que vaya genial y llegue a muchos más amigos. Es un chalet que construyeron mis padres con sus propias manos y en el que nos hemos criado felizmente, mi madre enfermó y falleció lamentablemente y mi padre está enfermo de alzheimer, lo que se recauda del chalet es para los gastos mensuales de nuestro padre, el centro de alzheimer y una señora que le cuida 24hrs. Esperamos que os guste a aquellos que decidan pasar unas vacaciones en nuestra humilde morada, aquí os esperamos. Abrazos.
Ahhh, si tenéis cualquier duda, poneros en contacto conmigo sin compromiso!!

This is a quiet and spacious place, great for relaxing and resting. The room is very large and has a walk-in closet so you can organize your belongings comfortably. I hope you enjoy your stay in this cozy space!

name: Apartmento con aire  y cerca de la playa, Menorca
description:
In this accommodation you can breathe tranquility.
Beautiful apartment with two communal pools and garden, above the beautiful Son Parc beach on the north coast of Menorca. Two double bedrooms, a bathroom, large terrace with sun loungers, swimming pools, garden, 3 minutes walk to the beach with white sand and crystal clear waters. The apartment has wifi and air conditioning in the living room.
neighborhood_overview: Son Parc has one of the nicest beaches on the island. There are other beaches very close by: Arenal d'en Castell, Caballería, Cala Pregonda.  From the apartment you can go to several restaurants and supermarkets in the area and go swimming on the well-known hiking trails called Camí de Cavalls.

name: Linardo 3, Villa with pool and air conditioning.
description:
Discover Villa Linardo in Menorca
Enjoy a private villa with swimming pool, WiFi, air conditioning and three double bedrooms, one en suite. Equipped kitchen, barbecue area and personalised attention. Ideal for families or friends looking for relaxation, comfort and the authentic Mediterranean spirit, book your perfect holiday in Menorca now!
neighborhood_overview:
AREA AND SURROUNDINGS

Welcome to one of the most charming areas of Menorca. Our house is located in a privileged environment where beaches, coves, nature, and culture come together to offer you an unforgettable experience. Below, we share some must-see places just steps from the accommodation:

Sa Caleta
The nearest beach to the house. Quiet and cozy, it has a small beach bar where you can enjoy a drink by the sea. Ideal for relaxing or snorkeling in its crystal-clear waters.

Clot de sa Cera
Just 50 meters away, this spectacular rocky bathing area allows access to the sea via a ladder or by jumping from rocks between 1 and 4 meters high. Perfect for those seeking a different swim and unique views.

Cala Santandria
Only 400 meters away, it's ideal for families with children. It has restaurants by the sea and is a starting point for walks, such as visiting the Santandria watchtower with beautiful views of the Mediterranean.

name: APARTAMENTO IDEAL PAREJAS COSTA NORTE
description:
Coqueto apartment for two people located in Son Parc, in the northern half of the island. It is an ideal area to be close to everything.
It has a spectacular view of the only golf course, is 1 km from Son Saura beach and has a communal pool.
It has a terrace with barbecue, full bathroom, room with extra large bed, living room, fully equipped kitchen and of course free WiFi.
It is ideal for a quiet and comfortable holiday as a couple.
neighborhood_overview:
Our apartment is in a quiet complex, in a residential area and with stunning views of the golf course. If you come to practice sport it is ideal and if you want to enjoy the landscapes of the island as well.
It's in Son Parc, in the center of the island in the north. This location makes the apartment perfect because you are half a drive from Ciutadella and half a drive from Mahón, the two ends of Menorca.
It's also ideal for enjoying the beach. Arenal de Son Saura is a 4-minute drive and 1.2 km walk to the "Camí de Horse" area. It's a white sand beach and turquoise waters, spectacular!
At the end of the street you have a very chic restaurant and cocktail bar called Romeo and Juliet and a few more steps away, a supermarket, pharmacy, bakery and press.

description:
Traditional Menorcan designer house, distributed over two floors. It consists of 5 double rooms (3 of them with air conditioning), 4 bathrooms and a bathroom. A large living room, which connects with the dining room and kitchen, with a fireplace and has large French windows, has access to a covered terrace.
A guest house with living room, bedroom, kitchen and bathroom. Outside, there are several porches where you can enjoy alfresco dinners and meals and a 50 m2 fenced pool.
neighborhood_overview: The farm is located in one of the most famous rural areas of the island: S'Ullestrà. This place is located just one kilometer from the urban center of Sant Lluís, where you can find bars, restaurants and all kinds of basic services. In turn, the villa is only a 5-minute drive from the best-known beaches on the south coast, such as Binibeca or Punta Prima. It is advisable to have your own vehicle. The house has room for 6 cars.

host_about:
*IMPORANT* - In order to access your villa directions and key collection information, you will need to log-in to the Solmar Villas website. Information on how to do this will be emailed to you once your booking is confirmed. Please note that we will contact you post booking via our Villa Concierge Team in order for you to provide your Advanced Passenger Information. This includes all passenger names, dates of birth, passport details and your flight details, which is required by local authorities.

Solmar Villas is a family run business with over 29 years of experience in arranging high quality, tailor made villa holidays. We pride ourselves in providing the highest quality prompt and personalised service to all our clients - with Solmar Villas, you are in safe hands.

We specialise in providing the very finest villas for perfect villa holidays.

All our villas are carefully chosen and approved by our staff - we select only the highest quality villas in the finest resorts and regions of mainland Spain as well as the Balearics  and Canary Islands, Portugal, Greek Islands,  Cyprus and Croatia.

Our selection of villas include a wide range of properties from traditional style houses offering peace and privacy in the countryside, to luxury villas with pools and breath-taking coastal views. 

Solmar has built a loyal customer base. Many of our clients use Solmar year after year and many of our new customers book our villas after recommendations from friends and family.

Whatever type of holiday you have in mind, whether its beach, sports or special interest, we will do everything possible to meet your requirements.

Our ATOL number is ATOL 10334 and as such any flight inclusive holidays booked with us are financially protected.

name: Casa Faro - Tranquilidad y belleza a pasos del mar
description:
Welcome to our charming house in Menorca, a corner of paradise where tranquility and natural beauty merge to offer you an unforgettable vacation.
Opposite the Faro d'Artruxt, this apartment with a swimming pool is perfect for 4 people, ideal for families or groups of friends looking for superior comfort. It is very close to Cala En Bosch, Son Xoriguer beaches, and the marina.
Your vacation will have a special sparkle at Casa Faro. Let yourself be impregnated by its light!
neighborhood_overview:
From crystal-clear beaches and hidden coves to local restaurants and outdoor activities, there's something for everyone.

The apartment is located 10 kilometers south of Ciutadella de Menorca, just in front of Faro d'Artrux, 5 minutes from Son Xoriguer, one of the most paradisiacal areas of the island of Menorca. Close to Cala En Bosch and Son Xoriguer beaches, and 800 meters from the marina, our apartment is the perfect starting point to discover the charms of Menorca.

Just 50 meters from the apartment are the cliffs of Faro d'Artrux where you can catch a glimpse of the best sunsets.

If you're looking for beaches:
- A 5-minute drive takes you to Cala Son Xoriguer, a cove with white sand and turquoise waters where you can also find water sports rentals.

- A 25-minute drive away you will have the famous Arenal de Son Saura, Cala Turqueta and Macarella, the most photographed beaches on the island.

name: Villa Luciana - Radiante casa vecina del mar
description:
A stay at our property is the special seasoning for an unforgettable vacation in Menorca.
A stone's throw from the sea, with stunning views of the Mediterranean, the villa stands out for its white walls, terracotta tiles, splendid balconies, garden, and swimming pool.
Located in Son Bou, one of the areas with the largest beaches on the island, Villa Luciana will be your ally when it comes to experiencing a stay embraced by the sea breeze, tranquility, and comfort.
neighborhood_overview:
Villa Luciana is located in Son Bou, a small tourist area on the south coast of Menorca. 200 meters away is the longest beach on the island with shallow waters and fine white sand.


The water is crystal clear and transparent, with a turquoise blue color that invites you to swim and enjoy the sun. The bottom of the beach is sandy and soft, making it ideal for families with children and for water sports.


There are several restaurants and bars along the beach that offer a variety of dishes and drinks. There are also several companies that rent equipment for water sports such as paddle surfing, kayaking, or water biking.


Behind Son Bou beach is the Prat de Son Bou nature reserve, which includes dunes, marshes, and numerous bird species.


Very close by are also the early Christian ruins of the Basilica of Son Bou. To the east, inside is the Torre d'en Galmés, an ancient settlement known for its stone towers or talayots.

description: In the village of Es Grau, the best area of Menorca, without agglomerations, in the most familiar beach of Menorca and within the natural park of S'albufera,  this one-bedroom apartment and a sofa-bed, living room, bathroom and terrace, just three minutes walk from the beach is the ideal place for a family vacation or as a couple on the beach. neighborhood_overview:
Quiet and privileged like few others, the small fishing village of Es Grau is one of the most beautiful spots on the Menorcan coast. Its white houses pose as if they were inside a large canvas, they are part of the history of the summer of people in Menorca. Without hotels or nightclubs, you have to discover Es Grau. No hotels or clubs, you have to discover Es Grau.

description:
Escape to this beautiful 2-bedroom villa in the heart of Cala’n Porter, Menorca—ideal for couples or small groups looking for a relaxing getaway. With air-conditioned bedrooms, two bathrooms, and a fully fitted kitchen, this villa offers all the comforts of home.

host_about:
*IMPORANT* - In order to access your villa directions and key collection information, you will need to log-in to the Solmar Villas website. Information on how to do this will be emailed to you once your booking is confirmed. Please note that we will contact you post booking via our Villa Concierge Team in order for you to provide your Advanced Passenger Information. This includes all passenger names, dates of birth, passport details and your flight details, which is required by local authorities.

Solmar Villas is a family run business with over 29 years of experience in arranging high quality, tailor made villa holidays. We pride ourselves in providing the highest quality prompt and personalised service to all our clients - with Solmar Villas, you are in safe hands.

We specialise in providing the very finest villas for perfect villa holidays.

All our villas are carefully chosen and approved by our staff - we select only the highest quality villas in the finest resorts and regions of mainland Spain as well as the Balearics  and Canary Islands, Portugal, Greek Islands,  Cyprus and Croatia.

Our selection of villas include a wide range of properties from traditional style houses offering peace and privacy in the countryside, to luxury villas with pools and breath-taking coastal views. 

Solmar has built a loyal customer base. Many of our clients use Solmar year after year and many of our new customers book our villas after recommendations from friends and family.

Whatever type of holiday you have in mind, whether its beach, sports or special interest, we will do everything possible to meet your requirements.

Our ATOL number is ATOL 10334 and as such any flight inclusive holidays booked with us are financially protected.
neighbourhood: Cala en Porter, Illes Balears, Spain

host_about:
*IMPORANT* - In order to access your villa directions and key collection information, you will need to log-in to the Solmar Villas website. Information on how to do this will be emailed to you once your booking is confirmed. Please note that we will contact you post booking via our Villa Concierge Team in order for you to provide your Advanced Passenger Information. This includes all passenger names, dates of birth, passport details and your flight details, which is required by local authorities.

Solmar Villas is a family run business with over 29 years of experience in arranging high quality, tailor made villa holidays. We pride ourselves in providing the highest quality prompt and personalised service to all our clients - with Solmar Villas, you are in safe hands.

We specialise in providing the very finest villas for perfect villa holidays.

All our villas are carefully chosen and approved by our staff - we select only the highest quality villas in the finest resorts and regions of mainland Spain as well as the Balearics  and Canary Islands, Portugal, Greek Islands,  Cyprus and Croatia.

Our selection of villas include a wide range of properties from traditional style houses offering peace and privacy in the countryside, to luxury villas with pools and breath-taking coastal views. 

Solmar has built a loyal customer base. Many of our clients use Solmar year after year and many of our new customers book our villas after recommendations from friends and family.

Whatever type of holiday you have in mind, whether its beach, sports or special interest, we will do everything possible to meet your requirements.

name: Relax & Recharge in our sea view Menorca Hideaway
description: Stunning two bedroom apartment with panoramic sea views 5 minutes from the beach; located in a tranquil two storey complex in sought after Arenal d'en Castell with communal swimming pool and gorgeous landscaped gardens, fantastic for couples or families.  Walking distance to local shops, bus stops, restaurants and bars all with quiet low key traditional feel.  Located 25 minutes from the airport, 20 minutes from the historic capital of Mahon and with good road links to the rest of the island.
neighborhood_overview:
Arenal d'en Castell is situated on the northern coast and the town curves around the outstanding horseshoe shaped bay and is within an easy bus ride of other towns to visit.

The bay is as close to a near perfect horseshoe as you can get. The headlands on the waters' horizon close in so much so that you think you might be standing by a large saltwater lake. The eastern end of the resort and beach is more naturally intact with wooded areas and sand dunes.

Rated in the top 5 best resort beaches on Menorca, especially for smaller children due to it's perfect sands and gently sloping shallows into crystal clear turquoise waters. And while this makes it very popular for children it's big enough for those who prefer to avoid the little ones to find their ideal spots! Sun lounger, umbrella, pedalo, kayak hire is available on the beach.

A wooden boardwalk runs from the from eastern end to beach cafe-bars - so ideal for strolls ( Wheelchairs possible too )
neighbourhood: Arenal d'en Castell, Illes Balears, Spain

Within a 500-meter radius you can find: a bus stop, pharmacy, supermarkets, restaurant area, cocktail bars, and car and motorcycle rental companies. Cédric and David

name: VILLA LANTANA - Class and style with incredible views over Mahon harbour
description: EXQUISITE LUXURY FRONT LINE VILLA IN CALA LLONGA, OVERLOOKING MAHON HARBOUR. EXCLUSIVE DECORATION, POOL, AC, WIFI.
neighborhood_overview: There is an enchanting bathing area right in front of the villa, with benches which are ideal for resting on, and fabulous panoramic views of the harbour. Along the street, after the moorings, you will find a supermarket, just 6 minutes walk away. The surroundings give you the opportunity to take beautiful walks along the harbour, with a charming playground in first sea line. However, a car will be necessary. Some 9 minutes away by car, you will find one of the island’s best fish restaurants. It is literally hanging over the edge of a cliff, and has beautiful views of Cala Mesquida, which is one of our favourite beaches- one of the most beautiful ones in Menorca. Mahón and its lively port, located just 10 minutes away by car or water taxi (the boarding area is next to the villa)

name: Apartamento a 50metros del mar
description: Our charming apartment with 3 double bedrooms and two bathrooms, it is very practical to spend relaxed stays in Menorca. A short while from the best beaches in southern Ciutadella and 15min away from downtown.
neighborhood_overview: The proximity of the sea and the quiet people who reside in the area make this place a perfect place to rest. It is a residential area with individual houses, allowing for some privacy.
host_about:
En realidad el apartamento es de mis padres. Ellos residen todo el año en Menorca. Hace mucho que están interesados en tener huéspedes. Somos personas muy abiertas, nos gusta recibir a gente en casa y enseñarles nuestro estilo de vida isleño. Entendemos que nuestros huéspedes quieran conocer nuestras costumbre ya que a nosotros al visitar otros lugares queremos apreciar su cultura y su gastronomía. Por ello ofrecemos asesoramiento de los lugares que visitar y actividades a realizar en nuestra isla, ya que sería algo que a nosotros nos gusta de cuando vamos a otros sitios. 

A mi personalmente me gusta viajar para hacer fotos, he estudiado Bellas Artes y soy fotógrafa.

Nos gusta la agricultura ecológica, por eso ofrecemos una cesta de verduras de bienvenida de nuestro huerto.

name: Na Joanassa, the Endemic House
description:
Special house in a special place,
license nbr ET 1843 ME
register nbr CRU07013000339264
host_about:
We wish you the best holiday possible on this most tranquil island. 
Have a look at the accommodation we have on offer. You book your own flight (contact us if you need advice on which airlines to look at) and when you book your accommodation with us we will be there to assist in every way We can to give you a fantastic holiday. We can meet you at the airport, arrange transfers to your accomadation, book car hire or excursions or call with you for a chat to advise you on the best restaurants and the best places to go on the Island and how to get there. The choices are all yours. And should you have any problems we are only a phone call and five minutes away from you. So you have the flexibility of booking your own holiday but our support there if you need it.

Usted reserva sus vuelos (Contáctenos si necesita asesoramiento sobre qué compañías aéreas a mirar) y y al reservar su alojamiento con nosotros estaremos allí para ayudar en todos los sentidos que podemos para darle unas excelentes vacaciones. Podemos buscarles en el aeropuerto, organizar traslados a la propiedad, ayudarle en el alquiler de coches o reservar excursiones. Durante su estancia, llamenos y con gusto le aconsejaremos sobre los mejores restaurantes y los mejores lugares para ir en la isla y cómo llegar allí. Las opciones son todas tuyos. Y si usted tiene cualquier problema estamos a sólo una llamada telefónica y a tan sólo cinco minutos de usted. Así que, tienes la flexibilidad de organizar sus propias vacaciones pero todo nuestro apoyo si es necesario.

name: Apartamentos Biniforcat CB, 16 (Cala  a 5 minutos)
description:
First floor apartment for 4 guests. Composed of 2 double bedrooms, kitchen, living room with sofa and TV, bathroom, washing machine, terrace, communal pool, direct access to the beach of Cala'n Forcat. Located 4km from Ciutadella and with all kinds of services nearby.

We offer parking but since there are more apartments than you can, we cannot guarantee the permanent availability of the spaces.

It has hot water only in the bathroom and does not have wifi.
neighborhood_overview:
It is a quiet neighborhood.
Biniforcat apartments are located on "Avenida de los Delfines" (Cala en Blanes), just 4 km from Ciutadella.
Along the avenue there are several restaurants, bars, small supermarkets, souvenir shops… (you can walk). There is also a small aqua park, bouncy castles and leisure areas for the little ones.
There are several beaches nearby: Cala'n Forcat (4 minutes walk - 200 meters), Cales Piques (4 minutes walk - 200 meters), Cala 'n Brut (15 minutes walk - 1.2 km), Cala'n Blanes (20 minutes walk - 1.4 km).
In high season there is a little more movement, but in general it is a quiet neighborhood.

name: Petit appartement cosy et fonctionnel
description:
This perfectly located home offers easy and quick access to all sites and amenities. Indeed, located to the east of the Island at the entrance of Mahon harbor it allows quick access to all the interesting places in the eastern half of the island, whether it is beaches, rocky areas or Mahon, capital of the island.
Es Castell is a charming little town with great amenities.
The apartment is therefore not "central"... but very well located.
It will be a perfect pied-à-terre.

name: Casa Díaz
description:
Our apartment with a communal pool for 4 people is located on a quiet side street, 3 minutes' walk from the Calan Bosch marina. In about another 4 minutes' walk you can reach Calan Bosch beach with its fine white sand.
On the Cami de Cavalls, you can reach Son Xoriguer beach after another 5 minutes.
neighborhood_overview:
Calan Bosch is a quiet and family zone that is ideal for switching off and relaxing. Loud music from loudspeakers, televisions or other systems is not allowed from 10 pm to 8 am.
Very close by, a 3-minute walk away, is the marina of Calan Bosch where you will find cafes, bars, restaurants and a nice atmosphere in the evening to enjoy a cocktail right on the water. Here in the harbor is the excursion boat AMIGOS, which starts twice a day to explore Menorca's south coast. After another 4 minutes you are at Calan Bosch beach, where umbrellas and sun loungers are rented.
Cap de Artrutx is about a 10-minute walk from the apartment, ideal for enjoying a sensational sunset.

neighborhood_overview: APARTAMENTOS CALAN BLANES PARK, C.B. APM-2142- Nº 302

Cuando no tenemos disponibilidad para disfrutarlo, lo compartimos con aquellos que quieran vivir momentos inolvidables. Está decorado con mucho cariño, porque para nosotros, los pequeños detalles son los que marcan la diferencia.

name: Villa Bella
description:
Unique villa, maximum luxury with all the details. It is oriented to the enjoyment for its visitors, it has the best facilities, amenities and furnishings possible. Built in 2017, the house combines modernity with quality, without neglecting details such as the white tones and the dry wall of the island of Menorca.
It is ideal for groups and families with children thanks to its 200 + meter area. It has four large bedrooms, three bathrooms, kitchen and a large living room.
neighborhood_overview:
Unique villa, maximum luxury with all the details. It is oriented to the enjoyment for its visitors, it has the best facilities,

The villa is located a few minutes from the town of Arenal de'n Castell (1km), Son Parc (1km), Puerto de Addaia (1.5km), and na Macaret (2km). Thanks to its location, in the center of the island, it is very easy to get anywhere, having a few meters from the family beach of Arenal d'en Castell. In addition, the development has all the amenities: supermarkets, restaurants, medical care, pharmacy and leisure venues. The famous town of Fornells is a 15-minute drive, and the Puerto d'Addaia seaport is less than 5 minutes away, where you can enjoy many water activities.

Ah, golf lovers are in luck, since the only course in Menorca is only 1 km away!

name: Apartment in Fornells
description:
Beautiful second floor apartment located in the Es Castell complex in Fornells.

The Es Castell complex in Fornells is located in front of the sea on the first line, from the terraces of the apartments you can enjoy a spectacular view over the bay of Fornells. It has access to the magnificent swimming pool by the sea, and to a protected swimming area at sea.

The apartment consists of a bedroom with double bed and another bedroom with two single beds, a bathroom, living-dinning room, fully equipped open plan kitchen and large terrace with outdoor furniture and spectacular panoramic views.

It also has a private car parking lot. Free wi-fi internet access.



Amenities: Washing Machine, Dishwasher, kettle, TV, Terrace, oven, microwave, toaster, fridge / freezer, internet connection, 2 x single bed, king size bed, Private parking, Iron, Ironing Board, Seaview, Fishing, Golf, Sailing, Snorkeling, Tennis, Wireless Internet, Smoking allow
neighborhood_overview:
Fornells is one of the most exclusive and charming holiday destinations in the Mediterranean, a small fishing village located on the north coast of Menorca where the landscape has the highest level of protection in the EU.

The village of Fornells is made up of a wonderful historic center next to the port with its charming pedestrian streets, a beautiful Maritime Promenade and well-kept residential areas around the center. will find the best offer of activities. Boat trips, scuba diving, kayaking, boat rentals, windsurfing, hiking and many more for companies with great experience in Fornells.

Fornells offers a varied gastronomic offer including three of the best restaurants in Menorca with its famous lobster, fresh fish and other surprising dishes.

You can enjoy the incredible waters of the Bay of Fornells in its protected swimming areas in the sea and you can easily go to the best beaches of Menorca.

neighborhood_overview:
San Jaime Mediterráneo, also known as Son Bou, is a charming town located on the island of Menorca, in the Balearic Islands, Spain. This beautiful coastal area is one of the most popular destinations for tourists and visitors looking for an unforgettable experience in the Spanish Mediterranean.

The main attraction of San Jaime Mediterranean is its stunning beach more than 2 kilometers long. With its fine white sand and crystal clear waters, Son Bou Beach is great for sunbathing, swimming, and water sports. The natural landscape surrounding this town is simply amazing, with dunes and protected areas that offer a quiet and relaxing atmosphere.

San Jaime Mediterranean has a wide range of accommodations, from luxury hotels to apartments and villas to rent. It also offers a wide variety of restaurants, bars and shops, where visitors can taste the delicious local cuisine and buy unique souvenirs.

name: Fabulous Villa with Private Pool in Tranquil Area
description: Villa Sa Calma 5: Serene retreat in Cala Molí. Home away from home with a private pool,  easy access to wooden docks and Na Macaret beach. Close to Arenal d'en Castell for lively atmosphere. Explore Mahón and Ciutadella within 20 minutes.
neighborhood_overview: Villa Sa Calma 5, an exceptional property nestled in the serene area of Cala Molí on the northeast coast of the island. Situated behind woodlands, this villa offers easy access to the picturesque wooden docks just a short walk away. Within a 10-minute stroll, you'll find Na Macaret beach, a charming and peaceful destination with a local ambiance. For those seeking more lively surroundings, the popular tourist resort of Arenal d'en Castell, boasting a beautiful white sand beach, bars, and restaurants, is only a 5-minute drive from the villa. Exploring further afield, you'll discover the island's capital, Mahón, and the historic capital, Ciutadella, both within a convenient 20-minute drive in opposite directions. Please note that having a vehicle is necessary during your stay.
