name: Villa Rocamar superbly positioned on the cliffside
description:
This elegant, modern villa is superbly positioned on the cliffside with a gate leading from the villa grounds to bathing platforms below.

A wonderful villa with truly breathtaking sea views. The accommodation is on four levels, the rooms are spacious, light and airy and all of them are furnished and equipped to a high standard. There are both open and covered terraces, a large garden with a lawn area and a large swimming pool. Villa has Airconditioning.
neighborhood_overview:
Do you think That Menorca only offers sun, sandy beaches and crystal-clear water? Don’t be deceived, Menorca is much more than that! This is an exceptional place to actively explore. We have natural parks, a rich cultural heritage, delicious local products and cuisine for you to discover. We have stunning beaches, soaring cliffs, tiny islands and marine reserves teeming with life. There are so many ways to enjoy our coastline so where would you like to start?
You’ll find several supermarkets in the vicinity of the villa, In Ciutadella (just 5 minutes car drive) you’ll find the main supermarkets.
Our restaurant tips are:
Restaurante S' Aturada, very tasty Spanish food at an affordable price. Only 10 minutes walk from villa Rocamar
S’Amarador at the pictoresque harbor of Ciutadella, their specialty is seafood. 4kms
host_about:
Hola!

My name is Sisco and I'm a passionate horse breeder/ entrepreneur who loves to meet people and travel the world. I'm originally from Menorca, a small island in Spain and live in the Netherlands since 1993. Over the past 25 years+ I've been managing a vacation park in the Netherlands together with my wife Jannette, and have been hosting thousands of travelers from all over the world in our holiday park. I really enjoy getting to know our guests, finding out what they'd like to see and experience in the Netherlands and giving that piece of advice that helps our guests experience the surroundings and the Netherlands in a way they didn't expect. I'm a fanatic sporter and run very often in the forest around our Holiday park. Before booking with us, make sure to read the reviews of our previous Guests and please feel free to contact me if you have any question about my listings.
Hope to see you soon,
Sisco

host_about:
Hello, in Homerti we are a group of people who are dedicated to managing reservation services in order to give property owners the chance to rent their property. 

Thanks to us, lots of private property owners are able to offer a good service to their clients who rent their properties, which would not be possible without us as many owners lack the necessary know-how .

How can I describe best my team? Well, we are dynamic and active, we speak several languages and do our best to manage your renting so you have a satisfactory stay. 

Besides, I would like to tell you that we visit and check all of our properties on our own. Furthermore, we are there for you in situ and are happy to assist you with all doubts you may have. 

Homerti is your home!,  do you enter?

Hola,  en Homerti somos un grupo de personas que nos dedicamos a gestionar el servicio de reservas para los pequeños propietarios que quieren alquilar sus casas y no pueden encargarse de realizar este trabajo!.
Gracias a nosotros, pequeños propietarios pueden dar un buen servicio a los huéspedes que quieren alquilar sus propiedades. 
¿Cómo puedo describir de mejora manera nuestro equipo? Pues somos gente joven, dinámica y activa, y nos dedicamos a gestionar su alquiler para que su estancia sea totalmente satisfactoria.
Es muy importante señalar que visitamos y revisamos todas las propiedades a las que realizamos alquileres. Además le atenderemos en destino para cualquier duda que pueda surgir.
Homerti es tu casa! ¿Entras?

neighborhood_overview: Located just 200m from the beach of Cala Blanca, beautiful beach with crystal clear water and perfect for scuba diving or snorkeling . Cala Blanca is located a few minutes from Ciutadella, and the neighborhood itself has all the amenities you may need, such as supermarket (30m from the house), pharmacy, car and motorcycle rental, scuba diving club, and of course good restaurants at a great price.
host_about:
Español residente en Berlin, casado con Beata de Polonia. Tenemos 2 niños y nos gusta viajar y tener nuestro espacio en las ciudades que visitamos. Somos muy limpios y cuidadosos tanto en nuestras casas como en las que tenemos la suerte de visitar. Nos encanta ser invitados en casas autenticas e interactuar con nuestros anfitriones!

Ahora ademas ofrecemos nuestro pequeño rincón en Menorca, recién adquirido en Mayo de 2019 para uso de la familia, y queremos ofrecerlo a personas como nosotros que les gusta la tranquilidad, visitar sitios con mucho encanto, y una casa cómoda y practica.

name: New! Casa Nova de Biniparell
host_about:
Soy socio fundador en GREEN AND BLUE IBIZA, presumimos de tener una marcada cultura local. Dos de nuestros principales valores es pasarlo bien mientras trabajamos y el respeto y cuidado de la Isla.  

Pensamos que trabajar y pasarlo bien es compatible y es uno de nuestros objetivos diarios. Nos encanta compartir con nuestros huéspedes consejos de como pasarlo muy bien en su viaje a Ibiza y ayudarles en todo lo que podamos para que tengan unas vacaciones inolvidables.  

En Ibiza hay fiesta que sin duda hay que disfrutar, pero también no dejar escapar la oportunidad de disfrutar del mar mediterráneo, de su costa, de sus playas, de su bosque de pinos que la caracteriza, de su gastronomía y tradiciones.....  

En Ibiza hay dos colores que marcan nuestra vida GREEN and BLUE  :)

name: Deluxe Hotel Can Alberti
description: All our Deluxe rooms are bright and have an area of ​​23 and 29 m2. They are located on the second and third floors with a magnificent view of the Governor's Palace or a very quiet courtyard.Some of them are located in the attic or have old beams. They are equipped with shower and bathtub, or with an Italian shower with all the comforts.
host_about:
"
The Hotel Boutique Can Albertí was built in the 18th century during the Illustration of Mahón. The Mahón of maritime trade, the great shipowners, the artisans, the landowners who stayed in the city like the Albertís. This city, a military stronghold, experienced an intense dynamic of development, but also a true artistic activity as evidenced by its theatre, one of the oldest in Spain.

In addition to visiting the rich historical heritage of Mahón, it is especially pleasant to walk through it with the softest lights at the end of the day. You can stroll through the winding streets of the old town, go shopping, have a drink in one of the many terraces and in the evening go to one of the very good restaurants in the city."

name: Menorca retreat: lush gardens, fantastic views!
description: Beautiful ground floor apartment with superb views. 3 Bedrooms, 1 bath/shower room, 1 shower room, comfortably sleeps 4 people. One patio overlooks the large communal swimming pool, set in beautifully maintained gardens. The patio to the rear has a dining table with six chairs. Cruise boats pass the garden wall. There is an excellent bar restaurant 2 minutes walk away.  Calas Fonts harbour with its great selection of bars and restaurants is 10 minutes walk away.
neighborhood_overview:
Sol del Este is a small, quiet residential area with a supermarket and an excellent bar/restaurant (Cafeteria Sol del Este), superbly run by Ignacio and his family.

Ten to fifteen minutes walk away is the beautiful bay of Calas Fonts, which is about as close as one can get to an unspoiled Mediterranean harbour. Calas Fonts has just the right number and range of bars and restaurants, from which you can watch local harbour life go by. It's lively and atmospheric without feeling over crowded or commercialised. A nice way to enter the Cala, having walked from La Gardenia, is to take the few steps down to the boardwalk and walk around the harbour edge to the main area of activity.
The small, former garrison, town of Es Castell (Villacarlos) is adjacent to Calas Fonts - you can find good bakeries, bars and small restaurants, and handy shops, in the town centre, as well as the Bercelo Hamilton Hotel, with its excellent Blue Sky Bar - sunset is a must.
Close proximit

name: Villa Maremar en Son Bou, Menorca
description: South-facing villa with amazing ocean views in Son Bou, Menorca. The villa has been completely modernized, making it more comfortable and functional. Outside, its large swimming pool and barbecue will make your vacation start with a capital 'V'!
neighborhood_overview:
The Son Bou development is one of the most visited on the island and a reference when traveling to Menorca.
It is located in the south of the island, 7 km from Alaior. It is a large area with a large sandy beach, a marsh fed by two streams, and a dune area with a wide variety of fauna and flora.

Its location, in the middle of the south coast, makes it an ideal place to explore the island. In less than 30 minutes by car you can travel to the cities of Maó and Ciutadella. Less than 15 minutes away is Alaior, a small and beautiful city that holds a craft market every week. It is easily accessible by bus and, from there, you can go to other cities and resorts in Menorca by public transport.
Behind the beach, the dune area, with some pine trees and scrub, is the dividing line between it and an extensive meadow with one of Menorca's most important wetlands. The terrain gradually rises, and in addition to parking lots, hotels, villas, restaurants, shops, garden areas, a p
host_about:
Hola Soy Montse, soy menorquina y la propietaria de Villa Maremar en Son Bou. Debido a mis ocupaciones laborales Prado se ocupa de gestionar los alquileres de los clientes que quieren venir a visitarnos. En mi perfil encontrareis también su foto para que la conozcais fisicamente cuando os reciba si decidís visitarnos, espero que sí!
--------------------------------
Hola soy Prado, menorquina como Montse y residente en el pueblo de Alaior, a 10 minutos en coche de Villa Maremar por lo que siempre estaré disponible para cualquier duda o pregunta. Mi trabajo es ayudar a los propietarios a gestionar los alquileres de sus propiedades.
Ven a vernos, Menorca puede ofrecerte mucho!!

name: Villa MenorcaHome 14 by Escape Home
description:
Villa MenorcaHome 14 is located in the Calan Bosch urbanisation in the municipality of Ciutadella, about 400 metres from a promenade and 500 metres from Calan Bosch beach.
The property is around 135 m2, of modern style, quadratic in shape, and at street level has a car park with capacity for 2 cars.
In the outdoor area of the property, we have a beautiful garden surrounding the house. On one side of the house, we find the built-in Bbq.
host_about:
Escape Home es la marca bajo la que World2Meet, la división de viajes del Grupo Iberostar, opera la plataforma de alquiler vacacional de Villas y Apartamentos. Es nuestra plataforma de crecimiento y marco de inspiración para alcanzar el liderazgo.

Todos nuestros alojamientos están cuidadosamente seleccionados por nuestros expertos en Islas Baleares, Canarias y Algarve. Gracias a la gestión integral garantizamos que todas las propiedades cumplen con las normativas vigentes y los estándares de limpieza e higiene, así como las normativas y desinfecciones en lo relativo a COVID-19.

Ofrecemos un servicio de calidad, profesional y cercano tanto a los propietarios como a los huéspedes para hacer de este proceso una experiencia única. Nuestra misión es hacerle sentir como en casa. Soñamos, como tú, con tus vacaciones y nada nos supone mayor recompensa que tu reconocimiento a nuestro empeño.

name: Estancia d'en Carretero - Casita Rural
description: S´Estància d'en Carretero is located on an old rural road that linked Mahón with Sant Lluís, nowadays a picturesque example of authentic Menorcan roads, with its dry walls, passing between green fields and country houses. Due to its privileged location between Mahón, Sant Lluís and Es Castell it is the ideal option for those people who want to be close to the main towns and best beaches of the eastern part of Menorca.
neighborhood_overview:
Both in Sant Lluís and in Es Castell there are all kinds of services and they are only between 2 and 3 kilometers from the house. Mahón with its extensive gastronomic and cultural offer is not further away. The pretty beaches of Binibeca, Punta Prima, Alcaufar or Biniancolla are at a short drive, about 7 minutes. If you like hiking or cycling, in the surroundings of the house you can find different routes to enjoy the typical landscape of the island.

name: Villa Binilisa
description:
Overview
Villa Binilisa is located in Binibeca, Menorca. This detached vacation
rental property offers air-conditioning, Free Wi-Fi and sleeps up to 6
people with 3 Bedrooms and 2 Bathrooms. There is a private pool
(South-West Facing) with barbecue and Sea views. Walking distance to
the Beach and Restaurants.
host_about:
As an expression of my passion and love for traveling, I offer visitors the chance to experience and enjoy my beautiful property. 

I have the experience and knowledge necessary to make your stay enjoyable! My goal is to make you feel happy, safe, and confident that you will be satisfied with your stay, from the beginning to the end. 

Before your arrival, I will send you all the necessary arrival information, including driving instructions and key location. 

From the moment you arrive, you know that for whatever you may need during your stay, there will always be someone there to offer assistance or help with any request you may have. 

My phone is always available, and I respond directly to help you feel secure about your decision to book my villa.

name: Apartamento en Cala  Forcat,piscina y WIFI
description:
The apartment is one bedroom with a trundle sofa bed in the dining room , so the maximum capacity is 4 people. Great for couples and families who want tranquility and relaxation.
It has a full bathroom, fully equipped kitchen for cooking and living-dining room with sofa bed , TV32" and terrace overlooking the garden.

Inside the complex there is a barbecue pool and communal garden.

The bus stop and the beach are next door and there is free parking in the surrounding area.

name: Cala Macarelleta: in country-house.
description: Private room on the Upper-floor in the country house “ La gitana del Mar”.
neighborhood_overview: The Menorquín countryside.
host_about:
Hola,ya tengo XX años ( demasiados para escribirlos) y todavía conservo una pasión que domina sobre todas las demás: La Mar y todo  lo que la rodee.
 Aunque no por ello descarte que prefiero mis momentos con mi familia  & "mis amigos", y los placeres de la dolce vitta como a todo el mundo.
Habéis pasado muchos huespedes por casa y con sus dulces momentos siempre he salido más reforzado en mi idea de seguir en este negocio, porque sois vosotros hoy por hoy los que me hacéis vivir el día a día ocupado, y por eso os doy a todos muchas gracias por venir y disfrutar conmigo de este mi  paraiso "La gitana de la Mar" que os cuido para cuando queráis venir a disfrutarlo en la isla de Menorca.
Abrazo

description: Villa Sea Garden is a charming 3 bedroom villa with stunning views of the open water from the upper terrace! Less than a 10 minute walk from the resort’s picturesque rocky cove, the villa is just one street back from the seafront in Calan Forcat with the lively centre packed with restaurants, bars, and shops. You’ll also find a popular waterpark nearby – perfect for family fun.
host_about:
Established in 1986, Villa Plus is the UK’s leading villa accommodation specialist. The expert UK Travel Team and the bi-lingual overseas in-resort team pride themselves on putting the customer at the heart of everything they do, so you can be sure your villa booking is in safe hands. 

The dedicated teams go the extra mile by hand-picking every villa ensuring you will find the quality villa, in the best location for your holiday.

description:
Set back from the road in a spacious terrace fringed by lush hedges, Villa Coralito is the perfect getaway for a peaceful holiday. 


Light and airy interiors with beautiful underwater photography radiate peace and tranquility, and with air conditioning throughout you have a welcome retreat from the hot midday sun. 


The beautiful pool terrace sits to the front of the villa with ample sun loungers in situ proving the ideal spot for hours of relaxation with your favourite book.

host_about:
*IMPORANT* - In order to access your villa directions and key collection information, you will need to log-in to the Solmar Villas website. Information on how to do this will be emailed to you once your booking is confirmed. Please note that we will contact you post booking via our Villa Concierge Team in order for you to provide your Advanced Passenger Information. This includes all passenger names, dates of birth, passport details and your flight details, which is required by local authorities.

Solmar Villas is a family run business with over 29 years of experience in arranging high quality, tailor made villa holidays. We pride ourselves in providing the highest quality prompt and personalised service to all our clients - with Solmar Villas, you are in safe hands.

We specialise in providing the very finest villas for perfect villa holidays.

All our villas are carefully chosen and approved by our staff - we select only the highest quality villas in the finest resorts and regions of mainland Spain as well as the Balearics  and Canary Islands, Portugal, Greek Islands,  Cyprus and Croatia.

Our selection of villas include a wide range of properties from traditional style houses offering peace and privacy in the countryside, to luxury villas with pools and breath-taking coastal views. 

Solmar has built a loyal customer base. Many of our clients use Solmar year after year and many of our new customers book our villas after recommendations from friends and family.

Whatever type of holiday you have in mind, whether its beach, sports or special interest, we will do everything possible to meet your requirements.

Our ATOL number is ATOL 10334 and as such any flight inclusive holidays booked with us are financially protected.

name: Cala en Forcat
description: The holiday apartment Cala en Forcat is located in Menorca, just a short walk from the beach. The 40 m² property consists of a living room with a sofa bed for 2 people, a well-equipped kitchen, 1 bedroom and 1 bathroom, accommodating up to 2 guests. Additional amenities include high-speed Wi-Fi (suitable for video calls) with a dedicated home office workspace, a smart TV with streaming services, a fan and a washing machine. A cot and a high chair are also available.

The heart of this property is its generous swimming pool, perfect for refreshing baths under the tranquil sun of Menorca. name: Apartamentos Las Golondrinas
description:
Ground floor apartment, 45 m2, terrace, 2 double bedrooms, located in a garden and residential area with a swimming pool, 300m from a leisure area and supermarkets. WI-FI.

Located in a private complex with large gardens and a community pool with a children's area.

The apartment is 300 meters from the sea, near the Cap d'Artrutx Lighthouse, 1 km from Cala'n Bosch beach, 1.5 km from Son Xoriguer beach, 8 km from Ciutadella and near the virgin coves of the south coast of Menorca.
neighborhood_overview:
Residential area, very close to the Cala'n Bosch development, which is 1 km away and has all the amenities, as well as a beautiful marina, restaurants, bars, car rental, supermarkets and all the leisure you need.

Close to several bus stops.

The nearest beach of Cala'n Bosch is a 20-minute walk away and Son Xoriguer is 30 minutes away.

name: 4 Bedroom Villa With Swimming Pool, Menorca
description:
The villa is set back from the road on a private plot accessed via secluded stairs. It features:
- Garden
- Swimming pool
- Terrace & BBQ
- Table tennis
- Living room
- Open plan kitchen / dining area
- 2 double bedrooms (that can be set up as twin)
- 1 small twin bedroom
- Independent additional bedroom accessed from the garden (twin / double)
- Ceiling fans & A/C in all rooms
- 2 newly renovated bathrooms
- Shower room & toilet accessed from garden
- Laundry area
- Off street parking
neighborhood_overview:
Located on the famous Cami de Cavalls, an ancient path of 186km that encircles the island, and a favourite of walkers, bikers and horse riders alike, Es Canutells is a very Menorcan fishing village, boasting its own beach. Despite it being a popular holiday destination, its natural environment has been protected and it remains home to many Menorcans. The villa is
- a mere 2min walk to the sea and 5min to the local beach
- Kayak, paddle boarding, small supermarket, tennis courts and football pitches all within walking distance and open during the summer season (May-Sept)
- 7min drive to Binidali beach and its famous beach bar
- 10min drive to the village of San Climent (5.5km) with its local shops, a supermarket, post office, restaurants and cafes. The Village’s famous Casino Bar hosts a number of summer events, including the Love Party Music festival, Gastronomical Pincho Nights, weekly Jazz concerts and of course the village Fiesta
- 15min drive from the airpo

name: Apartamento Aire Marí - Arenal den Castell
description: A charming apartment on the first floor, with a balcony and sea view. “Aire Marí” overlooks the coast of Arenal den Castell, a fantastic beach with red golden sand and the shape of a perfect horseshoe. It is part of a small and nice complex of apartments that share a communal pool where the little ones of the family will enjoy their vacation to the fullest. At the same time it is very close to the beach, about 150 m, and to the restaurants that follow the line of the sea.
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located about 150m from the beach and nearby restaurants and shops.
Arenal d'en Castell has a very beautiful beach with redgolden sand and a horseshoe shape.
It is surrounded by extensive pine forest and nature and at the same time has a wide variety of services for the whole family. It has numerous restaurants and bars, shops and supermarkets, a pharmacy, car and kayak rentals, and for children bouncy castles and an aqua park. The ideal place for family vacations.

The apartment is located in a quiet area while being close to beaches and main tourist attractions such as Ciudadela .

It has one bedroom, full bathroom, sofa bed in the dining room, perfectly equipped kitchen and dining room with free WiFi. It has a good terrace with garden views and a pool.

name: Apartment with pool in Golf Son Parc
description: Magnificent apartment located in front of the Son Parc golf course and very close to the Golf Club.
neighborhood_overview:
Son Parc is a quiet tourist urbanization on the north coast of Menorca, belonging to the municipality of Es Mercadal. Son Parc has various attractions that make it special, including its beach, also known as Arenal de Son Saura. It is one of the most special beaches in Menorca, which stands out for its fine white sand and crystal-clear water.
Another attraction that the urbanization has is the golf course, the only one in Menorca. Son Parc has all kinds of services and is completely surrounded by vegetation.
host_about:
En SOM Menorca, fundada en 1990, encontrará la mejor selección de casas y apartamentos para que disfrute sus vacaciones en Menorca. 

En SOM Menorca fomentamos hábitos, actitudes y comportamientos en favor del respeto por el medio ambiente, la lucha contra el cambio climático y una mejor conservación del ecosistema menorquín. Asimismo, apoyamos el comercio de proximidad y defendemos las tradiciones y la cultura menorquina

description:
The house is very bright, has a private garden and comfortable and quiet outdoor spaces. Ideal for two couples as each room has its own full bathroom with shower. It has private parking.
It is a few minutes from Cala Blanca beach and a 10-minute walk from Santandria beach. In addition to having the spectacular and unique cave of Menorca, the Cova de S'Aigua, next door.
A few meters away there is a restaurant area and the best sunsets!

name: Menorca Breathtaking views
description: On the south coast of Menorca, magnificent house in luxury development front line with stunning views of the Mediterranean Sea . House careful to detail , beautifully decorated in white and blue tones
neighborhood_overview:
In 1995 Unesco declared Menorca Biosphere Reserve. The Menorcans are very friendly, proud of their marvelous island, which offers coves and unspoilt beaches,a navigable coast with natural ports, prehistoric monuments(there is one in the property), neoclasical architecture with English influence, well kept countryside, white villages with typical shops (many manufactures of luxury shoes and leather), excellent Mediterranean dishes with fish, and above all, tranquility in natural surroundings.
Menorca has nothing to do with Mallorca or Ibiza's agitation and racket. It offers the cleanest beache
host_about: Hola! Me llamo Pat estoy casada con Jean Pierre, diseñador, y tenemos dos hijos. Jean Pierre y yo siempre hemos tenido la pasión de viajar y de ofrecer un ambiente acogedor a nuestros huéspedes. Yo he vivido muchos años en Italia y Suiza, Jean Pierre es francés; en casa hablamos desordenadamente 4 idiomas entre nosotros y siempre nos ha encantado intercambiar experiencias y modos de vida. Adoramos a los animales. Nos gusta el cine y la lectura.

host_about:
*IMPORANT* - In order to access your villa directions and key collection information, you will need to log-in to the Solmar Villas website. Information on how to do this will be emailed to you once your booking is confirmed. Please note that we will contact you post booking via our Villa Concierge Team in order for you to provide your Advanced Passenger Information. This includes all passenger names, dates of birth, passport details and your flight details, which is required by local authorities.

Solmar Villas is a family run business with over 29 years of experience in arranging high quality, tailor made villa holidays. We pride ourselves in providing the highest quality prompt and personalised service to all our clients - with Solmar Villas, you are in safe hands.

We specialise in providing the very finest villas for perfect villa holidays.

All our villas are carefully chosen and approved by our staff - we select only the highest quality villas in the finest resorts and regions of mainland Spain as well as the Balearics  and Canary Islands, Portugal, Greek Islands,  Cyprus and Croatia.

Our selection of villas include a wide range of properties from traditional style houses offering peace and privacy in the countryside, to luxury villas with pools and breath-taking coastal views. 

Solmar has built a loyal customer base. Many of our clients use Solmar year after year and many of our new customers book our villas after recommendations from friends and family.

Whatever type of holiday you have in mind, whether its beach, sports or special interest, we will do everything possible to meet your requirements.

Our ATOL number is ATOL 10334 and as such any flight inclusive holidays booked with us are financially protected.

name: Precioso apartanento frente al mar
description: House/apartment in the development. Playas de Fornells. Ocean view terrace and spectacular sunsets just in front of the house. It has a bedroom, a bathroom and a large living/dining room with an integrated kitchen. Very quiet area, surrounded by beautiful gardens and with supermarkets and restaurants within a 10-minute walk. neighborhood_overview:
Very quiet area in the northern part of the island, one of the most virgin and least crowded areas in Menorca.
There are two supermarkets near the house, restaurant area and a Beach club within walking distance.
Fornells, a beautiful fishing village, is a 5-minute drive and a 10-minute drive from Es Mercadal, where you can find all the necessary amenities.
